column3: Ee'noko piaa masikung nii'ke tasi'pampimaung Karistoo'ke nii'koo boo'parara naumurio', ee'noko napo' nii' tee'ke nii'maikorori' paku-koo moompiainge.

Aung aa' tee enang kore'noo'na'mung Baari'koong˜ Paroro-koo. Jiisuu'ke noru'uu' bakaang doong makotuio' aung-eta kansi'keta tenkenuainoo' Bauma-anko nanuu'naang. Teie kansi'koo otoitaa' bakaning doong kante piaavuriko' bera bou'na'mung-koo basinoo'.

Ee'noko teing baata Kumponing iirang-antavaako'ning teing-koo ookara mare' karenaumo kivora-koo kuunge? Tee aa' teinge ee'ninge oraka'nko nkoau'nung ee'noko maku'koo boo'pariru' teka mee'bora' sirakamaa'koo.
Ee'noko Kumponing baurukaa' kara sionuka deentariri tee aarumo mono bakaang pia siong tero amakorariri nkorariko'nung nkoveriauka'.
Kumponinge tee nantoong ookara meumpaava'nameng-koo otoroko sira'puing bakaang piaa narunge ookara nari' domampurii'naang.

Ee'noko narung aurong taaravantu' teing-koo kapoo' karenaumo domantoia-ankoita karoma aa'puko, “Taamang apuka'parako nau' bau'nu' na'mung doong-koong moo' siompei sikeereveai, ee'noko beekuri aane tee' nari' siompei sikeereveaing, teka mou dovang koi' sinampo'ning orarieauka'.”
Ee'noko Ovoring-koo tee' amaiaa'doriko teie deto i'anturiai.

Ai' teie ookara nantoong kansi'nupoong simpe'uriaina'mung tero pinka'antavuu'nung. Narunge naninge teie Pako'pari'uu'nunge˜ ookara biikaang aarumo tasi'puitaa' koonto'na' simpe'uriaing, ee'noko nii' ookara tee' nkoaraa'naang tasi'antamuru' tee ee'nara Pako'pari'nii' boo'keta daa'antavura.”

Ee'noko tee mura'aarai'nange piatooronukai akapeu'aama mo'ming kunikunisi daurarong˜ bakaang baakopo-pina' nkoaara bore'koo kurumpau', ee'noko mononopa' isikung dauraronuka biikaang-pina' karompumaung, kurumpau'.
Tee'koo naaroonku mme' nerai'ariri otoroining napo' nampeesiariaing maroamaang, toire' paravaariaina', biikanava pava tareaavai, ee'noko doona avompiauka' too'denunge barakosi'muri'neenga.
Masika'antameriaing ning Mma'koo o'nong ee'noko Mma' ning-koo otong. Makotuaung deeko' masika'antameriaing aing-koo nko-nkoning-koo.
Teketa tenaanka Boo' ee'noko Tutueu nari' dinkung-koo nta' kauoori-po'nung-koo dua'aaretu' o'antavaarema, tee tee kemu'kanung boo'pari oto', sisikeera oparavaung kontoma.

Tee' ee'na' boontunamparapeu'nung dei amutemu'ke sisikeera kune'umaatopeu' kansi' pupu'aru'noo'keta, teka enang bateinang-nanka-koo asiranoo'ke namu'ke oro'paru' ookutunung bateinang daka'pui tee oraka' nkonanka tonta'uu'naang baka boontunamparara.
Ee'noko mare' karenaumo kivora-koo tarevuri nanuko' teke mee'bora' sirakamaa'koo.
Tee'koo mmaikori', taamang-koo naro'darima tampa' navurariri tata'deeria' naierimatoai.

Teketa napo' ˜narung-taa-nung pinkapinka' kaape'uko ooama u'mi' pankaing nkoarako ooantu', ee'noko duaa' mutaanampura baarong mutaanu'pina' oro'paru', ee'noko kaara pankaveraa'ou'noo'ka koonto' ereng-pina' oro'paru'.

Nii'ning maniku' dotuariko' biikaning boorou'ning domampariko. Ee'noko napo' nii'ning-koo teinge too'de-nupoonge oraka' nari' oto'koo etuaariko teing koonto' aroo'aria', teka baike tora'koo taura'pariko' boo'keta daa'arima tampara otooto'koo otoroaina' noru'ariri.

Teka Paula'ke aa'puru' teing piatooronuka, “Nee' aa' tee teinge sirapo'ka mura'maaresieeng tutung nia'maarea', ai' nee' tenaanka Rooma'koonaanka. Tee' nkomaareta kiimatanava-koo dua'maaresieeng. Enang ee napo' makenge bata'maaree'naang? Tee' makotua'. Teinge bii'ka porora sing-antamaareaing.”

Daari Meekung-koo ee' minkuvui otoina', “Nampeesi orarieauka'. “Naning dupisi'eauka'. “Bakiaa' nkoveauka'. “Nii'nung bakaang kapoo' karaa'eauka'.” (Toro 20:13-15,17) Teing ee'noko nii'ning botonanka otoromaing anaare-koo bi'ariri otorong, “Dake tee naning da'koo due'nung daka piaararamana' nari' tee' piaaveaing.” (Boontu 19:18)
Ee'noko teing ookara nantoong aing kapoo'nanka nkoaravaina' nooruupiai nempaamaing teing domang kiiroraa'antavarimaing tee Karistoo' tee' kiiroraa'ari otomana' nari' otoroo'naang.
Pankaruntoonge Kumponing-nung boto karaa'amaung.
Doong kante Ovoring-koo doturoturariri otorimaatoai, napo' unampama aa'pamaang, Doturariri otorimaatoai!
Tenang tee aurong ning karamuko'nung ooama'naang tee-aape bere'maru', ee'noko bere'marama ˜kenaanka-taa daamu ba'nang-kooning kooro-koo nkonii' ooantu'.
Ee'noko teing baatai Kumponinge marakavarama bakanoo' uaaroma tumpariaroo' naang tampuru'ning? Tee aa' teing ee'ning tee meumpaavaruko'ning nauvurima tee' minkuvuu'nung.
Ookara tero porou'ning karanaang tamparima bakisipunanka ee'noko tatusi' baukonanka. Sipisipi'nankai taaravaariaruko' teing.
Dii' bautaranuka diikaning pankeng tanataraarimaing-ankoi boong-koo otorimaatoai teing pankaing-antaverereri, tampa' nkoraarimaing naing-koo deea', teka teing oraka' nkoraarimaing-koo nari'.
Bera tee daang-koong karananka masikeng-pina' donkong-antavaaru' aa'pau'ning, “Aunge naninge uatepa ava pava dootuu'nava pankava meekava oraka' minkuvumaung ee'noko tee boto Moosesi-nung.
Aing teing ookara Kumponing-etaning tee ee'nara nii' baka-koo napo' navu-antamuru'nung Karistoo'koo, ee'noko navu-antamurira tee nko-nko nantoong napo' navu-anta-koong amuru' nii'ke nkoampii'naang.
Ee mmaikori', teing urikupoong nakaro-nupoong˜ io' oovereriaing, tee Ovoring bakaang miring ninka kareaako'ning. Teinge arikung kune'aama ka'duuariri otoroko'na' tampa' tasi'perira siomperiaing.
Ee'noko tenang ee' nkoaravaing: Baa tee Ovoring bakaang miring-koo eentavaravaing tee domamparavaing.’ (Jooeli 2:28-32)
“Ee', tee-koo niikaang Kumponing-koo otoaing teing aing aa'ning: biraanke, meenasi, matau, tampa' tang, biiving, iri', ee'noko puring-anta ookara batei-koo. Masikung.”
Diikaang tampa' oro'na' mono-koo dama'dunoo' deemparavauka' tampa' simpi'dovantarima diikaning dapo ee'noko kapoo' tampeng kooro dovang-kooning si'darima napo' mononopa' tampa' oro' kuruntarima.

Tee tee maia'doauka'nung niikaang Ovoring sira'koo; ning-koo tee', bane ning bakaang dai'nisi o'noko. Makosi Kumponinge tee' nari' puring-antamureko da' tee' nari' ni'ninka sisikeera kompampeainge tee tampara doorenang-koo.
Ee'noko teing noru'aransitaa' ninge ninka aromang teing napo' dakaning meekupoong masikeng deemparii'naang.
Deto tanteraravai! Teing kapoo' otoining puring-antaveai mme' boo'paravaruko, ai' dakaang nko-nko koomparavaung ooreronsing nkaang Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ke.
Ee'noko napo' beenaumo-nunge koosinunge bakanareng utaunareng ntonanka-koo dau piampuu' ee'noko pu'antananka aa'ning-koo, ee'noko teing ntonanka ereng narunanka deempariru'.
Jiisuu'ke tee Kumponinge tampa' oomurimanoo' basi-antamuru' ee'noko dotumarimaung nempampiritaa' Kumponing-nung meenasi kong-koo.

Koonto' tasi'peri noru'eriaing naning tee kaukauro-nko, naning kiiroraa' deeaung, nii'noo' mamaironto' tee oto'evuauka'nung barenku-koo Karistoo'ke ee'noko Kumponinge tareaaremaing ninka. Temurii' karaa' siong kumponing daang-koong boontuvuma-nko.
Eebaraami' tee' nari'ke, masika'anta-po'nung. Tee'koo Kumponinge bokuvura nii'noo'aape te' tokoo maraka-antavuu'noo' tee avuu'naang botovuio' meumpura tenkenuu' tamung noru'ua' tokoo beainoo'.
Purinto'naru'ke baru' naikirima kanu'anta-koo bakerariai diikaang domang ootukunavaro orari-antarari'neeng, teka Tanuaang Meekunge maanto'duri otoaing.
A'noo' tee mmau'ke siompaariaing biikaang aarumo amutemurii' maimaia'nanka-po'nung. Teketa' teing tee' nkoariko tevung Karistoo'nung kara masikung sionavung nii'ninge oraka' minkuaavaing.
Ai' tee tee teie taung nkomemurio' nii' ookavitura Bauma-anko be'koo makotumpiri otong tee narung Tanuaang Meekung-koo kuunge.

Teka teing Ju'deeaing-koo baito-nupoong teing, nii'ke karavoto daarievorompiru'ning kaka'dekemarira matauampiru'na' taamang kumponing tositosinanka-koo darinii' ee'noko ereng naiaavaroo'naang, bio' tutung tavaama ereng dakoaavaung-koong maa'aavaroo'naang, ee'noko kaukauro nkoaavaroo'naang.”
Teka Piitai aa'puu', “Ananaiasi, aming-koo da' Sietani'ke domang maanto'koo taura'daring Tanuaang Meekung tosiee'naang mooni'koo nii'ning pinka'ei kansi' baaveveieeng-koong?

Teketa tee nantoong onou tasi'paa'nukai daang ampirinumparima˜ aavamaariko toire' oki'nareka'pina' o'noriauka'nung amutemurii' daang-koong nau-anta siompampiritaa', aa'na' boo'ai nankara avitoitoi bii'urimana' dovinge uupuvuriko.
Noru'eria' otong teing nantoong nampeesi orariaavaining teing Kumponing bakaang muu'koo tumpariauka'nung? Aavaraariko taaraverereriauka'.
Naro' kune' siperiauka' nii'ning biikaang aarumo siomperi, teka iri'antareerimaatoai baru'noo' doong asi'na'mung due'uko noru'eritaa'.
Tee'koo kapoo' kansi'aapening dii'koo otoining boo'antaveriai aa'ning: kaukauro nko, noru' ku'mi', karakaraa', mamairo, ee'noko onou oko'oko-koong, tee' tee' kumponing daang-koong siona'.

Teka nii' nantoong doong-kooning deemariritaa' tee taremariri o'noriaing. Ookara piaavarampiri, Kumponing-etaing kara masika'antavampiri, ee'noko moo'muriaina' aa'na' noru'ampiri, orara-ita nee'mariri o'noriaing naning tavutavu' nko-pina' bakaang mono nee'arapeu'na' mononopa' baakopo dovang ivekeng kurumparama.
Ai' Kumponinge tee tanuaang avorompe'koong amuria', teka tee tanuaang purinto'koong amuru'nung, piaa-koong ee'noko toomoosiari oto'koong.
Baie teie naninge aa'pumaung, “Ninge tee noru'ansi o'nong,” teka teie tee bakaang botonanka siompua', tee tee tosi-bauko ee'noko tee kara masikung tee-koo otoa'.
makosi, dii'ke nkaang doturotu dupe-antaveriaing narung noru'koo otori, nari' piaareeri, napo' nari' onourariri kapoo'nanka nari' nkoverima.
Ee'noko teinge tee moo'koo kariaama moo'aavaruko'. Naninge tanka' pante'ua' tee-koo, bakaang batei mme' makotuaruko.
Naueriaing tampara nko-nko nkoaavaing, tampara nko-nko-koo maneeoroaing, avusiro'ariai, biikaang kapoo'nanka tankee'eeaing nii'ning ninka.
Ee'noko ee' maku'au', “Teie kapoo' orara nkovuaruko nii'ke da'anko tavo'ampiarupeu'.”

Baie naninge nii'na'mung doong tare-koo piavora tee tarevuaing te'mung ee'na'mung Ovoring pankaing-antavui. Ee'noko tee naning naro'keta naikumaung tee Ovoring daangampuma tee' naro'keta naikung Kumponing-koo tampa' tampuma. Kerempumaunge tee', Ovoring daangampuma kerempumaunge, ee'noko Kumponing-koo tampa' tampuma.
Tee barenku nemperimaung noru'eritaa' doturariri otoriai ee'noko orara doong kune'erima dooroontariri otoriai. Uatepa kunsirarimatoai.

Teketa tenang tee piatooronuka daaku' tarenara botovuu' teie tee Paula' tee ninka tareaio' otoo'naang teka baru' kiimata-pina' deea'. Ee'noko ba'maikori'ke beero'koo orokoaava' piavoaining-koo pakuaama.

Nii'nung naning piaavema deeko', bane aming kapoo' tavo'kuko, dake doong kante sipeauka'nung tee, tee masika'anta-koo piaromaatoaing, tampa' nkoaravaing-pina' noru'emaatoaing, ee'noko purintari tee paku-koo otomatoaing.
Tee' Daari Meekung-koo narunge aa'puu'na', “Ninge masika'antavamira karontu'nung,” teie narunge Tanuaange masika'anta-koonge daa'muriko masika'antavampima karompimaung.

Nii'maikorori', ee' nkoverii'naang botorarampimaang: Koono-antaverereriaing teing kontevoroma ata' nanu'nuka, ee'noko teing avoro'keta orarunsiarimaing dunsirunsi-antavereriaing. Pakuereriaing teing iri' oparimaing. Bointuri otoriaing ookara ninka.

Teketa napo' pa'noko'nunge koosinunge bakanareng utau piampuu' te' masipo' tee biiko bakanoo' ovorimpari ba'nava'nani'doma, ee'noko bakaning otoromanairu mutaanampuu' ee'noko nantoonanka meneng si'daie taiariko' aa'na' sisikeeravoroma.
Mooa ee'noko piaa dii'koo otoaing aung ee'nara aarumo minkuansinung siomperimaing-koo, teing Isireeli masikeng-koo Kumponing bakanavitu-koo.

Teenoo' tee naning Ovoring bakanavung-koo nii'noo' basinoo' tampa' barearu'nung, ee'noko domang-eta karoma koonto'na' to'biiari Jiisuu' nau-antavuriko' ee'noko meeka'anta-koo Joonie Minkinara meeka'antavuriko'nameng nameng noru'ui.
Tee'koo taamang-koo naikima ntong tovang-koo, aming kapoo' nkoveaing-koo, nkoveaing ootukunung kapoo' Kumponing pankaing-anta-koo.

Teka tee Tanuaang Meekung Karistoo'ke aruru'nung tee dii' ninka nari' otomatoaing, ee'noko dii' teing nii'nung naninge kapoo' nau-anta-koo kevi'dariaung. Tee Tanuaang Meekung narung makosi dii' nau-anta-koo ookara kapoo'nanka ee'noko tee bakaang kara masikung, daang deea'. Tee' ee'na' Tanuaang Meekunge nau-antaruru'na' Karistoo'koo pinka'dariri otoriai.
To'biiario' aa'pamaang, tee' nari' tee mono domaangropa tee boo' tee-pina' masika'anta tee'ke, nko-nkoropa tee boo'.
Ee'noko tee' minkuvura teie berete' nkavura tampa' tampura Kumponing-koo, teing-koo dutakanoo'ke teke pisi'ura nai tutumpuu'.

Teka daariampima nauarampiaing aing aa'ning nkoaavaroo'naang, taamang naiaavauka' kumponing tositosinanka-koo darimpaama ku'mi'antavaamaung, kaukauro nkoaavauka', bio' tutung tavaama ereng dakoaavaung maa'aavauka', ee'noko ereng naiaavauka', Ju'nupoong dii'koo maarevoro'neeng.
Ee'noko Paula'ke aa'puu' tee, “Nna' da' Kumponinge tanko'duainge, kuung-takaa'. Dake ape' ning boto ninka paaramee'naang te' ba'nantaring ee'noko tee boto sipei ning tanko'koo botoraramang ee?”
Tee'koo enang Kumponinge boo'koo miru'muria' nii' Karistoo'koo o'norining.

Ai' Kumponinge tee nii' miru'muria' teie kiimatamurii'naang iiravoma, teka domamurii'naang niikaang Ovoringe, Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke, teie ee'narai nii'koo boo'paru'nunge nii' naro'murii'naang tee ninka toroaravaina'mung-koo, moompiaining ee'noko domamariaining.

Ee'noko teketa ookarai kansi'ke muu' kantei nanuaing tosivurima, aa'ninge: Kouku ee'noko Makouku, kare-koo maamu-antavurima. Bakei nantoong karinga oosivuriaing, deeru-koo paapaa'ke, pirung-koong-pina' piisi'pina'.

Nii'ning tee dii'koo tee' ee'na' nkorariko'ning, teka Tanuaang Meekunge Kumponing-etainge diikaang domang kiiroraa'antaruru', ee'noko meeka'antarurira koong-antaruru' tee Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo kuunge.

Tee'koo bamuu'na' tampa' nkomaramaung-koo ninge sisikeera kune'amaang. Nka tee maia'moaung, ai' bakei tampa' noru'ansi o'nong tee naning ninge masika'antavamaung, ee'noko napo' tampa' noru'ansi otong tee tee makosi ookaanka tare-koo bera doong asirana'mung, aa'ning: teing manki'nanka avontu'ning ee'noko napo' tee manki' ee'narai ning bamui amuu', tampara kara nau-anta-koo.

Tee' Tanuaang Meekunge pakururimana'koo ookara batei-koo kunsirarimatoai amutemurii' paku nka-koo baitorarima. Ee'noko tee' nkorarima muung ee'noko doong mantontariri eentaevurerereriai Kumponing bakaning meekupoong ootukunairu-koo.

Tee ning Paula'. Sailas naankai Timoti pakumuresitaa' daarirerompimang dii' Niuma Kumponing ee'noko Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' beekaning dootuu'nupoong Tesalonaika'ke otorimaing. Biraanke ee'noko mooa dii'koo otoaing.
Ookara kapoo' nkoveriaining-koo nantoong-koo dutakanoo'ke onou tampara oro'antaverimatoai, ee' noru'eri, Ovoring poainoo' tee due'ui otong.
Tenang naierima aung berete' ee'noko tuaantarima areng-eta' dii'ke sira'perimatoaing tee Ovoring dii'koo boo'paru'nung poainoo'ke basi.
Ee'noko baitoariri kunsiariko Ovoringe domampura deto i'ampuai tee. Ee'noko orara nko-nko nkovuu'nung deeko' tonta'antavevuai.
Ninge kunsimarama amutemu'koo noru'dama Kumponing-koo tampara tampamaung, tee ee'nara tampa' domange noru'marama ninge mintoompevomaung, tee' mmataraange nkoau'na'.
“Nii'koo dau dua'darara nee'meriai teie Ovoringe ba'nava'nani'koo ba'nanui otoinge oomuri'neeng. Napo' teieta Sipisipi' Kampia bakaang iira-ita baku'meriai.

Baa tee naning punkang-po'nunge tee tampa' taaravuaing tee kapoo' Tanuaang Meekunge minkuvumaung dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kante-koo. Baata teing parapaara puru'aavaining ninge tee taamang kore'nang paninung avorompaing kansi'nupoong-eta baku'nii', napo' tee kapang kakaara avorompainge naruna' naruna', nkanoo' kuung tung-koo taura'nii' taa'ni'anta, tee miring nerakung biikaang daarinii' tere'koo. Naninge noru'ua' tee miring, teka teie tere' nkavuainge baka noru'ui otong.” ’ ”
Ee'noko tee' nkoarima mooni' barang-koo okovuriai kara menaankavarima. Nka tee teie Simpe'nkoi˜ tuutunang˜ miru'evuru'nung nempari otong. Teing orari-antavuriainge keeroorovuri otong.

Tee'koo, kasiaavaruko Kumponinge taura'puaing tositosi pankaing teing-koo tavo'araa'naang, daang-koong masika'antavaako ookara kiimata-kooning tampuriaina', orara aarumo piavoroma kara masikung masika'antavaavaruko.
Daari Meekunge tee' nari' minkuvui otong, aa'pumaung, “Dii' Ju'nupoong oraka' otoriko tee'koo Ju'deeainge Kumponing oraka' minkuaamaung.” (Aisaia' 52:5)

Tero tee Janis naankai Jampiris turampureko' tee Moosesi, ee'noko tee' nari' teinge too'dempaamaung ookara kapoo' masikananka. Teing donkaang tunsi dera'nukai ee'noko baito tosiro'koong oto'evoroining.
Ninge tee teing nantoong piaavaramaing teing oraka' nkoaako aka'paransi koong-antavaramaung. Tee'koo nkaning meekupoong deentariri otorii'naang kevi'darima bere'dariai!
Tee barenku masika'antavampirio' Kumponinge koonto'nuka tammurimaung. Tee'koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke pakumurio' enang mooa-koo o'noring Kumponing ninka.
Tareraravai dakaang nko-nko ee'noko nau-anta, tampa' nari' otoaina', ee'noko tee' nkovekotaa' ookara taararaamaing ninka nari' domantariaing.

Ee'noko napo' ninge mmau'namu'pie kiimatavaranko' teka pava dootuu'nanka-koo ookara-koo Karistoo' penkempaavaina' paara-antavarama. Ee'noko bakei aa'na' iirang-antamarama manki'antavaranko' teing, bane osi pankeng oovuning biikaning-koo.”

Mono bakaang nko-nko ee'pina' sira'pari otong: nampeesi orari, kaukauro-nko, noru' ku'mi', maimaia'na' nko, kumponing tositosinanka siong, dopa-nko, oraka' noru', turang-nko, orarunsi ninka munte', iira bauko, mosii', kara-koo tata', siivenke', mamaironto', purinto'naru'ke kanu', tooreere dovang;
Tee'koo tee naning keempumaung ee'noko tee nii'nung duu'pumaung baru' noru'koo makosi deea', teka tee Kumponing baka du'antavumaung noru'koo makosi.

Ee'noko teketa napo' aurong paning-eta karoko taaravantu' ntonanka-pina' aa'na' uutuarako napo' kurunkurung-pina' aa'na' karoko, ee'noko tee auronanka nepu'na' tampa' taaravanko' nantoonge kiitananka kopi'aako karopeu'na' karoko.

Ookara urikupoong nakaro-nupoong Kumponing-etainge ee' nari' sira'pau'nung: ‘Ookara nantoong tee masika'antavaavaining tonta'anta kompaavaing tee bakaang miring-koo kuunge.’ ” (Aisaia' 33:24; 53:5,6; Jeremaia 31:34; Danielo 9:24)
Teing nantoong tampa' nari' nkoaamaing ee'noko besi'aakoo' tee meenasi Kumponing-etaing, pankaing-anta, ee'noko domaang boo'paa', teie teing domaang tampa' nari' oto' avuriaing.

Aung kara ninge Joonie daariamang dii'koo ˜kevuntu'ka-taa osi-koo dootuu'nupoong otorimaing Eesia-nameensi'kooning-koo. Kumponinge teie aa'nunge, teroita otou'nunge, e'mung tee' otong, ee'noko dama'ke tee' nari' otoi poainge, teie piaaruri mooaruriaing. Napo' teinge ˜kenaanka-taae Tanuaange Kumponing ba'nanumanoo' uro'kanoo'ke otoromainge piaaraari mooaraariainge.

Ee'noko Paula'ke aa'puru' teing, “Joonie tee nantoong oraka' nko-ita bere'ariko ntong-koo minkivurima meeka'antavuriko'nung nauvurima tee naning dama' poaing masika'antavaava'naang, ee'noko aa'dampimang, tee masika'antavaava'naang nauvuru'nung tee Jiisuu'.”

Tee' nkovuru'na'koo tee sira'pari otong tee Ovoring noru'kui otong nantoong tee siompaamaing parapaara arikung-eta domang-antana'koo ee'noko napo' teing siompaavauka'ning kiimatavurii'naang pinka'uri oto'na'koo bera te'mung simpe'uriaina'mung-koo basi.
Teka tee te'noo' osi tampoo' oto'koo piavoromaing, te' ee'noo' paning-koonoo'. Tee' masika' noru'ampiri otong teie osi pankaing maamu-antaevuru'nung-koo.
Donta'dari otoai teing-eta kumponaang daang-koonanka Kumponing-etaning deeaing-eta. Nka daka tampa' bareraravai Kumponing bakaang naning makosina'pina' nkoraravaina'.

Ee'noko tee, teinge ootukunung kansi' opai nanaavaing Kumponing bakaning meekupoong otoroainairu koroai, ee'noko osi pankamono Kumponinge piaavumanamono koroaavai. Teka tee' koroai otoroko nta'ke paning-eta depeto dua'arara taivuriaing teing.
Ee'noko teie botovuru'nung ntong-koo minkiarira meeka'antavarii'naang Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo. Teketa teinge Piita dateau' nii'ning doong nari' otoroo'naang tampaama.
ee'noko simpe'epeu' kapoo' orara ee'noko tampara, ee'noko da' naning mutuu siong-anta deeko', ee'noko araka teing-koo mutaanang-kooning-koo,
Ee'noko tee tee kapoo' nii'koo maraka-antavuu'nung kompampiaing, tee ee'nara domaang oparavaung.

Teka tee temurii' noru' matau paning-etaing tutuna' tee pituari oto' deeaung, teketa mooa-anta, banainge oto', noru' barorompari oto', piaae maanto', ee'noko nii'ning sinang tampeng, siivenke'ari noru' otoaruko, ampirinung dovang nari'.
Baumai Bauring piaavura ookara kapoo'nanka avuu' kompuu'naang.

Ovoringe tee bakaang maraka-anta dupe-koo tamung ana'aravaung nii'ninge tampaamana'. Teka teie piaavuri nempuri otong teing bei'bei'arimaing-koo naning narung kera'para'neeng-koo, teka ookara bere'arii'naang piavorora batei makosinoo' avurii'naang.
Ninge ee' naurampimang: Nampeesirariarui dei makosi ning-pina', nka noru'ansi o'nong nii' nari' oro'nanka deea' Kumponinge naruna' naruna' nkomuru'na'koo.
Tee tee enang piaanavung to'bii-antarariritaa' teing avuavu' Tanuaang-etaning kong-koo paararariaing, teing-koo deto basining aa'na' piarorima, baru'noo' tee tarampee-koong.

Ai' teie Kumponinge kansi' pupu'uma aa'puu'nunge, “Araka, arakararavai mutaanang-koo meu'ke,” tee bakaang arakai niikaang domang siisi-antavuu'nung nau-antamurima tee meenasi Kumponing bakaang, Karistoo' bakaang oing-koo oro'parako tasi'pampira aa'pampii'naang tee tee Ovoring, Kumponinge tero Pako'pari'nii' nii' domamuri taremuriainoo'koo.

Paula' Kalesia-nameensi'ke tee' koroarako tee naning Ju'nung miring Apolos, Aleksandaria-namono-koong tee Epeses beu'nung maneena' minku bauko, ee'noko Daari Meekung-koong kara tampa' tasi'pui otoko'nunge.
Ee'noko tee' nari' Jiisuu' osi pankamono-koo taapo'ka baike kune'uu' nantoong meeka'antavurii'naang baka bakaang erenge.
Tee' nari' koonto' botoveri nau-antaverimatoaing aing kapoo'nanka, tautauerima kontevoroa' siompaava'naang. Naninge nii'nunge daang-antaruauka'.
Kumponinge tee bakaang piaa nii'koo ee'pina' nau-antamuru': Teie tee Bauring narung masikung kirokai botovuu' a' nii'anko kansi'koo nii' tee-koo domamarii'naang.
“Mma' ee, teing dake ning ameu'ning ni'ninka o'norii'naang piamomaang ning o'noainoo' nkaang meenasi ooaavaina' tee dake ameu'nung. Aming-koo, nna' dake ning piaameu'nung kansi' mme' nkoaravaruko.
‘Taung tooreere navung siompaamaing nantoong oraka' dee'antavaarima.

Tee'koo niikaang domang danto nari' pinka'mariri o'noriaing niikaang masika'anta-koo sira'marimaung-koo, ai' nii' teing pankaing piristi' oto'memuring paninanka aarempui beu'nung Kumponing-koo due', tee ee'nara Jiisuu', tee Kumponing Bauring.

Ai' tenang teie tee pankaing-anta ee'noko meenasi Bauma Kumponing-eta nkavuko teie auronge narunge karavuu' teketa paning-eta daurarompari bakaang meenasi oro'antavumanoo'keta ee' minkuvuma, “Aung tee nnuring ninge piaavamaung. Ee'nara-koo ning tampa' dotumaramaung.” (Mat 17:5)
Aing teing ookara narung Tanuaang bakaning nko-nkonanka. Teie ee'narai tankaampumaung naruna' naruna' kante piavomana'.

Teketa napo' karenaumo-nunge koosinunge bakanareng tuuviri puumpuu' ee'noko aa'nou': duaa'koo oki'nameng paparovuu', napo' kaara-koo oki'nameng paparovuu', ee'noko beento'nanka-koo nii'namanto* paparovuru'. Ee'noko aa'nou': te'mung doong apuka'paru'. Napo' te'mung muunga tee', beento'nanka-ita kaara oki'nameng-koo araka otoaruu'.
Ee'noko teketa teinge Siosienis kompau', ee'nara Ju'nupoong biikanava pava dootuu'nava-koo pankaing, ee'noko mura'au' teka kara simpe'doma uro'kanoo'ka. Teka Kaalio' aung-koo kapoo'koo tara'oaruu'.
Ee'noko teketa napo' Ju'koong ovontunge moo'aava'naang mau'au', teka teing divu'uri tenkenuu'.
Tee'koo tarua'moriaung. Bane dama'du insimarima, nka nii'koo kuunoo' tee doong kante neraka'mariri o'norimaung.

Ee'noko Meeri'ke mou-koong-pina' ntong-pina' basi duuni nkavui pou', tampa' nuuraa' naru', naarada' narunge nkonii', moo' pankaing-koonaru'. Ee'noko Jiisuu'koong-koo kau'koo koo'uu' ee'noko bakaange dapoi napo' kau' piu'uu'. Ee'noko teie tampa' nuuraa'ke teva nari' nuuraa'aru'.

Teketa tee ninka masika'anta narung ninka damisimaiari otou' temeensi'koo maraka-antavuu'nameensi'koo, akokameensi'pina' noru'uma, kaandesi-koo kaniarama nanuko'. Ee'noko bauring Aisake' tee'ke, napo' tee Jeekopi' ba'dompeng nari' barenku okonakang Eebaraami' ninka maraka-antavuru'nakang deempariri.
Ee mmaikori', tee' nari' otoritaa' ning o'nomana' otoriaing ee'noko napo' teing ninge nauarantu'na' otoromaing-koo barerariri otorimaatoai.
Naruna' naruna' pakureeriai manki'koo. Tee' nkorarima dii'ke dupe-antaveriaina' tee Karistoo'nung boto.
Ooveko, naning tee nko-nko ninka nari' masika'antavuko deeko' Kumponinge naning koonto' tampupeu', masika'anta narung-koo deea'.
Enang ee ee' noru'ampii'naang: Kumponing koonto' deea' ookamainta nari' nkovurearuu'nung-koo? Bakei makotua'.
Tee naning bakaang masika'anta-koo aruaru' dii'anko poko onkeonke'eriai, nka tee ninka tata'deeria'.
Teketa paning-koo kare pankaing tavo'kuu'. Tee Maikol bakaning koosinunanka ninka ee'noko napo' tee pakia bakaning koosinunanka ninka nari' taveu'.
Dii' iirarorima deeko' tee iira oramuriau deeng-antaveriauka'. Bointuriai duaa' mme' tumparavaruko.
Orara orarai maku'eriauka', barakosi' barakosi'ke maku'eriauka', teka aampari'eri biraanke-antareerimaatoai, ai' dii' teing tee' nko-koo bokururu'ning dii'ke bakaang biraanke nkaverii'naang.
Ee'noko tee botomuu'nung ni'ninka nari' o'noremaung. Ning si'muaung ninka, ninge doong kante kapoo'nanka dotu-antavumaung nkoamaing-koo.”
Tee tee tampa' pinka'dariri donkoniriaing. Kara masikunge tokoni'pina' tokorariai. Koompari oto' si'daravai murukeu-nee'pina'.

Aung tee mirumiru' aing aa'ning oovemaatomaing-koong: ˜keura-taa beento' ning-koo tampanaang-koo otoining ee'noko napo' ˜kenaanka-taa daamu ba'nananka kooro-koo nkonii' otoining. Aing ˜keura-taa beento' teing teing koosinunanka makosining, teing dootuu'nupoong ˜kevuntu'ka-taa osi-koo otoromaing tanatanuka. Ee'noko teing napo' ˜kenaanka-taa daamu ba'nananka kooro-koo nkonii' oovemaatomaing teing nkaning ˜kevitura-taa dootuu'nupoong.”

Teka nii'ke Jiisuu' ooampiri otong tee ee'nara oki'naa batei-koo depeto sipuu'nung koosinunanka-koo boong, teketa enang teie boo' tora'puio' Kumponinge tee deto pankaing-antavura araka ninka nerampuu'. Ee', Kumponinge aa'na' avusiro'ari Jiisuu' boo' mantong-antavuu' nii'koo ookara-koo kansi'koo-nupoong-koo.
Ai' tee dii'koo mintoompari otomaung tee Kumponing, dii' paku-antaruri tee aroo'erira bakaang pia siomperii'naang.
“Ninge tee' naurampimang nkaang doturotu dii'koo otoo'naang, ee'noko dii' aa'na' bakei dotue maanto'durii'naang.

Ning aung karavoto˜ daariamaung tee Paula', Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kara-okomui-nka. Ning kara-okomui-nka deemaru' Kumponinge domamuru'nunge botomuio' ee'noko Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke botomuio' pankaruntoonge noru'ampimaunge ookara kapoo' nempampimaung basi-antamemuriainunge.

Manii' tee teing tampa' naroompariri mononopa' makosining kurumpariaina'koo piamomaang. Avutevu'na' dapo tape'arima, biiri dovang kooro pamparima ee'noko baarong moo' maare-kooning duaanavarima ampirinumpariauka'.

Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke mo'ming nerivura nipo'urima ookara kau' karenaumo bata'uru' dootuu'nava pankava-ita, sipisipi' dovang, boromaka' dovang. Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke batanang-nanka pe'dempuru' mooni' aampari'aako'ning biikaning, ee'noko biikaang mooni' purarinka'evuru'.
Kumponinge tee nii' o'norina' nari' nkomuru'. Teie Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaning deemuri nkomuru' tampara nko-nko nkoevompimaa'noo'naang o'nori tero miru'muru'na'.
Ee maikori', ta'niniriauka' dii' tee-koo nta'pina' mantong-koo parapaara-koo dii'koo poing-koo paararurima. Tee kapoo' ta'nimpaarii'pina' noru'eriauka'.
Aia', dotumarima tampa' tampampiai bakaang meenasi daangampevompima, ai' batei tee Kampia nampeesiaravainoo' tee makotuing, ee'noko ba'aang tenie tero maamuari-nanie.
Ee'noko deto komperiaing tee domang-anta Kumponinge aruru'nung tee-pina' diikaang baakopo. Napo' komperiai tee Kumponing bakaang kara tee-pina' bainatu tavu'koong Tanuaang Meekung-etaing.
Ee'noko teie oovuu' narung ba'marang-koong narunge Iisipi'koonge oraka' nkovuko, ee'noko tee Iisipi'koong tavura tee si'antavuu'.
Dii' nii'maikorori' iri' o'dariauka' tee-koo nko-nko tampara-koo.
Tanterariri ima'dariri donkoniriaing diikaang masika'anta ninka, naning-naunturi purinto' ninka.

Tee aa' teva oki'nava dooponava nkavai nanaako'nava ning Kumponing nkanava deea', daang-koonaanka kumponinka beekanava deeng-antavau'nung, tenaanka aa'noko Moloko' ee'noko tee beento' miring Reepani, tenaanka tamunsi'naanka daangampaaree'naang teka'paaretu'naanka. Ee'noko tee'koo diikakatauro-pina' nari' nkorariko dii' isipo' Babiloni'keta kato bata'dampiaing.’ ” (Eimos 5:25-27)
Tee'koo dii' nii'maikorori' purintariri tampa' donkoniri otoriai, komperi otoriaing tee kara masikung nii'ke naurarampiru' ookenge daankimarima ee'noko karavoto-koo daariampima.

Nii' nii'ka tee' nko-koo noru'maria', teka Kumponinge nii' pia-antamuru' mono boo'paa' nka-koo, ee'noko bakaang Tanuaang amuru' taa'ni'antamuri, tasi'anta-koo tee maraka-antamuru'nung tavo'kuaing-koo.
Nani manikuma tee tampa' barearavaing dooroomparitaa' koonto' taaravuma.
Naninge nii'nung dootuu'koo urantanung tuumpivuko taaraveauka' baka, teka kenaankai deeko', nii'noo' beenaumoi koonto' ooaara makosi.
Ookara doturotu-antareeriaing onkeonke'deerima. Karistoo' bakaning dootuu'nupoong napo' ameensi'kooninge ookara osi kante-ita doturotu nauraarimaang.

Sipung tovange poo'arima ee'noko biromparima orarunsiariri bokiaama aa'paavaing, ‘Piaaru', piaaru', baka'e osi pankaing. Nantoong pirung-nupoong aareri-po'nupoong kavonanka-po'nupoong deeng-antaveru'namono dakananka kavonankai. Enang tee, batei oki'namu'koo orarirari.’

Ooveriko arekee' Niumai Kumponinge aa'na' masika' piaamurira baurukaa' marimuru'nung. Nka tee nii' tamung baurukaa' deeaing, teka baurukaa' masikeng. Nantoonge kansi'koo-nupoonge tee' tasi'maaria', ai' teinge tee Karistoo' noru'aava'.

Ee'noko dii' napo' nemaa' teie diikaning urantanuka-koo boong otorimaatoai amaiaa'dori dii'ka-koo meu'ke, ai' Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otong: Kumponinge tee teing bii'ka daangamparimaing too'dempurima teing boonko noru'arimaing avusiro'ari pakuvurikoo'. (Mirumiru' 3:34)

A, tee' deea', bakei! Kumponing tee masika'pari otoaing, bane nantoong ookara tosiariko. Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otoina', “Dakaang kara masikung deemparaa'naang tenang da' kareko, ee'noko tuutunantaako boong deempee'naang.” (Kena 51:4; 62:9)
Ee'noko tee aung taura' oto'evung piristi'nanka-koo ovontunge avau'nung dai'koo teing nantoong anke dakaang miring-koo baitoarimaing.”

Teka nii'ning nakaro-nupoong daang Kumponing-etaining tamparima daa'ariko' Ju'nupoong-koo meu'ke, ee'noko napo' tee' nari' daang-koonanka nau-antanuka daa'ariainge dii'koo meu'ke. Tee' nkoarima nantoong makenge orari-antavaariaing biikaning noru'keta daang nau-antavaarima, biikaang Ovoring teing moo'uru'nung sipai. Tee'koo bii'ka namu'ke orari-anta kune'aavaing.

Tee' minkuvuio' Ju'koong ovontung bakei oraka' dee'orou'. Jiisuu' tavaava'naang enang bakei aa'na' mau'au' Jiisuu'ke Doong Uaana'mung-koong boto toto'puu'nung-koo, ee'noko teie Kumponing bauma masikung tampuu'nung-koo, tee' minkuvuma Kumponing-pina' basi tamparu'nung-koo.”
Dii' teing tampenanka tantampimaang ning norunoru'merimaung-koo ee'noko tee naurampiru'nung aarumo tampa' ima'eri otomaung-koo.
Ai' temu'ka Deevita'ke Karistoo' miru'uma aa'puu'nung, ‘Ninge Ovoring ookara batei-koo ning-ankoa due'ka ooamaung. Tee ning-koo tampavine-koo otoko ning dua'maravauka'.
Dii' teing neraka'daririning, tee booauka'nung-eta ponto'dariru'ning, booaing-eta deea', teka teieta Kumponing bakaang kara-ita domampari oto'keta.

Tee'koo diikaang oraka' nkonanka sirasira'darimatoai nii'ning dii'maikorori'koo. Ee'noko napo' kunsi-koo pakureerimaatoai taarevoroaina'. Ai' tee kunsi naning koonto' bakaang tee aa'na' purinto'po'nung kapoo' nko-koo.
“Masika' naurampimang, naning tee ning masika'antamuing domaang oparavaung oto'evung.
Ninge dii'ka maantuaara'nuka-pina' si'dampiauka'nung. Napo' toromaravaing dii'anko.
Ee', moo' pankaing amutemurii' otong. Tutuntoma ee': Ju'nupoong-koo Kumponinge kinkompuu' bakaang karakara.
Dii' dai'nisinukai teing dii' tanataraarimaing anke kansi'koo makosina' ankampereri mataa'irariri siompererimaatoai tunsi paakararia', tee' Karistoo' dotu-antana' noru'eri.
Teie aa'na' piaaruma da' pankaroong kiimatarua', boimpui nentumang bere'daraa'naang dakaang oraka' nko-ita, ee'noko noru'ea' otong ee?
Ee'noko nii' ee' noru'ampima to'biimariri o'noring: Nii'ke kapoo' eentavampiko bakaang pia siompampiri deeko' teie tee taaramuriaing.

Ai' teie Kumponing maraka-antamurio' nempampimaunge maanto'antaruriaing doturotue ee'noko mooai masika'antaveriko. Ee'noko teie purinto'ke Tanuaang Meekung bakaange aa'na' tasi'antaruriaing tee barenku mme' oro'paravaung.
Te' aa'barata'koo dupisi'au'noo' mintoong-nanau otoko', ee'noko tenau-koo meu' nerakung kuvi dako'doma otoko' naning mme' siparava'nareng.

Ee'noko tee ooansio' biiko moo'aara dai'au', tee ninka nakaronara daang minku ninka nari', tee biiko bakaang miring-koo taa'ni'antananka ta'nimpaarii' nkovuko' aa'nung ninka. Ai' teie tee teinge ee'ninge taa'ni'antanankai tosido'uriko' teing nantoong tee biiko bakaang moo'do'anta oto'evoroining ee'noko dootuu'aako' tee bakaang baka-oo. Teketa tenaanka biiko ee'noko tee nakaronara daangminku tee domamparesio' dinkung nta'po'nung-koo doonko dua'aaretu'nung teka teie tai-koo nta' piiko-ninkainge.
Ee', dakaang too'denung peeravoko bau'eai. Ntong nai piavoko aveainge. Tee' nkovema taung daare'ee'naang onou paariarara dama' navureereaina'.

Napo' tee' Karistoo' bakaang karai maanto'duri otoriai, aa'noko dii' tee matauna' nau-antareeriai ee'noko tautaureeriai pakureerima, ee'noko kenararimatoai teinge aa'ninge: Daari Meekung-koo daarinii'nankai, nantoonge toroaamainge ee'noko Tanuaang Meekunge karantavuko˜ kenanankai tampara tamperima Kumponing-koo diikaang domange.
Napo' dii' donkaang nampeesinii'nuka dii'ankaampi piaaverererimaatoai booni' antavereria'.

Nanie manikumai Karistoo' masika'antavumaie teemuiaang-koo nani manikuma naaro otoi dei tee, tenie tare-koo makosi teni naaro. Tee' nkovuaing deeko' tee teing-koo nii'ning dootuu'nupoong-koo baru' manki'oroauka' naaroonku masikeng tareaarima.
Ee'noko tee kara Kumponinge sira'puu'nung tee aung: Kumponinge tee nii' domaang oparavauka'nung amuru', ee'noko tee domaang tee Bauring-koo otong.
Baa tee naning Bauring oto'evumaung tee-koo tee domaang otong, ee'noko baa tee naning Bauring oto'evuaung tee-koo tee domaang otoa'.
Tee'koo ninge Pankaing Bauringe botovoto-koong otooto'keta simpiri'antarampiaing deeko', bakei tampa' simpiri'dariri otoriaing!
Tee tee enang kontampiri si'damping aa'dampima, tarua'doriauka' teing arikananka ninge dii' pakurampima kune'amaing-koo dii' meenasi-koo basi-anta-koong onoueri.
Nantoong tee' oro'nukai tee niikaang Ovoring Karistoo' siompaava', biikaang pia narung siompaamaung. Tampa' nari' kareaama ee'noko opampaarima tosiaarimaung teing amakoori domang-koo.
Bakei amutemurii'ke maanto'uru', oraka'nkoi, orara aarumoi, oko'okoi, ee'noko oraka' noru'ke. Mamairoi maanto'ke ee'noko tavu'nkoi, turang, tositosi, too'deng;
Tareveaing tee kara masikung tee Tanuaang Meekunge nii'koo otomatomaunge masika'antaruma aruu'nung.

Dake dakaang mono narung dotu-anta-koo noru'ei keenkiaing deeko' dake teieta mono-ita orari-anta kaveaing simpe'muriaina'mung. Ee'noko dake Tanuaang Meekung dotu-anta-koo noru'ei keenkiaing deeko' dake teieta Tanuaang Meekung-eta domaang oparavaung kaveaing.
Ee'noko nii' Karistoo' iirang-antana' nkomariauka'. Teing-koo nii'ning tee' nkoarikotaa' booroko' boru'ke kakiaariko.
Piaa tee nantoong tampa'nko, mamairo deea';
Ee'noko biikaang murukeu-nee' aini-koong-pina'oro', ee'noko tenang puraanaako kupa'koong aurong kaarisinanka mmau' oosinankai tavutavu'koo kua'parima kurunkurunkaanaamana' taara.
Ninge morai'nange kara nauaranko bei'bei'maavaru'nung dei naninge biikaang aarumo orara tampuarupeu'. Nka tampa' sira'mario' bei'bei'maama biikaang orara aarumo baku'koo makosiaava'.
Teing ninka mutaanang-nupoong ninka otori mataurariri nanirimaatoai batei tamung kera'peria'.

Nii'ke noru'ampiri otong niikaang urikung aarumo tee ninka nari' dupisi'au' aa'barata'koo˜ tee niikaang orara aarumonanka teke bakearaa'naang ee'noko enang tee orara aarumo-koo bi'mariri o'noriauka'nung napo'.

Enang tee, ee' nii'ke tasi'pampiaing baata teing Kumponing baurukaa' ee'noko baata teing Sietani' baurukaa': baa tee naning koonto'na' nkovuaung ee'noko ba'maiko' piaavuaung, tee tee Kumponing bakaang naning deea'.
Tee noru' mono bakanamenge otomaung tee Kumponing-koo too'denung, Kumponing-nung boto-koo kupi'omaung, bakei makotua' nii'na' nko-koo.
Tee'koo nkaang domang dotumaramaung menenge kenamarama, baru'noo' nkaang mono dama'ke tampa' o'noaina' noru'marama.

A, tee' deea'. Tee ninge minkuamaatomaung kapoo' tee teing Ju'deeaing boontuarima, Daari Meekunge minkuvui otoina' aa'puma, “Teing ma'nari-koo boontuarimaing, Kumponing-koo deea'.” (Boto 32:17) Ee'noko piamoa' ma'nari ninka pisi'deerii'naang.

Enang tee teke Antioko'ke dootuu'nupoong-koo nii'ning nakaronuka ee'noko nau-antanuka otoroko'nung, aa'noko Banabasi, Simioni' nii'noo' Mutaanu' tampaako', Lusias Sairini-nung, Maneien, tee ovo'ma' Eeroti' ninka nari' panka'paretu'nung, ee'noko Soolo.
Ee'namurii'koo Kumponinge iira basi-antavumaung teing-koo bakaang kara siompaavaing-koo. Taaraveriauka' nii'ninge nii'na' nauraariko kara menaankavoroma.
Bake-antaveriai, ai' teinge tee akatekang karika'daantu naro'ka orari-antavaarimaung kapoo' makosi deeaing nau-antavaarima mooni' tamung barang-koo makotua'na'.
Jiisuu'ke tero noru'uu' tee naning kare-nupoong-koo sivuainung. Tee'koo ee'na'koo aa'puu', “Dii' ookara kiiroraa'dariri otoria'.”
“Masika' naurampimang, naning tee karanaange tumparavarura sipisipi' biikaang-koo parang-koo nii'noo'ke tumparapeu'nung tee ee'nara naning bakisipung, tatusi' bauko.
Koonto'navung sipaara pooariru'ning. Tee nakaronara Baalamu, Beeoo bauring, bakanavung siompaamaing, mooni' nka-koo piavora oraka' nkoaru'nung.

Teketa tenang aa'nou' Ju'nupoong ee'noko teing Ju'deeaing nari', biikaning ovontung ninka, tenaanka oraka' nkoaarema kapange too'paarema dupisi'koo mau'aareko taaravareta koo'aretu' nii'ning osinairu-koo aa'ning-koo Liisira' ee'noko Deebi, Laikonia'nameensi'kooning osi pankeng-koo.

Aung aa' beemu'pina' Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Saimoni', Jooni bauring, dake ee ning piaamemang?” Piita oraka' dee'ou' Jiisuu'ke beemu'pie niania' nia'uio', aa'puma, “Dake ee ning piaamemang?” Ee'noko Jiisuu' aa'puu', “Ovoring, da' ookara kapoo' noru'ei otong. Dake ning noru'mei o'nong da' ninge piaaransi o'nong.” Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Nkaning sipisipi'nanka tanataveriaing.

Kapoo' kiiroraa' deeaung temono-koo tumparavauka'nunge, napo' maimaia' nkonuka ee'noko kara daang minkunuka tung-anta-koo makotua' te'. Teka teing naing nantoong temono-koo tumpariaining tee Kampia bakaang buuku domantoo'koo domampariaining makosina' biikaang miring daarinii'nuka.

Teni manikuma ovorinaang masikani taa'ni'antavari otou' baarong urumpumainge ee'noko iiraampumaing kurumpari. Ee'noko napo' aa'ninge baunii': biiri kooro-koong ee'noko duku' moo' aa'na' pankeng-kooning. Ee'noko birenge kaapu kooro-koo nkonii' kompui otoko', kuung kapoo'ke maarekusi'nankai maanto' teni auning-koonankai.
Ee'noko ookara-koo daua piaa oto'deruriai, dii' ookara naro'ka dupeari narung onou deeng-antaruriaina'.
Jiisuu'ke maku'urema aa'puretu', “Tee bateinang enang tavo'aring Kumponinge meenasi pankaing amuainang ning tee Naning-naumpo' Paning-etaing.
Nampeesi orari-koo poteverikoo'. Arekee', daka nampeesi orarieaunge? Kumponing tositosinanka maremaarenanka tamperikoo'. Arekee', maareroa' teing-koo pakuraramaung ee?
Teka teie botoi tee orokomuio' orara aarumoi doona oovura tee boto-koo ning karaa'antamuko', nka orara aarumo tee baka boto otoaruko dei purimparavarupeu'.
Mmari'antarampaing nantoonge aa'ninge turantaako dakanavitu Ju'nupoonge ee'noko Ju'deeainge, tevitu ee'navitu da' botoramaatomanoo'navitu.

Ai' nii' Karistoo' bakaning teing tero o'noriko'na' sipampiru'ning aa'ning-eta: kanu'marima taarapiikamariko' ako'ke nii'ning ninka poo-antamaariko, amutemurii' karakaraa'koo bi'mariri doturotu besi'ampima. Niikaang batei tamung kera'pampiko' aa'ning-koo: oraka' noru' ee'noko mamairo, nantoonge munte'maariko napo' nii'ka munte'meerima.

Kumponinge oomuresio', Jiisuu' Karistoo' naankai ee'noko koosinunanka miru'nii'nankai ninge da' koonto' nauramaang: Pankaing tuumpiaamana' minkunaa tampa' tasi'pea' deeko' da'deng maku'eauka', ee'noko oraka'nko da'marang-aapea daka'peauka'.
Tee'koo tee' nari' danto piikuura-nupoong otorimaatoaing ee' noru'erima, “Moo' pankaing maamuari otong nii'koo.”
Kapoo' pankaing masikung botovotonaa'ke nkovuaing ee' oro': Kake'iiari nkovuaing tee kapoo'nanka bakaang pankainge bampuining nko-koo teie.
Bera Piita tee teke Joopa'ke mmau' doong otou'nung nii'nara Saimoni' bakanava'koo, kau' karenaumo-koong dopa' takera'uma baavevuko'nung bakanava-koo.
Ai' dii'ke ee noru'eria' dii' teing Kumponing bakanava dootuu'nava pankava ee'noko Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang Meekung dii'koo otomaung?
Tee'koo, mmaikori', nii' teing koonto' avoro'keta unaamorining enang, Jiisuu' bakaang erenge eentamarima kuunavaro-koo Meepo'keta Aa'na' Meepo' tung-koo makotumpirining.
Teketa Jiisuu'ke napo' aa'puru', “Ning nanampaing ee'noko nananko dii'ke ning besi'meriaing, ee'noko dii' dooriaing diikaning oreng aarumo ninka. Dii' naniriarupeu' ning nanamatomanoo'.”

Dii' teing piaarurira Kumponinge bakaning meekupoong deentariri otorii'naang miru'durining. Tee'koo aing aa'ning aarumo kuruntariri otoriaing: domang-eta piaa bauko, tampa'nko, boonko oto', dooroonto', ee'noko mii'kui oto'.

Baa tee naning nkaang pakupakunung deemparaa'naang piavora deeko' ning siomuaing. Tee'koo nkaning pakupaku-nupoong ni'ninka o'noriaing ning o'noainoo'. Mma'ke daangampuainge naning tee ning-koo pakunara deemparavaing.”
Baurukaa' bautaranuka tampa' toosi-antavuri otomaung, toire' tampa' tarevuriko tampa' meumpaamaung, tampa' noru'ai ookara kapoo'koo.
Tasi'peri? Makosi, tampara aarumo nko-koo domang kuaa'antareerima otoriaing, ee'noko puring-antareerima tee'pina' nkorarimatomana'.
Aung tee naunau dii'ke tutuntoma-ita taaraveru'nung, nii' naruna' naruna' piaameerimatoaing.
Ninge tee ee' noru'amaang: Nii' enang pore' kune'ampimaung-koo o'noritaa' makosi nampeesimaria' tamung o'noripeu'nung-koo tampa'.
Enang tee naning narung otoko' miring Nikodemasi. Tee Ju'nupoong-koong pankaing, Boto Keperuu'navitu-koong˜.

Ee'noko napo' teni Reeapi, orani, tee' nari'ke, nko-nko ninka nari' masika'antavui tenaanka Kumponing bakanaanka botovotonaa'ka bokuvureta napo' beekaning kare-nupoong-koo koono-antavuresi mo'minge sivuresio' Kumponinge koonto'nani tampuu'.
Nka tee maniku' pareaama otoroitaa' domampariaing aa'noi deeko': Kumponing-koo masika'antavariri, nantoong piaavaari, ee'noko meeka'pariri ampirinumparia'.

Tee ee'nara Kumponing aing nantoong Isireeli-nupoong biikaange niikakatauro bakaning miru'urira biurukaa' naro'ka pankaing-antavuru' tenang teke Iisipi'ke damisimainku otoroko'nang, ee'noko bakaang iri' oro'antavui teketa' tonta'uru'.
Ee'noko teie Kumponinge ookara biikaang domang noru'ui otoinge Ju'deeaing onkeonke'urimana' sira'paru'nung Tanuaang Meekung avurima tee' nari' nii' amuru'na'.

Tee ee'pina', Kumponing bakaang boto-koo nampeesi orarieauka'naare nanaare minkuvua', napo' naning tavema dupisi'eauka'naare minkuvuu'. Teka dake teing-koo aa'nopeu' nampeesi orariea' naning tavema dupisi'epeu', tee'koo da' tee boto toto' deentaring.
Domaang oparavauka'nung avoromaung, ee'noko teing booroauka'nunge, ee'noko naninge tatusi'uriauka'nunge nkaang bireng-eta.

Tee' nari' nkorariko tenang Kumponinge mooa-po'nunge Sietani' namu'ke dii'koo kau'koo boonavete-koo mme'uai. Tee biraanke niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang dii' ninka nari' otomatoaing. Ee', masikung.
Temurii' nantoong-eta tonta'dari otoaing.
Tee' nari', nii' tee'ke, bane mmau'ke, narung mono nko-antavamping naro'ka Karistoo'koong. Teka naruna' naruna' nii' tee tankaamariri pakumeerimaung.

Tee-koo kapoo'koo nauansing-koo aroo'daravaing makosi da' Taitas. Da' tee teing-koo aing-koo kapoo'koo derarari otoo'naang piamomaang, dakaning nantoong Kumponing masika'antavaamaing kake'iiariri otoroo'naang tampara nko-nko-koo. Aing teing kapoo' boo'anta, nantoong ookara paku-antaning.

Tee' meumpuio' tee Daari Meekung-koong kara dupearu' aa'pumaung, “Eebaraami'ke Kumponing masika'antavuio' Kumponinge naning koonto' tampuu'.” (Pupu' 15:6) Ee'noko tee Kumponing bakaang navumai tampari otomaung.

Ee mmaikori', niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' tee ee'nara urikamu'keta Kumponinge Pako'pari'nii' domamurira taremuriainoo'koong, tee daurarong˜ meenasi okora'. Tee' masika'antaveri otori nantoong daunaro' oovererima siivenke'ereria' otoriaing.

Kara orara biikaang karang-eta tavo'aramaung davoru-koong ka'mi' kuvi dako'doma-eta tavo'aramana'. Biikaang meneng tositosi-nko. Biikaang kara boru'ketaing dopa-pina' beruu'keta tavo'arakoo'. (Kena 5:9; 104:3)
Tee' nari' bii'unkaampie bii'ankaampi piaavaarimatoaing, tee' biikaang mono bii'ka piaavarimana' nari'. Baa tee naning ba'aang piaavumaung tee baka piaavaramaung teni piaavui.
Tee-koong miru'noo' ee' oro': Teing Isireeli-nupoong deeainge koonto'nuka deemparii'naang paaravariaruko'ninge miring koonto'nuka tampuriainavung pe'numpaara tampa' okovorou' masika'anta ninka.

Biikaang nko-nko masika'antavaamaing, meneng paakanuka deea', purinto'naru'koo baru' kei'oroaing, oko'okonuka deeaing, ee'noko tee masikung kara Kumponinge sira'memuru'nung masika'antavaamaing domang kiiroraa'oroi.

Teinge botovotonaa'nukai okovoromaing Karistoo' masika'antavaamaing deeko' ee' noru'aavauka': “Nii'ke kara dimpa'evorompimatoai, ai' nii' tamung naro'ka namaia'.” Tee' noru'aavauka', teka teing mintoompevurimaing Karistoo' masika'antavaamaing, Kumponinge piaavurimaing deempariko bakei tampa' masika' biikaang kara siompaavaing. Aing ee' oro' nau-antaveriaing iri'narumperi.
Kinkompuio' nii'ninge masika'antavaava' tee kara. Enang arekee', teinge masika'antavai meumpaavaruko Kumponinge koonto' masika' bampuu'na' nkovuai? Ai' tee' napo' teing-pina' nari' meuntepa'aravai?
Teketa narunge piatooronuka-koonge daanko'ke Jiisuu' too'puu' mato'nang-koo, ee'noko namu'ke ereng ntong ninka dakoaru'.
Nkaang boto aung, ‘Dii'ka pakureeri piaareeriaing tee' ninge piaarampimana'.’

Diikaang mono-koo nii'nairu taura'periauka' orara aarumo bakaang pia-siong deemparama orara nko-koo, teka dii'ka arariaing Kumponing-koo teing-pina' nantoong boo'keta domang-antanii'nuka-pina', ee'noko dii'koo ookanairu Kumponing bakanairu deeng-antaveri otoriai aarumo koonto' siong-koo.
Teka nii' teing dama'du dunka'pariko orari-antavuriaining deea', ai' nii' teing kake'iimariri masika'antamariko tanuaange domang-antamurining.

Tenang tumpariko ookara Isireeli-nupoong moo'ariainge, Daari Meekunge ee' naumuru'na', “Saioni-namono-ita tee Domang-anta tavo'aravaing ee'noko teie toro-antavuriaing Jeekopi'daang biikaang oraka' nko-ita.
Teing ee'ning tavau'ning tee Ovoring Jiisuu' ee'noko nakaronuka˜, ee'noko nii' bata'maaru'.

Ai' tee aung kara masikung tutung tampa' nkavampirai'nange napo' maroita sipampira oraka' nkomarima o'noriaing deeko' Jiisuu' bakaang boontunang nari' sipampiainge, ee'noko tee'koo tee nii'nung boontunang napo' oraka'nko tonta'memuripeu'nung otoa'.
Ee'noko domamurira Karistoo' ninka nari' napo' daa'muru' nari' tare-nupoong o'norii'naang tee ninka paninaumariri.
Tee'koo enang bakerariaing tosi minku-eta. Masikung narung minkuerimatoaing tapo'deeri otorimaing ninka, ai' dii' teing narung mono-koo manta'deeri otong.
Oki'noo' aroo' o'noria', bane batei oki'namu'koo. Tee kara koonto' doorenang tampara-koong orari-anta-koo taura'parampia' dii' noru'darampima.
Tee'koo tee naning avuavu' oovunara menenge kara-koong oto'evuing eentavaravaing napo' tee kara bere'koong iri' nka-koo.
Tenang ee'nang tee Soolo domange sipuko'nang teing Ovoring bakanariong tavu'koo.
Ning enang da'anko momaang. Ee'noko ning kansi'koo o'noitaa' aing kapoo'ning minkuamaang teing nkaang doturotu okovurii'naang, biikaning tunsi teie doturotue maanto'urii'naang.
Teka baru'noo' doturariaing dii'ke Karistoo' siomperima arikung kune'uu'na' nari', ee' noru'erima tee' nkomarimaung-koo dotumariaing tenang tee bakaang meenasi oro'paravainang.
Bera tee-koo ookama kau' karenaumonanka ooarantu', nii'ning iirankesi'nanka, ee'noko boru'nanka ee'noko barennanka auvi'au-kooning.
Teka enang aing aarumo ee' oro' dii'keta tonta'eriai: iira, turang, oraka' mantong, poore' ee'noko deu'.
Tering tering kaandesi tua'urema baavevureko' moo'aama barenanka kanisiiaako'. Ee'noko Paula' tering-pina' nari' nko-nko nkovuko'nung deemparako kaandesi tua' tering ninka nari' pakuvurema otorou'.
Tee'koo taura'dariauka' orara aarumoi kuung deeng-anta-koo diikaang mono. Teie orara aarumoi baranturi'neenga mono bakaang karakaraa'ke.
Enang tee temurii' nantoong nii'ke botorarampima tautaurarampimaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge mintoontarii'naang dooroontariri. Diikaang iri'keta' taamaniriaing.
“Ee'noko temaia' oko'bosi-namaia' Josepa'koo mamairoarira baaveau' tee Iisipi'aape, teka Kumponing tee tee ninka nari' otoko'.

Ee'noko narung teing-koong miring Akabas deto donkonura peera pankaing ookutunung kansi'koo dama'ke tavo'aravaing sira'puu' Tanuaang Meekunge nauvuio'. Tee aung tee tavo'aru'nung dama'ke tenang ovo'ma' miring Kalaudias otoko'nang.
Ee'noko tenang tee' minkuvura tee doonko kinkinura teing ninka nari' kunsiariru'.
Ee'noko teinge nantoong Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaninge tee biikaang mono-aapena' noru' aa'barata'koo taakavau' teing bakaning karakaraa'nanka domange etuvurimaing ninka.
Ee mmaikori', ni'ninka nari' Jiisuu'koo baitorarimaing, doturoturariri otorimaatoaing tenang kapoo' avutevu' parapaarananka kune'erima.
Nii'koo baata aa'parimaing, “Nii' tee ninka miirunanka,” nka mutaanang-koo otoroitaa' teing teing tosiarimaing ee'noko kapoo' masikung narung siona' otoroa'.

Paasia'na', Miidia'na', Iilama'na', Mesopotemia'na', Judia'na', Kapadosia'na', Poontusina', ee'noko Eesiana', Pirisia'na', Pampilia'na', Iisipi'na', ee'noko Liibia'na' te' Sairini-aapenoo'. Ee'noko Rooma'na' karompimaing damisimainku o'noring ookamurii'ka Ju'nupoong ee'noko nii' dama' Ju'nuka.

Tee' kunsimarekoo' dii'ke aa'noo'naang: tampa' Ovoring-koo makosina' otoriai ookamentai tee dotu-antaveriaina', sinang tampara nkaveriai tee-koo ookara nko-nko tampara-koo, ee'noko Kumponing aa'na' punkaamperi˜ noru'eriai.

Timoti, da' nnuring-pina' noru'dansi manki' aronsing kara nauransina' botoverii'naang. Tero Tanuaang Meekunge karantavurimainge˜ minkurau'na' nkovema bakaang tavutavu' tampara orara aarumo-aape nkoveai.
Teketa napo' dama'ke paning-koo nantoong mmau'koong aurong pankava'arima bokiaama kareaako taaravantu' aa'paako, “Euravampima Kumponing daangampampiai tee Domang-anta meenasi-po'nung, iirakuta.
Nii'nang tee dii' doori otoriko' boto-toto' ee'noko oraka'nko nkoverima. Tee' nkoverima kansi'kooning biikaang aarumo narung siomperiko'.

Dii' tuaantariauka' ookarenta-ita, aa'noko Ovoring bakanareng-eta ee'noko ma'nari biikanareng-eta. Tee' nari' napo' ookavaako'ka-ita nari' taamaniriauka', aa'noko Ovoring bakanavaako'keta ee'noko napo' ma'nari biikanavaako'keta. Tee' makosina' deea'.
Kaukauro-nko, ee'noko noru' ku'mi' siong, nii'noo' makosi deea'na' karaa' bakei dii'koo otoauka'nung; minkueria' otoai Kumponinge meeka'antanisinuka deentariri.

Baa naning Karistoo'koo kuunge domang kiiroraa'ari otoi tee ookara kapoo' teie makosina' nko-koo noru'umaing teing makosining. Teka baa-koo naning domang orara-koo, masika'anta otoaung-koo, tee kansi'koo kapoo' otoa' bakaang domang kiiroraa'antavupeu'nung, bane arekee' oro' toomo siompuma. Kumponinge tee bakaang domang ee'noko noru' naro'ka oraka' nari' oovui otoo'naang.

Ee'noko teing ookara tee taaravau'ning ta'ninaama aa'pau', “Aung ee tee naning Jerusalema'ke teing aung Jiisuu' miring tampaama baitoaamaing tooreerevurimaung deea'? Ee'noko tee' nari' napo' temurii' aarumo nko-koo a' poi dai'urima piristi'nanka biikaang ovontung-anko tavo'koo.”

Teka masika'pari otoina'koo ee' otong, Kumponinge dama'nung kara naroong-anta bakei tampa' nkovuu' maraka-anta aa'na' tampenge dai'ura temu'nung boto ee'noko bakaning maraka-anta puru'uio', ee'noko Karistoo' tee kara naroong-anta-koong meu'nung deemparitaa' bakaang nko-nko paku-koong tee' nari' dau basinoo' aa'na' tampara temu'ning piristi' pankenanka kansi'kooning biikaang nko-nko puru'uitaa'.
Ai' domamari o'noi Karistoo' tee ning nkaang domaang, ee'noko moomira deeko' tee dupeari otoko kompampaing.
Ninge masika' tasi'pansi o'nong teie Kumponinge tee nko-nko tampara dii'koo tutung-antavuu'nunge be'nu'antavui otoaing tee, bera te'mung tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' toroaravaina'mung-koo basi.

Ee'noko nii'ke tee noru'ampiri o'noring teie Kumponing Bauringe tee tero porai'nange noru' amuru', nii'ke tee Kumponing Masikung tasi'pampii'naang ee'noko nii' teing enang tee-koo masikung-koo kuung o'norimaung Bauring-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung o'nori, tee aung tee ee'nara Masikung Kumponing, domaang oparavaung okora'.
Mataurariri mooa-koo otoriai ookara ninka, makosiri deeko'.
Napo' tee pinka'mariri sira'mariri o'noriaing tee-koo biraanke okomuriaing-koo, noru' paarimaria', ai' teie tee maraka-antamemuru'nung tee koonto' nkovuaing minkuvuu'na'.
“Tampara, otoriko. Tampara masikung, nkaang mooa koonto' masikung arompimaang. Avitoitoi noru'daria' ee'noko aroreriauka'.
Tee'koo ee' noru'ampiri ookara batei-koo aroo'mariri o'norimaung: Enang tee aung kansi' bakaang mono ninka o'nori Ovoring-eta taapo' o'noring.
Baa tee nkaang kara taaravuma masika'antavuaung ninge tuumpiampauka'nung. Ning mou'nung tuumpiaramparoo'naang, teka domang-antavarama'naang.

Ee'noko nii' tee-pina' Keini' nkomariauka' Sietani' bakaang naning-pina', tee baara'ma'nung dupisi'uu'nung. Aming-koo dupisi'uu' tee? Tee aa' bakaang nko-nko orara deempario', tee baara'ma'nung munte'uu' bakaang nko-nko tampara deemparako.
Ookara mui'nanka paa'ariru' ee'noko iu'nanka otoroaruu'.

Tee tee naning narung-eta baru' aa'na' pankara-ita nantoong karinga berempariru' mmau'noo' beento'nanka paning-kooning-pina', ee'noko napo' piisi'nanka pirung tapirue otoromaing-pina' deeru-paa'nanka, tee' nari' Kumponinge napo' maraka-antavuu'na'.
Tee Kumponing tee' nari' otomaung Ovoring, boo'paa', naninge oovuarupeu' ee'noko tee narung masikung. Deto basi-antavampiaing, nepu'ampiaing tee' nari' botu otoa'. Ee', tee' nari'.

Teke aa'na' bokuma aa'puu', “Kumponing-koo amaiaa'roriai ee'noko meenasie mee'na'oi oto' deeng-antaveriai, ai' batei teie nantoong bire'koong due'umaang. Ee'noko tee-koo dootuu'dariai aing aa'ning ookara nkovuru'nung-koo: paning ee'noko kansi', pirung ee'noko ntong oki'nareka'.”

Tenang ee'nang tee batei-koo Ju'nupoong Jiisuu' siompaako'navitu karinga deempariru', teing-koo nariong Kiriki'na' kareaako'ning ee'noko nariong Iiburu-na', ee'noko teing Kiriki'na' kareaako'ninge teing Iiburu-na' kareaako'ning minkuminkuaariko' aa'paama, “Nii'kooning maniku' naaroonku tampa' pakuaariarukoo' doong kante kapoo' tankaampaama.”
Ai' dii' teing tee'koo Kumponinge bokururu'ning. Karistoo' tee dii'koo baike kune'uu'nung dii' tee' nari' tee siomperi nkorarii'naang nau-antarurima.
Tenang dii' nii' ninka nari' o'noritaa' nii'ke tee tee' nari' napo' tautaurarampiru' ee'pina': Naning kakarua'oaing tee taamang-koo do'de'eriauka'.

Ee', Kumponinge nii' ookara kansi'nupoong aa'na' piaamurikotaa' tee Bauring narung masikung kirokai taura'puu'nung tee boo'paraa'naang nii' paku-koo; bera tee naning tee masika'antavuaing paa'aravauka'nung, teka domaang oparavaung oto'evuaing.
Teka tee' paaravaako teie ma'naang orarai temaia' maku'urima aa'puru', “Ninge Jiisuu' noru'ansi o'nong ee'noko Paula' noru'ansi o'nong, teka dii' baata?”

Teketa tee tee biiko dauraronanka ninka ookara kansi'nupoong ninka nari' ooarantu' ee'noko biikaning tavu'nupoong nari' naro'ariko kare naka'aava'naang tee ninka oosi-koo ba'nanui nanuko'nung ninka, ee'noko teing bakaning tavu'nupoong ninka.

Ee'noko danto aareri-koo A'damitiang biikanareng-koo koinampira tenkenampiru', Eesia-nameensi' kantevui siompuai-nareng-koo. Aristakas nii' ninka nari' meru', Tesalonaika'nara, Masedonia'nameensi'koong.

Teing kiimataroma otoroining domang dontong-anta-koo norunoru'ererimaatoai, dii' teing ninka nari' kiimatanava'koo otorining-pina' noru'darima. Ee'noko napo' teing nii'ninge oraka' nkoaarimaing norunoru'ererimaatoai, dii' teing ninka narung mono-kooning tasi'dariri.
Ee'noko aming kapoo'nanka dii'ke nkoveriaining, karai ee'noko nko-nkoi, Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo nkoverima Kumponing tee bauma-koo tampa' tamperimaatoaing Jiisuu'koo kuunge.
Aa'noaing tee naning dii' Kumponing bakaang kara nau-antarurimaung pakueri moo'eriainge.

Teka ameensi'koo navaro oko-antavua', oki'noo' aa'noo' muku'noo' otoa'. Teka tamung maraka-antavuu'nung dama'ke teing ninka ba'dompenku ninka doompeto dama'ke tavo'kaavaining ninka nari' kompaava'naang bane bauring mme' otoaruko.
Teie niikanamuiaang aavavurima oraka' nkovurima niikakatauro etuvuriko' tootoia oko dua'aariko booroo'naang.
Teketa tee enang nee'ke Piita naankai simaretai'nange kuvi dako'doma kua'maresi meretu';
Tee'koo ning paaramaramaung domang kiiroraa'mari o'noo'naang Kumponing-ankoi ee'noko nantoong-ankoi.

Napo' boo'a pirung-koong ta'da'parama koikoiri nkavuma avitoitoi sipuko oraka' oro'paramana' biikaang orara aarumo ninka tee' oro'nuka. Napo' teu-pina' beento'nu-pina' koonto'navunge nanuau-pina' oro'nuka tero miru'uru'ning tunumparava'noo'ke doong kante oto'koo.
Ai' nantoong-koo baremarava', napo' naninge nau-antamua', nka baka Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke sirapo'uu'nung ning-koo.
Tero tee, orara aarumoi dai'muritaa' Kumponing-nung boto toto'koo pia-antamuriko' ee'noko tee'koo kapoo' oraka' nkonanka mmau' nkoampiko', teing kapoo' nii' boo'anta-koo makosinanka.

Ee'noko ning bakaang kara-okomui-nka miru'muu'nung bakaang minkunaa daankiama' naang. (Ning tosimarava'. Masika' minkuamaang.) Ning bamuu'nung teing Ju'deeaing biikaang nau-anta deemaraa'naang teinge aung kara masikung masika'antavaava'naang.

Ookara teing bakaang boto siompaamatomaing teing tee-koo kuung otoromaing ee'noko tee teing-koo kuung otomaunge. Ee'noko nii'ke tee noru'ampiri otong tee nii'koo kuung otomaung teie Tanuaang Meekunge amuru'nunge noru'antamuriko.
Naning baka tanatavarama otoauka'. Ookara tee naruna' naruna' tanatameeriaing tampa' oto'koo.
Naroong-koo otorimaatoai. Beekareeria' otoai, teka navureeri otorimaatoai doonko otoromaing ninka. Kirokai-pina' noru'dariauka'.
Donta'dariri otorimaatoai aing aa'ning-eta', domang oraka' noru', iira, ioo', peusi', minkuminku ee'noko napo' too'de.
Ning tee Kumponinge baka botomuio' dootuu'nupoong biikaang kara-pare' deemaru'nung dii' paku-koo, tee Kumponing bakaang kara opansi sira'panko dii'ke noru'erii'naang.
Bakaang bore' ee'noko dapo aa'na' kakaara sipisipi'koong dapo-pina' ee'noko ka'mo'koo tu'betu'be-pina' oro'. Bakaang duta nta'pina' urung.

Kumponinge aing ookara kapoo' nkoarampimaing tee dii' paku-anta-koo miru'uu'ning ee' noru'uitaa': mmau' nantoonge tee biraanke nkavaama tee napo' teinge Kumponing daangampaavai, ee'noko Kumponinge meenasi nkavuai tee-koo.
Baa tee nkaang mono maa'uaing ee'noko nkaang ereng naivuaing, ning-koo otoaing ee'noko ning tee-koo o'noai.
Tenie aa'puu', “Ee', ee Ovoring, masika'antavamang da' tee Karistoo', Kumponing Bauring, tee Kumponinge teroita Pako'pari'nii' a' kansi'koo pora nii' domamuriaing-koo.”
Ee'noko teing bii'ka avariru' aa'noo'naang: kara okovuri nkanuka biikaang nau-anta taaravaama, naro'ke navuariri, taamang nari' tankaampeema kunsiarimatoo'naang.

Dake tee aarumo koonto' piaavemaung ee'noko aarumo boto-toto' munte'ekoo', tee'koo da' Kumponing dakaang Kumponinge duunie dotu-anta-koonge sisi'duu' pako'pari'duma da'maikori'koo dau basi otoo'naang.” (Kena 45:6,7)
Bera aa'nou' Jeemisi tee Jooni bataata, Eeroti' botoario' bainatue dupisi'au'. Ee'noko teing ovontung Ju'nupoong Jiisuu' turampaako'ninge tampa' noru'au';
Donta'dari otoaing temurii' Kumponing-nung deeaung naampa-ita. Teie tee nantoong barampuriaing tee-koo taung oovunavung-koo Kumponing-ankoita.
Tee naning ba'maiko' munte'umaung tee ee'nara dupisi'nko ee'noko tee dii'ke noru'eri otong teing nantoong dupisi' nkonuka teing ookara domaang oparavaung okovuria'.

Aung aa' tee, taamang bakemarirai'nange Jiisuu'ke Saimoni' Piita aa'puu', “Saimoni', Jooni bauring, dake ee ning piaamemang aing-koo dau basinoo'?” Teie maku'uma aa'puu', “Ee'. Dake noru'mei otong, ninge piaaramang.” Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke aa'puu', “Nkaning sipisipi'koong sie'nanka tanataveriaing.”
Nii'nung-koo Kumponinge kara matau-po'nung makosi-antavumaung Tanuaang Meekunge. Nii'nung-koo kara noru'po'nung avumaung teie narunge Tanuaange.
“Ee'noko kemu'kanamu' berou'nang-koo Josepa' baka sira'paru' batatakaampi-koo, ee'noko Josepa' baumaraang tenang Peero'ke noru'uru'.
Tee' Daari Meekunge aa'pumana', “Baa tee naning domampari oto'koo piavoi otoing doong tampeng oovuu'naang piavora, tee oraka' karoauka' ee'noko teie tee daang minkuvuauka'.

Enang tee tevitu ookutunavitu masika'anta-po'navitu domang nari' noru'arima nari' mantompariko'. Naninge ee' tampua': Kapoo' ning oto'memuining ninka nkaning, teka teing ookara kapoo' nari' oto'evoroko'.

Tee, ninge dii'koo danto tuu'antu' tee-pina' kapoo' tutuna'nung pankaing masikung tee kapoo' ninge nkavantu'nung. Aa'noko tee Karistoo' boo'paru' niikaang oraka' nkonanka-koo tee' Daari Meekung masika'paru'na'.

Babiloni' tee kiimatavaravaing aa'ning-koo: tee ereng Kumponing bakaning nakaro-nupoong-koong ee'noko teing nii'ning bakaning meekupoong-koong ee'noko napo' teing teroita kansi'koo tavaarima dupisi'aariko'ning-koong, teing biikaang ereng teka temono-koo Kumponinge oovuu'nung-koo.”

Ee'noko tenang teinge Ju'deeainge tee aung kara taaravaara teing dotuarira pankaing-antavau' tee Kumponing bakaang kara, ee'noko teing makosining Kumponinge tero miru'uru'ning domaang o'paa' nka-koo teinge masika'antavau'.
Teie aung karananka sira'puinge aa'pumaang, “Ee', ning da'deng dii'anko mee'naang.” Ee'noko maku'ama aa'pamaang, “Ee', tampara; tee' ee'na' poaing, Ovoring Jiisuu'.”

Ee'noko teing teing kapoo'nanka ninge naurampiko taaraverira noru'ke pinka'eru'ning ee'noko teing ning-koo ooverira barerariru'ning teing tee' nari' napo' dii'ke nko-koo paaraveriaining. Tee' nkoveriko tee Kumponing mooa-po'nung tee dii' ninka nari' otoaing.”
Karenung pina' noru'eriauka'nung tee, teka tautaueriaing tee-pina' dii'maiko'.

Dii' tarerariri otoriai, nantoong-etaing daang-koong matau ninka aavaraarima kanu'antaraari'neenga, aa'ning ninka toomo ee'noko norunoru'nanka kanto'puaing kansi'aapening, Karistoo' bakana' nauraaria'.
Tee moo' tee aung ee' oro': Kumponinge Jiisuu' Karistoo' karantavuko˜ a'dei' be'koo bokumuaing ning.

Tee baka nii'koo avaru'nung nii' boorimurira teing-eta orara aarumonanka-ita unaa-antamurii'naang ee'noko kiiroraa'antamurira bakaning nantoong meekupoong deemuriai tampa'nko narung-koo dompirompi'nuka.

“Masika' naurampimang, nantoong teing nkaang kara taaravaamaing, ee'noko teing masika'antavaamaing tee botomuu'nung domaang oparavauka'nung oto'evurimaing. Teing teing kiimatavuriauka'ning, tero boo'nameng-eta domaang-aape tankinaing-koo.

Teie koosinunge ni'ninka karompetu'nunge kapoo' donsi'pina' oro' kompui otoko' kooro-koo nkonii' paaranang-nko, tee temono osi pankaing paaranang-koong, teing aa'ning: tee parang ee'noko karanaananka.

Ai' teing teing biikaang kumponing-pina' noru' tee biikaang mono bakaang pia narung, kapoo'nanka maimaia'arimaing, ee'noko biikaang noru' kapoo'nanka kansi'kooning-koo otokoo'. Tee' nkoarima mosianung-aape otorong.
Ee'noko tee naning a'mung bere'arieenung makosi deea' dootuu'nupoong tare-koo. Baka daangamparara dua'ara'neenga, Sietani' kiimata-numpo' deempari dua'aru'na' baka daangamparakotaa'.

Ee mmaikori', tero tee ninge Jiisuu'ke nii' ookara nari' domamuru'na' daarirerompii'naang noru'anko', teka enang noru' paarimarara nii'nung kapoo'koo daarirerompimang dii' puring-antarampii'naang Kumponing bakaang kara nii'ninge pituaa'neeng-koo orokoverererii'naang, ai' naro'ka bakevui amuru'nung nii'ke tare-koo, ee'noko paari-koo makotua'.
Porora teing aa'na' iiravorou' taaravaara tenaankai Jiisuu' daankivurema nantoong boo'keta daa'ariaing minkuvureko.
Ai' temono-koo nko-nko orarananka aa'na' dau basinoo' i'numparako Kumponinge tasi'puring.

Ee'noko Jiisuu' napo' toroaru' Kana-namono-koo Kaaleli'nameng-koonoo', ntong uaini deeng-antavuu'noo'. Ee'noko tee daurarong bakanaving-koong narung pankaing te' otoko', bauring Kapaneume'namono-koo otoi siipavou'.
Iri' o'dariauka'. Ovoring meung-koo nta'pina' uruntariri otoriai Tanuaang Meekunge iri'antarurio'.
Dii'ke tee, bane ooveriaruko'nunge, nka pankaruntomperimaung tee. Napo' tee'ke enang ooveria' otoring tee, teka masika'antaveri otong ee'noko karange minku-paa'na' deto doturarima doturoturarimaung.
Ai' teie tee bakaang Tanuaang Meekung nii' tankaang-antamurio' nii'ke tasi'pampimaung nii' tee ninka nari' o'norimaung ee'noko tee nii'koo otokoo'.
Teke tee kokotonaro' te' otoko' uaini kaaveerii'ke maanto'naro'. Teinge kapoo' tee-koo uaini-koo boovong-antavaara napo' bana'koo dai'antavaara intampau' Jiisuu' karankanoo'.
Ai' Kumponinge tee nii' Sietani' bakaang muu' mutaanang-eta moo'muru'nung ee'noko teie Bauring aa'na' piaavumaung bakaang muu'aape kuung po'antamuru'.

Enang tee bakei koonto' naurampimang dii' mmaikori': Oorariri otoriaing teing-koo dii' toto'anta-koo ee'noko pore'anta-koo piavoroi otoroining-koo tee kara tero taaraveru'nung bei'bei'aama. Donta'dariri otoriai teing-eta.
Dakaang avuavu' nantoong pakupaku-koong deeko' makosi, aroo'ei nkoveaing. Da' nau-anta deeko' tee avuavu' kompei kake'ii-antaveri naueriainge.
“Ee'noko tenang doong basiaravainang ning kapoo'koo nia'meriauka'nung. Masikung naurampimang, dii' nkaning barevare-nupoong deentariko Mma'ke ookara kapoo' aruriaing nia'eriaining.

Teing kapananka pankainanka temono-koong parang-koo e'maniananka neranii'nanka teinge kapanankai biikaang moo' aa'na' pankaing-kooning pipi'daariomainge. Tutuna'nare' kapang e'maniang jasipa'ke neranii'nare'. Kenaanka-nare' saapaia'ke panimpanimpumaunge neranii'nare'. Beenaumo-nare' aaket kakaara amutemurii'nankai pitunii'ke neranii'nare'. Ee'noko karenaumo-nare' eemaroli kapikapia'ke neranii'nare'.
Tee'koo tee naning aarumo koonto' noru'ui, teka nkovua' otong, tee tee oraka' nkoaramang.

Teketa napo' auronge ba'nava'nani'doma-ita aa'puu', “Tee niikaang Kumponing daangamperiai, dii'ke bakaning botovotonaa'nukai, dii'ke ee'ninge tee-koo amaiaa'dorimainge, ookaviturai aa'noko oki'nareka'nankai ee'noko pankenankai.”
Enang nempampiri nii' teing baimarima o'noring tee mono Kumponing-etaing amurii'naang piamorima,
Nii'nung naning ninka mintarama doturarama daangantaravauka', teka tutung norunoru'daravaing dakaang nko-nko-koo, tampa' otoing deeko' ee'na'koo doturoturaravai makosi.

Nii'nung naninge ee' noru'ui dei: nani manikuma nampeesi-koo kariviri'ai piokang napu'nisi tamung panka'koo makosi deea' nampeesiarava', ee'noko teie nari-antavuaing nampeesi-koo pakuvuitaa' tee, tee makosi, piavoaina' nkovuaing. Teie tee oraka'nko nkovua' nampeesi-koo miru'uma teni.
Biikaning dootuu'navananka-ita bata'daariaing; ee', bakei, doong poaining-koo Kumponing dotu-anta tampaama dupisi'raariainge.

Teketa napo' kapoo' pankaing taa'ni'anta paning-koo ooantu' ˜kenaanka-taa koosinunankai tee'ning nari' napo' ˜kenaanka-taa arikananka kompaio'. Teing ee'ning asi'ning ee'noko teing arikananka ninka Kumponing bakaang iira nari' bakearavaing.
Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Ninge kapoo' oraka' minkuansing deeko' sira'peaing, nka ninge tampa' minkuanko aming-koo tanko'memaang?”

Napo' dake Sisikusie pakueresio' tenaanka manikumaara nari-antaveereai beekaang mankimanki'keta, ai' tenaanka tenaanka ni'ninka nari' manta'marimanaanka doorenang tampara bereng-anta-koo ee'noko tee Kelemeni nari' teing ninka nii'ning nari' mintoomarimaing, aa'ning niikaang miring tee tene'koo buukunane' domamariaining o'norinane'koo daariariri otong.

Ai' teing teinge ee'ninge dakaning meekupoong ee'noko teing nakaro-nupoong˜ dupisi'aario' biikaang ereng dakoaru'nung. Tee'koo teing nantoong oreng tee ereng nai-antaveriko biikaang moo' koonto' makosina' nkavaavaing.”
Bakei makosi deea'! Ai' nii' teing Jiisuu'koo kuunge moompirining deemariritaa' orara nko-koo piamoria', ai' arekee' napo' toromarii'naang?
Teka tee biiko tero otoko'nung, ee'noko enang otoa' aa'nung tee ˜beenaumo-taa-nung daurarong˜ deemparavaing. Teka teenoo' tee teing-koong narung. Nka tee teie, napo' tee' kera'paravainge.

Teka teie Daari Meekunge arekee' minkuvumaung? “Bata'eaing teni dai'nisinani ee'noko tee bauring, ai' tee dai'nisinani bauring tee barenku okovuauka'nung tee ninka teni dai'aravai bauring ninka nari'.” (Pupu' 21:10)

Teka teing nantoong kavo mmau' oto'evoroo'naang piavoromaing paara-anta meu'paako baanka'ke taavi'urimaung. Kanu'arima amutemurii' baike-antananka piavoromaung nantoong orari-anta-koo ee'noko kera'anta-koo basi-antavaarimaing.

Ee'noko tee biiko-kooninge kaintai kivorai oovemaatomainge tee teni auning-koo baka avaramai munte'aavaing. Ee'noko napo' teinge tee teni oraka' nkoaavaing bera simpenoi' deeng-antavaara sipaavai. Ee'noko bio' teni-koong tee maa'aama kato nta'koo tai-antavaavaing.
Teka naninge Kumponing domange dai'ui dei Kumponinge tee bakaang naning tasi'pui noru'umaung.

Enang arekee', nii' ee Ju'nupoong Ju'deeaing-koo deu basinuka? Bakei koonto' makotua'. Ninge tee, tero naurampiring nii' Ju'nupoong ee'noko Ju'deeaing ookara nari' o'noring oraka'nkoi naro'ka kuung deemuri otong.
Tenang ee'nang teinge boromaka' kampianu paaravaitaa' ta'nampau'nang, ee'noko ako' boontunampariko' teu-koo, dotuarima biikaang nko-nko birenge nkoau'nung-koo.

Teka teing nantoong beenaumo doovaange dupisi'uriaruu'ning teing tee' nari' bere'ariaruu' teing-eta biikaning oraka' nkonanka-ita, aa'noko ma'nari dovang-koo boontu, ee'noko daang-koong kumponinanka bii'ka ta'nampau'ning-koo dootuu' nko aa'ning-koo: kooro, siliva', boronsi˜, kapang, ee'noko koi'; teing ee'ning kapoo' oo noru'aava', taarakaavarupeu', nanu'koo makosiaava'.

Tee'koo nii'ke Kumponing-koo amorompiri nantoong pia-antavarampimaung tee-koo aroo'arii'naang. Nii' kuung o'norimana' Kumponinge koonto' noru'ui otong, ee'noko bakei tampa' dii'ke tee' nari' tasi'mereripeu' diikaang domang pankaruntoonge.

Nii' ookara tee'ke tero niikaang orara aarumo-koo amarima karaa' dovange boo'koo niikaang mono ee'noko onou piavoko'na' nari' siompampiko'ning. Tee tee nii' domang oraka' o'norikotaa' Kumponing-nung kiimata kompampiaining akoing-pina' nari'.
Teie Piitai tee aa'na' napo' siingoravurima tee' pinauvuritaa' daankivuru' ee' minkuvuma, “Domaang moo'dariai dii' teieta kiimata-ita aing emu'navarang koonto' deeainge nkavaavaing-eta.”
Mono bakaang pia siomperiaing deeko' tee dii' dooriaing. Teka Tanuaang Meekung bakaang pia siomperima mono-koong aarumo toto'peri domantariaing.
Nii'noo'ke Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otong, “Naning tee masika'antavuaing tee Kumponinge sirakura' oko-antavuaing tee biraanke.” (Aisaia' 28:16)
Tutung tee nkaang Kumponing-koo tampa' tang minkuama'naang dii' tee-koo baitorarimaung-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke pakumurio'. Ookara kansi'ke taaravaamaung.
Nii'maikorori' Kumponinge piaarurimaing, nii'ke noru'ampiri otong Kumponinge dii' miru'duru' bakaning deentarii'naang.
Ookara-koo daua naruna' naruna' diikaang domang-eta tampa' piaareeri otorimaatoai, ai' nii'ke nantoong piaavarampima deeko' biikaang oraka' nkonanka mmau' daka'pampipeu'.

Teketa tee nii' Itali-aape aarerie be'koo tamaaru' Paula' ee'noko nii'ning kiimata-nupoong nari'. Ee'noko tee naning miring Julias teing tanata-koo botoau', tee Siisa' bakaning mau'moni'navitu-koo narung daaku' piatooronuka tarenara.

Kena-koo Moosesi, tee Kumponing-nung botovotonaa', ee'noko tee Kampia beekaning kenavaako', ee' kena: “Dakaang nko-nko tee pankaing ta'nimpaarii'. Da' tee bakei dau basina' aa'na' purinto'po'nung Ovoring Kumponing, Ookara-koo nkovemaing-koo tee masika' koonto'na' oro'daramaung. Da' avatevarang-koong daurarong˜.
Teka dii' aa'na' peera-antarariaing tee-koo kara-koo pituaravaung-koo nerakau'nuka noonoo'koo narung-koo peeravoromana', tee dii' panka'antaruriaing diikaang nerakung domaang-koo makosina'.

Teketa napo' narung aurong paning-eta karoko taaravantu', aa'puko, “Aung kara daarieai, ‘Enang-eta deto tee teing boo'nuka Ovoring bakaning otoroitaa' boo'pariru'ning teing biraankeariaining.’ ” Ee'noko Tanuaang Meekunge maku'uma aa'pumaung, “Ee', bakei masikung. Uaavoroaina' teing-eta biikaning iri'o'nanka. Ookarai aarumoi tampenge nkoau'ninge tee teing meena'pariri otoroaing.”

Tee dootuu'koong aarumo kiiroraa' masikung ee'noko pituaravaung Niuma Kumponing-koo uro'kanoo'ke tee aung: Naning maantuaara' ee'noko teing naaroonku beero'urima pakuvurimatoai ee'noko naning baka tanatavari otoai kansi' bakaang aarumo orari-antavu'neeng-koo.
Ee'noko ninge tee' naurampimang naninge nii'nunge kara menaankai kanu'antarurira tosiruri'neeng-koo.

Teketa napo' auronanka taaravantu' ookara kapoo' domantoia-ita aa'noko paning-kooning, kansi'kooning, kansi'ka kuunge otoromaing ee'noko pirung-kooning. Teing ookara tenairu-koo otoromainge kenavarima aa'paako', “Biraanke ee'noko biiving napo' meenasi ee'noko tee purinto' tee tee-koo Daurarong deempari ba'nanui otomaung-koo otoi otoaing ookara batei-koo, ee'noko napo' tee-koo Kampia-koo otoainge.”
Teketa napo' kenaanka-nung koosinunge bakanareng tuuviri puumpuu', ee'noko kapoo' iu' pankaing-pina' oro' nta'ke taivuko pirung-koo dua'aru'. Ee'noko pirung-koo beeru'pi naru' ereng narung deemparu'.

Teketa osi pankamono-ita dama'du baransi'aara teka kapange too'pau' tee. Ee'noko teinge bakaang kara oraka' masika' taaravau'ninge biikaang mononopa'nanka kiru'arira narung nemaka-koo kau'kanoo' miring Soolo-koo sipau' kapange tampa' too'paava'naang tee.
Napo' nii'noo'ke Daari Meekung-koo aa'pui otong, “Daangamperiaing Ovoring dii'ke Ju'deeainge. Ookarai daangamperiaing tee.” (Kena 117:1)
Otoa'. Tee ootukunung kapoo'nanka nkonung, tarenara ee'noko miru'anta. Bakaang meenasi tee' nari' otomatoaing. Ee', ee'na'.
Teketa tee dauna'mung Joonie Jiisuu' oovuu' poko, ee'noko aa'puru', “Ooveriko, aunkapeto tee ee'nara Kumponing Bakaang Sipisipi'koong Kampia aarumo orara tonta'uaing ookara kansi'nupoong-koo.

Ee'noko tenie oranie Reeapi'ke tee', masika'antavura booaruu' teing ninka bakanariong Jerikoo'nupoong ninka taarapiikanuka ninka nari', teni domang-anta piavora tenaanka tapoka nkora Isireeli-koonaanka onkeonke'ureta pakuvuretu'noo'koo.
Bakisipunanka poromaung bakiaa'aarii'naang, tavaarii'naang, kera'paarii'naang. Ee'noko ning mou'nung domaang oto'evurii'naang, domaang tampa' otoi-oto'ke maanto'nisi.
Teka nii' niikanoo' osi te' paning. Ee'noko nii' teing tee niikaang Domang-anta tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' teketa poaing domange etuvuko nempampiri o'norining.
Tee'koo onkeonke'deerimaatoaing Karistoo'ke dii' tero onkeonke'duru'na', Kumponing meena'poaina'.

Bokuerira teing ninka nari' nkorariai kiiroraa'antararima ee'noko tee boontunang-koong kau' karenaumo dake naro'ka moo'evuriai. Tee' pakueriko dapo apuka'pariri napu'arima taa'ni'antavariai tee biikaang maraka-anta tee dupeaing. Ee'noko tee' nkorarako ookarai da' noru'daavaing kapoo' da'koo minkuaamaung tee masikung deea', teka dake daka-koo siompei otong tee boto Moosesi-nung.

Ee'noko napo' tee' nari' biuma teinge nantoong dopa' toto'paririninge. Nka tamung boturopa toto'paririning deea', nka teing naing Kumponinge koonto'nuka tampuru'ning Eebaraami'pina' Kumponinge bampuru'na' masika'antavaako, tero dopa' toto' nkavua' masika'antavuko'na'.
Ee'noko tee' minkuaara siikiitaakii' nkoaako Mataias miring tavo'kuu'. Ee'noko teketa tee tee teing ninka nanai'keta narung kara okovuri nkanuka ninka nari' deeruau'.
“Biraankeariaining teing biikaang boto-toto' tonta'evuriaining ee'noko teing biikaang oraka'nko tamung doonko daka'pevuriaining.

Tenaanka ee'naanka temu' Daari Meekung-koo kevarira olive'ke miru'uretu'naanka, ee'noko napo' kenaanka daamu-ba'nange miru'uretu' teke Ovoring ookara kansi' tarevumaung-koo uro'kanoo'ke donkonuresi otoremanaanka.
Orarunsirarima birontarimatoai diikaang oraka' nkonanka tasi'perima. Teing-koo benkeng siperi maia'doriai. Doturotu siperima napo' mi'miinkirorimatoai.

Ee mmaiko', Kaiasi, naning oraka' nkoarako tee bakaang aarumo siong-koo paaraveauka', tampa' nkoarako deeko' siong-koo paaraveai. Baa tee naning kapoo' tampara nkovumaung tee tee naning Kumponing-etaing ee'noko baa tee naning orara aarumo nkovumaung tee Kumponing tasi'pua'.

Ee'noko tee dama'ke Kumponinge nauvuio' dopa' toto'paru' taa'ni'anta-koo. Teie taa'ni'antai aa'pumaung: Aung naning Kumponinge koonto' tampuu'nung teie masika'antavuko toto'paravaunge. Tee tee, Eebaraami' nantoonge biuma deemparu'nung dopa' toto'pariainge masika'antavaako Kumponinge koonto'nuka tampurimainge.
Davorue tee orara aarumo napo' nkovuarupeu'.
Niikaang moni'ke doong kante boo' kune'umaung tee' Jiisuu'koo nkoaru'na' nari' Jiisuu' bakaang iri' tampa' oro'paraa'naang niikaang mono-koo.
Nii'ning nantoong teing kapoo'nanka biikaning naing tanata-koo otoromaing, Karistoo' bakaning sipai.

Ee'noko napo' Seera'ke tee ninka masika'anta ninka iri' nkavuu' tooto' ke'de-koo poontoaraa'naang bane teni ee'nani pareaamanoo' divu'ke, ee'noko tenie tee maraka Kumponinge daamparavaunge avuu'nung-koo aroo'ari bauring tampa' paravuu'.
Tee botomuu'nung bakaang pia aung: teing amuu'ning tare-koo, nii'nung paa'aravaroo'naang, ee'noko ookara daa'arampaing doong asi'noo'na'mung.

Teka nii'koo tee narung masikung Kumponing otong, tee Niuma. Ee'nara-ita ookara kapoo'nanka tavo'aramaung, ee'noko nii' tee-koo o'norimaunge. Ee'noko tee tee narung Ovoring otong, Jiisuu' Karistoo'. Tee ee'nara ookara kapoo'nanka teie pomaung ee'noko nii' teie domamariri o'noring.

Teka tee Timoti toroarieeng nee'anko dii'ankoita. Ee'noko toroarara tampara minkunaa naumuresieeng diikaang baito-koo ee'noko diikaang piaa. Aa'muresieeng dii'ke nii' tampa' noru'mererima nee' napo' oo-koo aa'na' piarorimaung, tee' nari' nee' dii' oo-koo aa'na' piamoremana'.
Ee'noko tenang tee Tanatanara Pankaing oro'paravainang dii'ke moo' tee meenasi-po'nung paa'aravauka'nung nkaveriaing.
Enang tee, tee kara domang-anta-koong purinto' masika'antavampiri nii'ke tee aa'na' to'biiampiri daankiampimaung.

Teka aing tosi nkonuka kau' karenaumonanka-pina' oro'nuka, noru' papaaravari oto'nuka, matauropanuka, tamung doonko tavu'koo makosinanka-pina' oro'nuka. Noru'aava' poore' nkoaamaing. Biikaang dera'ke boo'antavuriko kera'pariaining.
Teie ata'oi'nanka-koo tara'oa', tamung tee' minkuvuu' tee baka bakisipung deemparama, teie mooni' sipaako'nara' bakura kompui bakiaa'uriko'noo'koo.

Tee'koo nii' bakaang piaa naumuriko nii'ke tasi'pampima aroo'ampimaung, ai' Kumponing tee piaa okora', ee'noko baa tee piaa-koo otomaung tee tee' nari' Kumponing-koo otomaung ee'noko Kumponing tee-koo otokoo'.

Tenang tee Sitiveni tavaara manki' avu'antavaario' Karistoo' bakanavitu-koo nii'ning avitoitoi mmariau' akovitu otoromanairue bera aa'ning-koo basiariru' Ponisia-nameensi', Saiparasi-namui' ee'noko Antioko'navuntu'. Nka Kumponing bakaang kara Ju'deeaing-koo sira'paava' bii'ka Ju'nupoong naing naueeko'.
Nka masika' a'noo' naning kapoo' avutevu' piavoaruko dei Kumponing-nung koonto' aarumo kompui tampara otooto' oovupeu'.

Ee'noko teie pakiai makosi-antavuio' teie biikoi Kumponing bakaning meekupoong ninka kare naka'ura puru'uru' teing. Ee'noko napo' teie pakiai makosi-antavuio' nantoong ookara muu' tarevuriko' aa'ning naro'ka: muu'nanka, nantoong ookara kansi'koo-nupoong, kara amutemurii', ee'noko ookara dopa' amutemurii'.

Moo' aming nkaveriaing kapoo' orara nkoveriko mura'daariko taura'dariaing deeko'? Teka kapoo' tampara nkoverima baike kune'erii'naang dooroontariri otoriaing deeko' Kumponinge biraankeruriaing tee-koo.
