Tee'koo Karistoo' tee meu'nung tee nerakung kara naroong-anta pinka'anta-koong, ee'noko tee temurii' naning deempario' nantoong teing Kumponinge miru'uru'ninge tee barenku maraka-antavuru'nung otooto' oparavauka'nung nkavaavaing, ai' tenang Karistoo' boo'paru'nang teie moo'uru'nung oraka' nkonanka-ita tutuna'nung kara naroong-anta siompai nkoariko'ning-eta.
Nka ee' noru'ampiauka', “Orara nkoampimatoaing Kumponing bakaang piaa pankainge piaamuriaina'.”
Napo' kara sikuri'ke si', kara kanu' ee'noko deu' makotua' dii'ke minku-koo. Tampa' tang narung dii'ke minku-koo makosi.

Teketa ooama oosinavoro' booruraa'navoro' ooantu'. Naning tevoro'koo dau ba'nanui otou'nung bakaang miring Boo'. Ee'noko dama'keta tutueue siompui nanuko'. Ee'noko iri' tenaanka avaaretu' nantoong kansi'nupoong karevituri-koo tankaampaareta teing-koo navitu dupisi'koo aa'ninge: bainatue dupisi'koo, peerai boo'koo, doovaninkainge siipai dupisi'koo ee'noko kau'karenaumo-nankai dupisi'aariai.

Kumponinge tee, tee biraanke nii'keta paa'aravaroo'naang piavora tee biraanke bauta' deeng-antavuu' nii'ke nka-koo masika'antavampima. Tee'koo Eebaraami' bakanarempo'kai ookenge kompaavaing tee barenku, teing tee boto siompaamaing naing deea', nka teing nii'ning napo' barenku masika'antavaamaing ninka nari' Eebaraami'pina', tee nii' ookara niuma.
Ee'noko teinge Rooma'nupoonge nkaang kara simpe'aara tee ning kiimata-ita unaa-antamaava'naang piavorou', kapoo' tenai'koo nkanai'koo ning boo'anta-koo makosi ooaavarura.
Enang tee Kumponing bakaang miru' ee' oro'pari otong: Naning bakaang piai deea', bakaang nko-nkoi deea', teka Kumponing bakaang piaa-koo narung-koo deeko' makosi.
Ee'noko kaukauro nkoveriauka'nung. Teing-koo nii'ning tee' otorokotaa' kenaanka kivora-ita beenaumo kokorei' [23,000] dua'arira boorou'.
Teka nkaang mono-koo oomaramaung nii'nung kapoo' karenung otong tee ninka nkaang onou ninka. Teie dai'mui otomaung orara aarumoi ning-koo mono-koo otomaunge.

Enang tee Kumponing bakaang kara-koo okora'noo' Karistoo' tero Pako'pari'nii' noru'koong tee' nari' putu'ampiauka', teka napo' naunaue kato meriaing Karistoo'koo panka'maririning-pina'. Pava-koo natuku narung amutemu'ke unampampima keempampiauka' temurii' narung kara minkuampima. Temu'keta noru'eru' tee temurii' kara dii' oraka' nkonanka-ita boo'aapening-eta orarunsirarira bere'dariaing-koong. Napo' dii'ke noru'eru' tee Kumponing masika'antaveriaina'.
Tee dii'koo narunge doonko noru'eauka'. Pakuerio' danto nanuaing mooavari tee ning-anko basiaravaina'. Nii'ke nii'maikorori' ninka nempampimaang tee.
Ee mmaikori', naninge aa'pui dei, “Ning masika'anta oto'memung,” teka nko-nko otoa', tee-koong sinang aming? Temurii' masika'antai ee domang-antavupeu'?
Nii'ninge Jerusalema'nupoonge aa'pau', “Ee', masika', aung tee ee'nara naning tavaava'naang mau'aamang, ape'?
Tee' minkuvura domaange nii' uupumurira aa'muru', “Tanuaang Meekung nkaveriaing.
Noru'aava' tee taung Kumponinge nantoong koong-antavurimanavung. Bii'ka matauarima kaari'aamaung Kumponing bakanavung siong-koo kupi'oroma, Karistoo'koo kuunge.

Baa tee naning Kumponing Bauring masika'antavumaunge tee ee' noru'ui otong bakaang domange, Jiisuu' tee Kumponing Bauring Kumponinge naumuru'na'. Ee'noko teie masika'antavuaunge tee Kumponing tee daang minku tampumaung, ai' teie tee daang-antavumaung masika'antavuaruma tee kara Kumponinge sira'puu'nung bauring-koong.
Masika' naurampimang, baa tee ning masika'antamumaung ninge nko-nko nkoamaung nkovuaing. Ee', nko-nkonanka pankainanka nkoansing-koo dau basi pankaing nkovuainge, ning Mma'anko nanampaing-koo.

Napo' teing botovotonaa'nuka tee' nari' naueriai biikaning ovontunanka-koo boong deempariri otoroaina', ee'noko dotu-antavaarimaatoai ookara kapoo'nanka nkoaavaining-koo, kara bari'aava' ee'noko bakiaa' nkoaava'.
Tarerariaing nii'nunge Kumponing bakaang piaa bekoi'u'neenga, nii'namurii' ovoring siompui. Tee' oro' naning tonto doparopa-po'nung-pina' dii'koo dupura orari-antaruri'neenga.
Ee'noko napo' tee, tee naning ookarai tampa' noru'aamaung makosi, Ju'deeainge. Tampa' noru'aavaruko maia'oi Sietani'nung baanka'koo taavi'arara dua'ara'neeng.
Teka teieta bakaang maanto'ui oto'keta Karistoo'ke nii' kantemuru' namarana' teing avuavu'nanka tee' Daari Meekunge minkuvuu'na' aa'puma:

Teketa napo' kenaanka-nung koosinunge bakanareng utaunareng pirung-koo dau piampuu', ee'noko tee pirung ereng koonku'umaung narung deemparu' naning boo'koong-pina', ee'noko ookara kapoo' pirung-koo domampariri otoromaing boorou'.
Nantoonge ooraarii'naang tampa' nari' mintoontaria' otoai ako' dotu-anta-koo, teka dii' Karistoo' bakaning botovotonaa'nuka deentariko domange tampa' noru'eri mintoontariaing Kumponing-koo.
Ee'noko tarerariri otoriai diikaang domang kiiroraa'ari oto'koo teing diikaang tampara aarumo Karistoo'koo kuunge nkoverimaung oraka' minkuaamaing maia'oroaina' tee' nkoraarimaung-koo.
Tee Mma' piavomana' ee': ookara ning-koo Bauring-koo ookaama masika'antamaavaining domaang oparavaung nkavaavaing. Ee'noko ninge daa'arampaing doong asi'noo'na'mung.”
Teketa namu'ke Kumponing bakaang koosinunge˜ teka tavuu' tee, bakaang daangang Kumponing-aape pare'uaruio'. Ee'noko domang ninka otoko kiki'ke puampaako boo'paru'.
Kumponing tee Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' Bauma tee bakei nii'ke deto biraankeampiri oto'koo makosi, tee piaa ee'noko domang kuaa'anta-koo okora'.
Teing nantoong teing amurii' aarumo baari'au'ning. Tee'koo teing tamung pooarimaung daang-koong minkuminku-koo.

Ning maia'moa' tee doorenang tampara sira'koo. Ai' tee tee Kumponing bakaang purinto' domang-anta-koo makosi ookara nantoong masika'antavaavaining, tutuntoma Ju'nupoong ee'noko napo' teing Ju'deeaing.
Nii'nunge naninge nii'nave natuku keeng-koo makosi deea'. Teve nave ninge keempantu'nave otoaing. Teve ee'nave Jiisuu' Karistoo'nave.
Teka sira'pari otoina'koo ee' otong: Dii'ke naruna' naruna' dii'ankaampi piaaverererimaatoai tee' diikaang mono dii'ka piaararimana' nari'. Ee'noko ba'aang ba'ung-koo mee'du'piari otomatoai.

Aa'noko tero mme' bere'daria' dii' teing tanuaang boo'nuka otoriko' urikung onou toto'daria' otoriko'nung-koo, diikaning oraka' nkonanka ninka dai'dariri, teka enang Kumponinge dii' teing Karistoo' ninka nari' domanturining ee'noko diikaning oraka' nkonanka tonta'deruri ookara.
Dakaang avuavu' da'koo otoing Tanuaang Meekung-etaing sipeauka', ee'nara karai tarampee˜koonge minkuvuko nkaveu'nung tenang teinge dootuu'koo urantanukai bireng pante'daako.
Teketa napo' paning nerakung ee'noko kansi' nerakung ooantu', teing tutuna'ning paning naanka kansi' paa'aretu' ee'noko pirung otoaruu'.
Doturoturariri otorimaatoai.
Teketa teing-koo pa'noko' kaara-koo kuunge tee nantoonge booroaing taung besi'aama pore'oroaing, teka taung ooaavauka'nung bakei. Boo'koo aa'na' piavoroko boo'ke tee teing meumpuria' tokoi mmaruaing.
Nii'ke masika'antavampiri otong Jiisuu' tee boo'parara napo' daa'aru'. Tee'koo tee' noru'ampiri otong Kumponinge Jiisuu' bakaning boorou'ning napo' tee ninka nari' tavo'antavuriaing.
Baa tee naning Jiisuu' sira'pui Kumponing Bauring tampumaung, Kumponing tee tee-koo kuung otomaung ee'noko tee Kumponing-koo kuung otokoo'.
Urikanaung enang bakei kiru'dariaing teronung aarumo-koo otoriko'na'koong, mono narung bakaang noru' karaa'ke boo' tositosi-koong siompui otomaung dii' orari-anta-koona'.
Nka tee, ning ee'nara karanaang parang-koong. Baa tee ning-anko pora tumparavainung domang moo'aravaing. Napo' teie tumparama ee'noko siarama taamang oovumatoaing.*

Kapange too'paarima dupisi'aariko', soo'ke meu' ke'me'aariko', bainatu dovange dupisi'aarima. Ata'aama sipisipi' dovang-koong mee'mee' dopa' kurumpariri nanaako'ning oraka' nkoaarima pore'antavaariko'.
Dii'ke noru'eri otong Karistoo' tee koonto' ee'noko tee'koo ee' masika' noru'eriaing ookara tampa' koonto'na' otoromaing teing Kumponinge paravuru'ning.

Ai' Ovoringe tee Daari Meekung-koo kuunge Karistoo' minkuvuma aa'memuru'nung, ‘Da' tee ninge donkong-antaransing araka deentari otoo'naang Ju'deeaing-koo dake domang-anta tavo'ee'naang tokooning-koo isipo'ning-koo aung-koo kansi'koo.’ ” (Aisaia' 49:6)

Nii'ke nantoong daua'arampiaunge niikaang minkunaa masika'anta-koo. Naning tosi-koo piamoriaunge. Kara Kumponing bakaang mare'ampiaunge. Teing maimaia'na' oro'nanka tee dama'duampiru'ning. Kumponing narung-koo uro'kanoo'ke donkonampiri kara masikung narung siraka'antavampiri nantoong nauarampimaung teinge tampa' tasi'maarira domang-eta aroo'aava'naang.
Enang tee Kumponing-koo tampavine-koo tareroma ba'nanui otong. Bauma-ita tee Tanuaang Meekung maraka-antavuu'nung nkavura teie piampuing nii'koo enang oomererima taaramerererimaatomaing dii'ke.
Enang tee dii' onou nerakung deentaririning Kumponinge nkovuing, ee'noko teie doong kante paari-antavumaung tee-pina' oro'paraa'naang tee masika' kenkumperiaina'.

Jiisuu'ke taaravurai'nange aa'puru', “Lasarusi siipavomang, nka booauka'nung. Siipa tavo'aringe Kumponing-nung meenasi tavo'antavuu'naang. Ee'noko aung siipa kompui Kumponinge ning Bauring meenasi amuu'naang.”

Doorenang tamparai tee sirapo'antavuing tee' Kumponinge nantoong nari-antavuriaina' tee ninka nari'. Ee'pina': Jiisuu' masika'antavaako, tee-koo masika'anta-koo narung-koo koonto'nuka tampuriai. Tee' Daari Meekung-koo aa'pumana', “Naning tee bakaang masika'anta-koo Kumponing ninka nari' nariari otoaing tee domamparavaing.” (Abakaka 2:4)
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke bakaang aa'barata' nkavui osi-eta tenkenuu' bera Makupi'noo' tampaamanoo' basiaru', Ju'nupoong biikaang kara-koo Kolokata' tampaamanoo'.
Nii' amutemurii' avuavu'po'nupoong Kumponinge piaamuri amuru'ning. Dakaang avuavu' tarampee-koong˜ deeko' makosi, tee' nkoveaing aruu'noo' basi dakaang masika'anta ninka.

Tutuna'nung teing-koo kapoo'koo domantoia-koo laioni-pina' oro'. Kenaanka-nung napo' boromaka'koo baarinung-pina' oro'. Beenaumo-nung napo' oinoo' naning-pina' oro', ee'noko karenaumo-nung kapoo' mareoi' purerenui otoing-pina' oro'.
Enang tee araka-koo otoritaa' tarerariri otoriaing dii' otoriaina'koo, tampa' mataurariri, kanu'aapena' deea'.

Enang tee norunoru' tankatankaang-koong otoa' meu'ke teing-koo Ju'nupoong ee'noko Ju'deeaing, ai' Ovoring tee Ovoring ookara biikaang, ee'noko avurimaung bakaang biraanke teing nantoong tee-koo kunsiarimaing.
Karistoo' tee Moosesi-nung boto o'anta-koong. Tee'koo teing ookara nantoong Karistoo' masika'antavaavaining teing koonto'nuka tampuriaing.
Kapoo'nanka-koo baru' noru' otoriauka', teka ookara kapoo'nanka-koo tee Kumponing eentaveriai kunsirarima tampa' tamperima diikaang domang-eta.
Teing ee'ning kapoo' nkoaru'ning teing taa'ni'anta nii'koo nii' koono-anta-kooning oraka'nko piamori'neeng-koo teing-pina'.

Ee'noko teie tee dinkung tumangropa daate'uko teieta ii kutekuteivuu' nta' pankaing-eta popeu'na'. Ee'noko teie iie teketa dinkung-eta kutekuteivuma aa'nou': duaa' mutaanampura aanaroo' deto tunumparavaruu'.
Nii'nung naninge ba'maiko' pari'uauka'nunge aung kapoo'koo. Ovoringe tee temurii' kapoo' ootukunung maku'antavumaung, tee' tero koono-antararampiri naurarampiru'na'.
Tee'koo tee naning Karistoo'koo otoing tee neraka'puing. Urikung onou otoa', teka ookutunung neraka'puing.
Mma'ke ning Bauring piaamui ookara kapoo' nkovumaing naumumaung, ee'noko dama'ke kapoo' aung nkoansing-koo dau basi naumuko nkoama'naang dii' dooroi taruriaing.
Tee bakisipung bakiaa' nko-ita bakearara bakaang birenge mintoong tampara kake'iiari nkovuai apuka'paravaing ninka tankaampuaina'.
Napo' aa'damaang, “Pava-koo-navaro maamu-antamemuai mora aatumpainoo', ai' tee ninge ee' noru'amaang kiimatanoo'keta bake-antamaava'naang kunsi-koo pakumerimaung-koo.

Tee'koo amutemurii' dootuu'koong karai masikeng deeainge avitoitoi baranturiauka', taamang tovang-kooninge. Dii' Kumponing bakaang piaae diikaang domang puring-anta-koo makosi, teinge taamang-koong botonankai nantoonge minkuaamainge deea'. Nantoong teing siompaamaing pakuvuriarukoo'.
Nii'maikorori' ee, nii'ke enang ee' minkurarampimaang: Masika'antavereriaing teing nantoong Ovoring-koo kuunge dii' pakuraarimaing taung nau-antaraarima koong-antaraari.
Baumararinge tee' minkuvuretu' tero ee' mau'aario': Naninge Jiisuu' tee Pako'pari'nii' tampuaing deeko' bata'aavaing dootuu'nava-ita.
Teka nii' ee'ning Kumponing bakaning masikeng-pina' taa'ni'antanii'nuka, bakaang Tanuaang ninka dootuu'marimaing Jiisuu' Karistoo' baitoampiri daangampampima, mono bakanameng-koo aroo' o'noria'.*

Ee'noko bakaang boto tee aung: Nii'ke tee Bauring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring tasi'pampira masika'antavampiaing tee tee Kumponinge teroita Pako'pari'nii' domamuri taremuriainoo'koo, ee'noko naruna' naruna' piaameerimatoai tee' ee'na' botomuru'na' nko-koo.
Teketa napo' nii'nung biiko kansi'keta doompeto bakoarako ooantu' kainta kenaanka otoing sipisipi'koo kampianu-pina' basi, ee'noko kara-koo tee-pina' pakia-pina' karoko'.

Mmaikori' ee, bakerariaing toire' biikana' noru'koo. A'noo', orara matau-koo toire'pina' amakorariri otoriaing, teka petaa'doriaing diikaang noru'koo. Aa'periauka', “Oovunara menenge kara tee taa'ni'anta pankaing Kumponing nii'anko otomaung-koong.”
Dii'koo nii'nung manki' kune'umaung deeko' kunsiaravaing. Napo' nii'nung domang kuaa'oi oto' otomaung deeko' Ovoring kenavuma daangampuaing.
Tee'koo Deto purintariai diikaang bireng aruaru'nanka ee'noko miing tarua'nanka iveka'dariai.

Kumponing Diuma tamperima tee tanatarariaing, ai' tee tee ee'nara Kumponing Simpe'nko˜ ookara-koo biikaang nko-nkonanka-koo makosina', bane aremurii' naning. Aing batei-koo ootukuning-koo damisimainoo'ke otorimaing-koo diikaang aarumo koontariri otoriaing tee-koo meerupirariri.
Ai' dii' bakei barerariaing e'manui oto'na'koo, dii'ke Kumponing bakaang pia siomperikotaa' tee kapoo' maraka-antaruru'nung nkaveriaina' Karistoo' poainang.
Enang tee tee masika'anta tee ee'nung tee biraanke nempampimaung-koo okora'noo' deempari otong, tee ee'nung noru' purinto' tasi'anta-koong tee kapoo' oro'paravaung.
Aung tee nkaang naunau dii' naurampimang Ovoring bakaang miringe dii' date'antarampima: Akoing tamunsi'nanka-pina' nkorariauka' kapoo' masikung deeaung siompaamaing-pina'.

Tee'koo teinge aava nkonukai Ju' biikana'koo tuumpiraariko taaraverereriauka' taamang tovang ntong nai dovang-koo, nii'noo' doong pankeng-koo aa'ning-koo: dootuu'kooning doong pankeng, kaara neraku dupumanang, ee'noko Doong Uaana'mung.

Tee'koo teing Kumponing bakanoo' ba'nava'nani'doma uro'kanoo' donkonai tee dootuu'aamaung doong ee'noko muung bakanava meekava-koo, ee'noko teie teke ovorimpari ba'nani'domai ba'nanui otomaunge kuung koo'uri nari' otoromaung.
Ee'noko Paula' doonko siarara tee-koo dau kinkinura boko'ura aa'puu', “Noru' manki'doriauka' aung-koo, aung enang domamparing.”

Tee'koo amutemurii' sisikeera tora'koo taura'marama iri' o'maravaung teinge nantoonge Kumponinge miru'nii'nankai taaravaavaina' teing napo' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung otoroi domang-anta kompaava'naang meenasi otoi oto' manta'pai.
Mooa tee dii'koo ookara-koo tee' nari' otoaing dii'koo Karistoo'koo otorining-koo. Tee' nari'.
Ee'noko aroo'antareeri otorimaatoaing Karistoo'koo mee'du'pirariri.

Tee'koo dii'ke mmaikori' masikupoonge tutung aing ee' oro' kapoo'nanka tasi'perira tarerariri otoriaing boto siompaavaininge taapo'ke barantaari'neenga kara koonto' deeaung nauraarima e'mantoma dekopi'antaraari.
Dii' manii' nampeesinii'nuka, dii'unkaampi biikaang kara aroo'erimaatoai tee' Ovoringe pia-antaruri otoina'.
Ee'noko tee tautaueriko tee' nari' nkoariri otoroaing deeko' sirapo'ke naueriaing napo' tee' nkoaavauka'nung ookarai ooaara avoreaavaina'.
Tee'koo nii'ka simpesimpe'meeria' otoaing. Teka ee' noru'erimatoai: Kapoo' naning nii'maiko' tupamparara dua'arapeu'nung-pina' oro' nkoampiauka'.
Ee'noko tee meenasi, miring pankaing ee'noko mooa kompaavaing teinge tampa' nkoarimainge tutuntoma Ju'nupoong ee'noko napo' Ju'deeaing, Kumponinge nari' basinoo'ka noru'urimaung-koo.

Teinge nta' karauviaana sirivaa'au'. Bainatu-koo i'ang-eta tampa' mmariau'. Bane aruaru'nukai teka paaravaama teinge apoo'aariko'. Tavu'koo iirakutavariko' ee'noko damisimainku piatooronuka˜ mmari'antavaariko'.
Enang-eta deto ning naninge pore'antamuauka'nung, ai' ninge tee nkaang mono-koo Karistoo'koong taa'menanka taa'ni'anta-pina' kompansi o'nong.

Teketa narung koosinunge bakei iirakutai kapang pankaing uite' putu'aamaung-pina' basi deto itaa'ura pirung-koo dua'uma aa'puu', “Ee', aung-pina' Babiloni' biururuu'nang doonko dua'koong, napo' naninge oovuauka'nunge.
Teka dii', mmaikori', dii'ka deto kanirariaing diikaang masika'anta aa'na' meekung-koo. Kunsirariri tee ninka iri' ninka Tanuaang Meekung-etaing ninka.

Avutevu' aarumo paaraveriauka' teka Kumponing taura'periko paari-antaruriaing diikaang onou pankaruntoong-koo. Tenang ee'nang dii'ke noru'eriaing tee Kumponing bakaang pia dii'koo, tee kapoo' tampara, dakaosi' ee'noko dotu-antavuai.
Ninoo' tee ee'nara asi'noo'nung kara okovuri nkanuka-koo, teka ning kara-okovui-nka tang-koo makotumpa', Kumponing bakaning dootuu'nupoong oraka' nkoaranko'nung-koo.
Aung kansi' teing ninka bakaning kapoo'nanka ninka karaa'eriauka'. Baa tee naning aung kansi' karaa'uainge tee Niuma Kumponing piaavua' otong ee'noko Kumponing bakaang piaa tee-koo otoa'.

Ee' masika', dii'koo narunge tee aa'pupeu': Teing bakei oreng dake ning naumemaing. Teka io' noru'eai mmaiko': Da' tee' nari' oro'ke, teing-pina'. Teing dake aa'perima: Teing oreng, kiimatavariaining, tee' minkuema tee, da' nari' teing ninka minkuraramang da' tee' nari' nkoraramaung-koo.

Tee avuavu' Kumponinge deing tasi'paama Jeemisi dovange, Siipas* ee'noko Jooni, teing ee'ning oko'bosi'nuka tampaarimainge dootuu'koo, nee' Banabas naanka Paula' bireng batu'maaretu' nee' teing ninka manta'ka taa'ni'antamaarema nee' Ju'deeaing-anko meree'naang ee'noko teing Ju'nupoong-anko beroo'naang.

Teketa piatooronukai Jiisuu' aa'barata'koo taakavaarai'nange bakaang mononopa' nkavaama tankee'eu' karemarantu-koo, namarana' piatooro naruna'. Ee'noko tee mononopa' isikung nkavau' tenaa' ootukunaa' navaro-koo bavu'nii'naa', tua'noo' dapa'doma dopa.
da' nantoong nau-antaverimaung daka ee nau-antararava' otong? Da' bakiaa'koo daankirarama poteverimaung, arekee', bakiaa'kiaunge?
Ai' noru'ea' ee dakaang mono tee Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang bakaang pava meekava? Kumponinge te' sipuu' ee'noko te' ee'noo' otomaung. Tee ee'nara okovenung, da' deea'.
Ai' nii' tee Karistoo' bakaang piaae aa'na' siong-antamuri o'noring tasi'antamuri tee narung nii'koo boo'paru'nung ookara-koo, ee'noko tee'koo ookara tee moompiru'ning-pina' o'noring.

Ee mmaikori', paning-eta miru'murio' nari' meeka'marimaing, deto noru'ampiaing tee Jiisuu', ee'nara Kumponinge kara oko-antavura botovuio' pou'nung ee'noko tee tee piristi' pankaing, tee ee'nara nii'ke sirakura' masikee-antavampimaung.

Ookara kapoo' ninge nkoanko'ning teing ninge dii' barerampiru'ning dii'ke tee' nari' kake'iirarira teing aruaru'nuka pakuererii'naang tee Ovoring Jiisuu' bakaang kara ee' minkuvuu'naare noru'eri, ‘Naning avu'nko biraankearavaing puru'uitaa' tee naning nkavuaing.’ ”
Nampeesi tee tampara, oraka' minku-koong deea'. Tee' nari' tampa' tanatavampiaing toto'pampia', ai' Kumponinge tee kiimatavuriaing teing bakiaa'ke otoromaing ee'noko nampeesi orariaakoo'.
Ee'noko kinkinamirai'nange ooantu' baaronanka. Nka kuvi dako'doma tumarava'.

Teketa aing aa'ning nkoaru': pipimpuma kurunkurung tompoo'kuko', ee'noko ninininimpuma u'mi' pankaing nkoaru', tee u'mi' tee bakei teroita kansi'koo nantoong tavo'ariru'noo'keta nkoarava'na' nkoaru', aa'na' dau basi masikung tee aung.

Tee'puio' ning tee-koo kau'kanoo' miinge keemarara pankaing-antavama'naang nkomarako teie aa'muu', “A! Tee' nkoraravauka', ai' ning tee narung botovotonaa' da'pina' nari', ee'noko napo' teing da'maikori'pina' oro'ke Jiisuu'koong kara tampa' kompai sira'paamaing-pina'. Kumponing narung dootuu'eaing, ai' tee doorenang masikung Jiisuu'ke sira'puu'nung tee ee'nung kara Tanuaang Meekunge miru'ui minkuvuko'nung bakaning nakaro-nupoong˜ karantavurima˜.”
Teka nii'koo tee Kumponinge tampa' nkomuru'na' oro'antavuu' tee-koo Tanuaang Meekung-koo kuunge. Tanuaang Meekung tee ootukunung kapoo' sirapo'antanung, bane Kumponing-koo tumang masipo' otomaing.
Emu' tee te' dii'anko basiarako bakei aa'na' onkeonke'eriaing Ovoring bakaang miring-koo aa'na' doturariri. Ee'noko nantoong tee-pina' oro'nuka pankaing-antaverererimaatoai.
Napo' dii' biurukaa'ke diumaraang taaraverererimaatoai ookara kapoo'nanka-koo, ai' tee'koo tee Ovoring dotuaramaung.

Nii' tee dotumarimaung domang kiiroraa'mariri ee'koo: ai' nii'ke tee aarumo koonto' narung nkoampimaung Kumponing piavomana' ookara nantoong ee'noko dii'koo meu'ke, nii'nung kapoo' makempampia', ee'noko tee' oro'noo'koo kansi' bakaang matau siompampia', Kumponing bakaang piaae kake'ii-antamuriko bakaang aarumo siompampikoo'.*

“Baa tee nkaang boto aroo'uma siompumaung tee ee'nara naning ning piaamumaung. Ee'noko baa tee naning ning piaamumaung Mma'ke piaavuainge. Ee'noko ninge piaavampainge. Ee'noko ning ninka sira'maravainge tee-koo.”

Masika', oo-koo tee matauna' oro'pari otong boto tampeng-pina', teka teinge nii' mono bakaang pia-ita unaa-anta-koo pakumaariarupeu'. Tamung daang dootuu' avutevu'anta-kooning, ee'noko baru' boonko noru'arama baka mono sisikeera-anta-kooning.

Teinge tee dakaang piaa teing piaaverimaung tee sira'pau' ookara Karistoo' bakanavitu-koo anke o'norimaing-koo. Teka tenang temurii' nantoong dii'ankoita tenkenaako nii'noo'ke daankiarii'naang, tenang napo' dake pakueriai nanu'koo Kumponing dotuaravaina'.
Nau'ka pakuraravauka' tee-koo minkuminku-koo daang-koonanka-koo kanu'aapenung-koo. Noru'ei otong temurii' aarumoi turang-anta basi-antavumaung.

Ee'noko nii'ke ookarai ee'ninge niikaang onou avo'maria' o'norimainge tee Ovoring bakaang araka tampa' ooampiri oorara-pina' oro'antavampimaung, ee'noko paarimarima tee' Karistoo'pina' oro'marimaung deto bia'morima meenasi-aape. Tee aung aarumo tee Ovoring-eta pomaung, tee ee'nara Tanuaang Meekung.

Teka tee ereng Karistoo'koong tee bakei dau basinoo' purinto'. Tee Tanuaang Meekung ookara batei-koo otomaung bakaang iri' ninka Karistoo' tee baka avaru' Kumponing-koo, ee'noko kapoo' orara tee-koo otoa'. Tee'koo teie bakaang erenge tee deto basinoo' niikaang pankaruntoong kiiroraa'antamurimaung ee'noko boo'aapenung nko-nko-ita unaa-antamurikoo' Kumponing domantoo' makosina' dootuu'ampii'naang.

Kumponinge tee, nii'ke Ovoring Jiisuu' niikaang domang-anta tero Pako'pari'nii' masika'antavampirio' tee bakaang Tanuaang Meekung nii' amuru'na' aing avurio' tasi'pamira ning arekee'koo ninka mosii'marapeu' Kumponing bakaang pia toto'pansitaa'?”
Tee' nari' Tanuaang Meekung Kumponing bakaang orarunsi-antaveria' otoai, ai' tee Tanuaang Meekung tee Kumponing bakaang taa'ni'anta nii' moo'muriaing-koong asi'na'mung.

Norunoru'eai dake tee kapoo' taaravera nkaveu'nung, ee'noko pinka'eai tee. Bere'daravai dakaning orarananka-ita. Da' tanterari otoauka'nung deeko' tee ning da'anko tee bakiaa' nko-pina' tavo'kampaing dake noru'eauka'nung batei-koo.
Ee aing dii' nkaning toire' oki'nareka', naninge dii' aava-koo taura'dariauka'. Baa tee naning aarumo koonto' nkovumaung tee koonto' tee-pina' Karistoo' koonto' otomana'.

Ee aing mmaikori' piaarampimaing, ookara tanuaananka naro'keta masika'antaverereria' otoai, teka io' nantoong karantavaariko˜ paaraverererimaatoai teing tanuaananka tasi'koo teing Kumponing-etaning deeko', ai' aung-koo kansi'koo tee mmau' oreng tanuaananka otorong nakaro-nupoong˜ karantavurimaing, ee'noko teing nakaro-nupoong tosiarima Kumponing-etaining tamparimaung.
“Tee'koo dii'ke mmarange noru'eriaing tee aung ee'nara narung-koo dii'ke orara aarumo-ita tonta'anta nkaveria'naang daankirampimaang.
Asi'noo'ka ee mmaikori' aa'dampimang, Ovoring-koo doturoturarimatoaing. Aung tee kara anaare napo' unampama daariamatomaung ninge daari-koo pore' deea' ee'noko dii' tampa' koono-koonge.
Nii'nung peeravoko osie taamang-antaverimatoai diikaang naronaro' kiimata-po'nung deempara'neenga. Dama'ke mora napo' nii'ning naurampiaing.
Pailati'ke napo' aa'puru', “Dii'ke dii'ka nkaverira paaraveriaing diikaang botoi naururimana'.” Ju'koong ovontunge maku'aama aa'pau', “Nii' taura'maria' naning tavampiko boo'koo.”
Teka paaraveriaing tee Tanuaang Meekung bakaning avuavu'nanka pankeng masikeng nka-koo. Ee'noko ampa'doriauka' piaanavung navunge avuavu'nanka kong-koo makosi.

Ai' tee tee' makosina' nii' narung piristi' pankaing oto'memurii'naang, tee meekung, tuumpiaravaunge, ku'mi'dopai, nantoong orananka-ita poka'ari otong, ee'noko pankaing-antanii' ookara kapoo'nanka-koo dau basi, paning-kooning-koo ee'noko kansi'kooning-koo.
Ninge tee ookara kapoo'nanka Karistoo' bakaang purinto'koo kuunge nko-koo makosi.
Tee tee ee'nara pia Ovoring bakaang, dii' poterariri meeka'antararii'naang tee-koo aarumo kaukauro nko-koong.
Kunsi-koo uaaroria' otoai onou tanterariri Kumponing-koo tampa' tamperima.
Ee'noko tee Moosesi tenaarei naari-antavuio' Iisipi'keta tenkenui koo'aru' bera Midian-nameensi'nung deemparu', teke ee'noo'ke baurinketa kenaankara nkoaretu'.

Donkaani tee bore'koo baarong kurung-koo makosi deea' dootuu'koo oosirarimanoo'ke, ai' teie tee tavo'antavumaung Kumponing bakaang oro'oro'na' ee'noko tee meenasi bakaang; teka manikumai donkaani bakaang meenasi tavo'antavumaung.

Ee'noko tee Karistoo'ketaing mooa taura'periaing teie tanataruriaina' tee diikaang domang, dii' ee'ning Kumponinge bokururu'ning tee-koo mooa-koo kuunge narung mono makosinuka deentariri, ee'noko ookara batei-koo tampa' tamperimaatoai.

Kumponinge tee baurukaa' kura'nari' doompeto paning-koo tampa' otoroainoo' tavo'urii'naang miru'urima teie Jiisuu' tutung baike kune'antavura makosi-antavuu' teing moo'uriaining biikaang urantanara deempari otoo'naang. Tee tee tee' makosina' teie Jiisuu'ke dupe-anta-koo ai' Kumponinge tero ookara kapoo' nkovuu'nunge miru'uu'na'.
Aminankai tee tata' dovang turanturang, kare tavo'antavumaung dii'koo meu'ke? Tee aa' tee teinge diikaning karaa'ke naruna' naruna' domang manki'antaruriko kare basiaramaung.

Ninge doorenang orara taaravansing dii'koo narung-koo maritoroaramaung. Tee temurii' maritoro teie nkovumaung maremaarenamurii' nantoonge taura'koo makosi deea', bane mutaanang-koo-nupoonge. Tee temurii' bauma ba'aang ninka oto'.

Teka tenang kapoo' arikung deeko' ai' orara aarumo-koong piai meu'duko deeko' ee' noru'eaing: da' ookara paara-anta puru'koo makosi. Mmau' da'koo uro'nupoonge nantoonge temurii' paara-anta kune'au'nung. Kumponinge bakaning sipuriaung, ee'noko teie tee paara-anta taura'puauka'nung da' puru'koo, teka tenang paara-anta poko teie tee da' puring-antaruaing mmari'navung nauruma.
Ai' ninge noru'ansi o'nong ninge si'dampiko tee oreng nau-antanuka nkaunanka avorokesi'nanka-pina' dii'koo meu' poroaing opaarii'naang temanto.

Tee'koo nii' doturotumarimaung sira'anta-koo Kumponing bakaning dootuu'nupoong-koo osi kantena'. Nauarampimaung dii' purintariri ee'noko baitorariri otorimaung-koo tenang nantoonge turantaarima pore'antaraariko.
Naninge tee Kumponing nii'na'mung oovua'; teka nii' naruna' naruna' piaameerimaing deemarima nii'ka tasi'mariai Kumponing tee nii'koo otomaung ee'noko bakaang piaa tee nii'koo dupeari otong.
Ee aing dii' dootuu'nupoong Kalesia-nameensi' otorimaing osi kante-koo, nii'maikorori'ke ookarai nari' o'norimainge tampa' tampampimaang dii'anko daarirerompima ni'ninka Paula' ninka;
Ee'nara ee' noru'eriaing: nantoonge orenge tee oraka' nkoaako tee baka avaru' tee tora'koo, dii' tee' oraka' nkoraariko domang aruaru'doriaroo'naang.
Teka nii' Karistoo' ninka narung deeng-antamarima nari' moompiru'ning deemariritaa' tee' nari' Karistoo' ninka boo'keta nerakung otooto'koo o'noriaing.
Nii'noo'ke napo' ee' daariari otong, “Doturariaing dii' Ju'deeaing teing ninka bakaning Ju'nupoong ninka nari'.” (Boto 32:43)

Enang tee Tanuaang Meekunge ee' koonto' naumurimaung: Asi'na'mung due'uko nii'ning tee bere'ariaing akovetei teieta kara masikung siompampimaung-eta teing ma'nari tositosinanka taaravaari-kotaa', ee'noko teing minkunaa Sietani' bakaning-koo bi'arikotaa'.
Nau-antaveriaing teing dakaning nantoong ovontung-koo boong otoroaina', siompaarima teing, amutemurii' tampeng nko-nko nko-koo maamuariri.
Teka tee' minkuaama narung kapoo' maroita bei'bei'aamaung aa'nou'nung: Kumponinge karoko paning tavo'aru' tero, ee'noko kansi' pirung-eta bakoarara ta'namparu'.

Ai' Karistoo' tee tee' nari' bou' nantoong biikaang oraka' nkonanka-koo. Terong-koo ookara daka'pui namu'ke pareka bakevuu', tee ee'nara koonto' deemparitaa' nii' koonto'nuka deeaing Kumponing-koo tavo'murii'naang teie. Mono nameng dupisi'aio' tee' boo'paru', teka Kumponing bakaang Tanuaange daa'uio' domampari otong.

Baru' tampa'na' deea' tee teing koonto'navung-koo noru'kaavarupeu'nung-koo, ee'noko bakei oraka' tutung noru'aara napo' bere'ariring-koo teieta doorenang aa'na' tampara, Karistoo'ketaing boto meekung tutung taaravau'nung-eta.

Nii'maikorori' ee, enang nii'ke naurarampimaang dii' tee-koo Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo kuunge: Tonta'dariri otoriai teing-eta nii'ning dii'maikorori' kakapotonuka, kake'iirariri mintoontariaina' naurarampiru'nung-koo kanto'pariaing-eta.

Enang noru'eriaing tee aung taa'ni'anta. Narung naning oraka' nkoario' bakaang oraka'nkoi nantoong karika' orari-antavuru' ee'noko teie orari-antai tee boo' basi-antavuu' nantoong kansi'koo-nupoong-koo. Ee'noko tee teie boo'ke ootukunung kuung deempuru' ookara oraka' nkoaririo'.

Teinge Kumponing masika'antavaama dauraronanka mmau' depetoaaru'nung, nantoong orenanka etuaarima koong-antavaaru'. Kapoo' Kumponinge teing-koo maraka-antavuu'ning kompau'. Laioni-nanka-koo karang avo'aaru'.
Turamaarimaunge, teka Kumponinge si'muriaung. Na'namaarima orari-antamaariarukoo'.

Dii' bakei nampeesi orariaamaing-pina' makosinuka, ai' dii'ke Kumponing bakaning miru'nii'nukai kansi' bakaang aarumo karaa'erima Kumponing ninka aa'na' munte'nupoong deeng-antararimaung. Ee', baa tee naning kansi'aapening piaavuaing tee baka Kumponing ninka turani' deemparing.
Ee'noko Eesia-nameensi'kooninge aa'ninge Pirisia'navaro ee'noko Kalesia-navaroi tamung danto tankinau' Tanuaang Meekunge orokovurio' kara sira'koo temeensi'koo.

Nka tee nii'noo'ka ee' minkuvuu' masika'antanavung-koo, “Dii'ka ee' minkueriauka': Baa paning-aape koinuainge tee Kumponinge Teroita Pako'pari'nii' nii' domamuri taremuriainoo'koong depeto boku-koo teie pakumurii'naang?

Teketa tutuna'nunge koosinunge bera bakanareng utaunareng piampuu' kansi'koo, ee'noko pentananka oraka' oro'nanka sisikeera-po'nanka nantoong-eta ta'da'puu', teing tee biiko-koong moo'do'anta otoroining-koo ee'noko bakaang baka-oo-koo dootuu'arikoo' aa'ning-koo.

Ee'noko tenang teie tee buuku nkavuko teing kapoo' karenaumo domantoia ee'noko napo' teing kenai'ka-ita karenaumo ovontung te' teu-anko Kampianu-anko kau'kanoo' dapuu'kai dua'ariru'. Ee'noko teing ovontung aing aa'ninge kanteariri kompai: kapoo' kiita-pina' oro'ning ee'noko napo' utau kooro-kooning kanteng paro'nii' tampa' nuuraa'ke maanto'. Teing teing kunsinanka nantoong meekupoong biikaning.

Baata teing ookara nantoong tee Jiisuu' tee ee'nara Kumponinge uripo'keta Pako'pari'nii' nii' domamuri taremuriainoo'koo masika'antavaamaing teing ee'ning Kumponing baurukaa', ee'noko baa tee naning tee Bauma piaavuainge teie teing baurukaa' nari' piaavuriainge.
Nii' kirokainku-pina' o'noriauka', ereanameereauka' ee'noko mamairomeeriauka'.
Enang teing dootuu'nupoong ninka ee' tampa' otoriai: Pankareu' ioo'eria' otoai, teka tamung banainge tampa' nauerimatoai daumaraang-pina' noru'eri. Ee'noko nemaa' daara'mainkaang-pina' nkoverimatoai.

Mutaanang-nupoong-ankoi tampa' mataurariri otorimaatoai ee'noko oraka' nkonuka tantaariaing deeko' tenang Kumponinge kansi' beero'uainang diikaang nko-nko tampara tasi'paara Kumponing daangampaavaing teinge.
Napo' toomo-nameng donkompansi ning tee iri'moi dootuu'nupoong manki'antavaranko'nunge. Ee'noko koompari oto'nairu-koo ning naninge tuumpimupeu'noo' otoa'.
Ee'noko teie maku'urima aa'puru', “Arenang tee ee'nang nnuring tampatampa' dee'oinge?” Ee'noko teinge aa'pau', “Ke'maaki' mme' mutaanampuko uipaarii' boimpuieeng.”

Te'mung te'mung doona'mung miring Maamu-antana'mung, doong uaana'mung aa'na' meeka'mung-koo boona'mung deempario'. Ee'noko teinge Ju'koong pankenge ee' noru'au', “Teing aa'barata'koo taakavarining tee' nari' otoroko Doong Uaana'mung orariara'neeng.” Tee'paara Pailati'koo eentavariru' botoarako piatooronukai teing-koong taakavaaru'ning-koong kau' nenko'aava'naang, bera namu'ke booroio' sing-antavaarii'naang aa'barata'keta.

Pailati'ke tee taaravurai'nange bakei napo' aa'na' piavou' sirapo' sipuu'naang. Ee'noko Ju'koong ovontung aa'na' bokiaama aa'pau', “Dake sirapo' sipeaing deeko' ookarai noru'daapeu' da' dakaang pankaing Siisa' ba'maiko' deea', ai' baa tee daurarong baka tamparamaung Siisa' too'denung deempari otong.”
Jiisuu'ke aa'muru', “Domang oraka' dee'doriauka'. Kumponing masika'antaveriaing, ee'noko ning masika'antameriainge.

Diikaning kare-nupoonge bane arekee' tokoona' nkoraariko aroreria' otorimaatoai. Tee' taa'ni'antarariri otoriko teinge tasi'paavaing doong asi'na'mung kera'pariaing-koo dii' domantariko, Kumponinge ee'nunge pakururio'.

Dii'ke ning miru'meria', ninge dii' miru'dampiru'nung ee'noko ninge barerampiru' berira sinang mmau' nkaverii'naang, temurii' sinang doong kante otomatoaing. Ee'noko Mma'ke aruriaing kapoo' nkaang miring-koo nia'eriaing.

Eebelo'ke tee ninka masika'anta ninka boontunang tampara avuu' Kumponing, Keeni bakaang puru'ui. Ee'noko Kumponinge bakaang masika'anta-koo oovura makosi-antavuu' naning koonto' tang-koo, bakaang boontunang makotuio' taa'ni'antavuma. Bane boo'paru', nka teie bakaang masika'antai tee mme' karoi otong.
Dii'ke tee nii' tamung Karistoo' bakaning kara nkanuka-pina' noru'mereriaing Kumponinge makosi-antamurining-pina' bakaning kapoo' makensi'ning nau-koo.
Ee'noko beento'nanka paning-kooning kavarima kansi'koo dua'ariru', karikau'koong sinananka pionge darampuriko kavarima dua'arimana'.
Tee tee mmaikori' ee, baari'antarariri otoriai kumponing tositosinanka siong-eta.
Orarai puru'duriauka' dii', teka orara dii'ke puru'eriai tampara ninka.
Dake noru'antaveriaing tee kara nauransina'. Ovoringe oorurio' botoveriaing ee': Donta'dariri otoriai kara-koo tata'nanka-ita. Tee' tata'koo tampa' deea'. Nantoonge taaravaama tee orari-antavaripeu'.

Kumponing-koo due'antarariai ee'noko tee Kumponing due'aravai dii'koo. Dii' oraka' nkorarimaing bere'darira tampa' nari' nkorarimatoaing, ee'noko dii' tunsi paakanuka noru' narung deentariri domang kiiroraa'po'nupoong otorimaatoai.
Teka siivenke' nkoveriaing deeko' tee dii' oraka' nkoraririning ee'noko teie botoi tompinturi otong tee toto'perining deentariko.
Ai' Kumponinge dii' ku'mi'koo miru'duria', teka kiiroraa'dariri oto'koo miru'duru'nung.
Kumponing bakaang iira tee paning-etaing siraka'pari otong teing-koo Kumponing piavoroaing ee'noko oraka' nkoarimaing-koo, teing kara masikung avo'aamaing-koo oraka' nkoaama.

Ee mmaikori' piaarampimaing, naruna' naruna' piaameeri o'norimaatoai, ai' tee aarumo piaa-koong tee Kumponing-etaing, ee'noko tee naning piaa bauko tee Kumponing-koo neraka'pari ponto'aru'nung, ee'noko teie Kumponing noru'ui otong.
Baa tee naning aa'puaing, “Ning araka-koo o'nong,” ee'noko ba'maiko' munte'uma, tee tee mme' mutaanang-koo otong.
Karistoo'nung miring komperimaung-koo oraka' minkuraariko tee doturariaing, ai' tee' minkuraarima sira'paamaung tee Tanuaang Meekung Kumponing bakaang meenasi-po'nung dii'koo otomaung.
Ee'noko teing-koo tampara tampura Paula'ke pukevui minku-antavuru' teing kapoo'nanka Kumponinge nkovuu'ning taapo'nairu-koo Ju'deeaing-koo Paula' nanuma daankiarako.
Dii'koo baie ninge orara aarumo nkoantu'nung minkuvupeu'? Ee'noko ninge masika' naurampiko dii'ke aming-koo ning masika'antameria' o'nong?
“Teketa napo' noru'ampauka' tee biikaang oraka' nkonanka ee'noko boto toto'nanka tonta'evoromira.” (Jeremaia 31:34)
Dii' tee tee-koo maanto'duru'ning avaro-tevaro. Teie pakururimaung noru'koo ookara kapoo' masikananka ee'noko tampa' kareria'naang tee-koo.

Enang naurampimang dii' mmaikori' kuunge Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Ovoring-koo ee'noko tee ninka piaa Tanuaang Meekung bakaang, ni'ninka nari' mintoomariaing kunsi-koo pakumeriko Kumponinge tonta'antamuaina' teing-eta nantoong masika'anta otoroaing-eta Judia'navetei otoroining-eta, ee'noko nkaang nko-nko Jerusalema'ke tampa' aroo'aavai Kumponing bakaninge meekupoonge.
Ee'noko karingai maku'aama aa'pau', “Da' ma'naang orara-po'nung. Baie da' taruu'naang tantumang?”

Kumponinge Jiisuu' botovuu' tee' nko-koo ookara-koo dutakanoo'ke tee masika' antavampiko tee ninka naroong-antamurii'naang, ee'noko napo' nau-antamurii'naang tee Kumponing tee aarumo koonto'koo okora', ai' tero-nupoonge oraka'nko nkoaako tee mii'kui tamung doonko oovuriko' kiimatavuria' Karistoo'ke mero' kompuaing noru'uitaa'.

Tenang ee'nang kamaarinang, tee'koo teing ovontung biikaang botovotonaa'nukai ee'noko piatooronukai nta' betu'aara tee nta' koroai donkonai otoroko' ankavoroma. Piita teing-anko nanurai'nange teing ninka donkonai te' otoroko' nta'koo ankavoma.
Nopa'dariaing ootukununge Kumponing bakaang mononopa' tavu'koonge tee ninka nari' Sietani'ke aavaruriko dimpa'eriaina'.
Piitai nia'uma aa'puu', “Aming-koo ninge siontamparupeu' enang? Ning da' ninka boo'koo makotunsi o'nong.”
Ee'noko teie Kumponing-nung mooai pankainge nantoong biikaang matau-koo dau basie mankimanki'keta unaa-anta aruriaing tee diikaang domang ee'noko diikaang onou Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Teie narunge menenge nii'ke Kumponing tee Niuma tampara tampampimaung ee'noko napo' teie narunge menenge nantoong barakosi'arampikoo', teing Kumponing-pina' oro'antavuri nkovuru'ning.

Nka ninge tee' minkuama ookara kaukauro nkonuka aung kansi'kooning minkuarampa', kapoo'koo tata'arimaing, bakisipunanka, ee'noko kumponing tositosinanka siompaarimaing tovang ninka. Teka tee a'noo' teing-eta si'dariarupeu' kansi'keta tonta'dariarura deeko'.
“A'noo' ninge tee ninka koonto'na' ee'pina' noru'anko': Aung miring Jiisuu' Nasareti'nung onou amutemurii'ke turampamaa'noaing.

Biikaang duta tee karakaraa'ke maanto'nuka maniku'koo, orara aarumo besi'ui oto'nuka, aruaru'nuka da'deng dua'antavaarimaing, ee'noko biikaang domang aarumo oko'oko-koo bareari oto'nukai. Kumponinge barakosi'nii'nuka teing.

Ee'noko tee naning moo' nka-koo tanata nkovumaung tampara tarenara deea' ee'noko sipisipi' okovenung deea'. Teie nkau poko oovuma sipisipi' sipurima koo'aramaung. Ee'noko nkau poma sipisipi'nanka tavuriko purarinka'arimaung.
Ee mmaikori' piaarampimaing, tee aung noru'eriaing: Ookara naruna' naruna' namu'ke kara taaraverimaatoai, teka maku'koo ee'noko iira-koo iri'naruntaria' otoai,
Tee'koo Ovoringe botomuru' nii' bakaang kara tampara nkavampiri daankiampimaing niikanariong teka tee-koo doorenang tampara-koo nkakampiainge.
Ning kansi'koo mou' araka-pina'. Ee'noko ookara nantoong ning masika'antamaamaing mutaanang-koo otoroauka'nunge.
Ee'noko dama'ke tee Jiisuu'ke dootuu'nava pankava-koo kune'ura aa'puu', “Ee aung, da' enang taareroing. Dakaang orara aarumo sipeaing kapoo' tee-koo siipa-koo dau basi tavo'ku'neeng da'koo.”
Ootukunung kapoo' nkoveriaing piaa ninka nkoveriai.
“Dii'ke ning piaameritaa' nkaang boto siomperiaing.

Ooveri kupi'doria' otoriaing taara-koo tee karomatomaung. Tenang Kumponinge kansi'koonamii-eta' tautauvuriko kupi'orora kiimata-ita mmariaavaru'na' ooverira noru'eriaing dii' bakei aa'na' mmari'koo makosinuka deea' tenang paning-eta tautaururiko bei'bei'dariaing deeko'.
Tero tee tenang dake Kumponing noru'earuko'nang da' tee dai'dari otoko' teinge kapoo'nanka makotua'nanka kumponinanka deeng-anta-koo.
Kumponinge Jiisuu', bakaang muu' tarenung, tutung dii'koo botovuu' dii' ookara naruna' naruna' diikaang oraka' nkonanka-ita bere'antarurira biraanke-antarurii'naang.”
Nka nii' teing, ookara kapoo'nanka sira'nuka teie nkovuko'ning teke Ju'nupoong biikanoo'ke, nka baru'noo' Jerusalema'ke, ee'noko teinge teka dupisi'au'na' koi'koo bi'aara.
Teka ee' minkurampimang mmaikori' tee-koo niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo: Naro' kareriai, ee'noko pokapoka'deeriauka', teka tapo'deeriai noru' narung-koo, narung miru' ninka.
Ee'noko dii' tee'ke nari' osikointuru'ninge, tero tee Kumponing-eta isipo' otoriko'ning tee-koo kare-nupoong deentariri, diikaning norunoru'nanka siomperima ee'noko nko-nko oreng.

Tee tee enang donta'dari otoai nemaa' biikaang karakaraa'keta. To'bii-antarari otoai te'aape: nariari oto', masika'anta, piaa ee'noko mooa, teing Ovoring-koo baitoarimaing ninka nari' otoritaa' tampa' nari' nko-koo piavoromaing ninka.

Dii' teing Kumponinge Karistoo' ninka nari' daa'antarurining nerakung domaang-koo. Tee'koo dii'ke kapoo'ning paning-aapening naing piarori otoriai te' ee'noo' Karistoo' otoinoo'ning, Kumponing-koo tampavine-koo daurarompari ba'nanui.

Ee'noko tutuna'nunge bakanareng tuuviri puumpuko apo' kamaarie moomparama kapang kaa'omana' kaa'ora kansi'koo doonko tumputumpurunang dua'aru' ee'noko napo' nta' erenge mavo' tee' nari' kansi'koo dua'aru'. Ee'noko kansi'koo beevorai navora' taivuu', koi'nanka-koo beevorai-koo navora'kooning taivuu', napo' ookara baa' oki'nareka' taivuru'.

“Ovoring, da' tee Kumponing ookara purinto'po'nung, tee tee' nari' otomaung-teroita otou'nunge, e'mung tee' otong, ee'noko dama'ke tee' nari' otoi poainge. Dakaang iri' pankaing kompei daurarong˜ deentari otomaung. Tee'koo nii'ke tampara tampampimaang da'koo.

Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Ee baka', dake noru'ei dei Kumponing-nung bauta' ee'noko ning baa ee'nara nia'damaang ntong-koo, ning ee'nara nia'mepeu'. Nia'meko ninge arompeu' ntong domaang-po'nung.”
Karistoo' tee diikaang domaang okovenung, ee'noko tenang Karistoo' napo' oro'paravainang dii' tee' nari'ke tee ninka nari' oro'dariainge teke sirapo'ke Kumponing bakaang meenasi komperi.

Aing daariampirining otomaung dii'ke masika'antaverii'naang Jiisuu' tee Kumponinge Pako'pari'nii' nii' domang-anta-koo, Kumponing Bauring ee'nara. Ee'noko tee, tee' masika'antaverima dii' domaang-po'nupoong otorii'naang bakaang miring-koo.

Nii' teing Kumponing bakaning. Baa tee naning Kumponing noru'ui otomaung teie tee nii' taaramurimaung ee'noko teie naninge Kumponing bakaang deeaunge tee nii' taaramuriaung, ee'noko tee'koo nii'ke tasi'pampimaung tee Tanuaang kara masikung minkuvumaung ee'noko tee tanuaang tosi minkuvumaung.

Ookara batei-koo Ovoring bakaang taamang dii'ke navurariri nkoverimaung-koo domang orara ninka poroma tee orari-antavaamaung tee diikaang navunavu. Dii' ninka nari' taamanirima amaiaa'oroa' bii'ka toonaakoo' duuku'arima. Teing aa'ning-pina' oro'nuka: kamo' kovere-pina', pionge avitoitoi nkavuko apo'uarukoo'. Napo' tee koi' sinang bi'uaruio' bita'au'nung bakei boo'.

Tee' nkoarima teinge siipa-po'nupoong taung sionairu-koo nkavaari poroma batanang-koo ee'noko tani' dovang-koo bempaariko' Piitai teke tankinuma tamung uu'aa' narunge deeko', daka'antavuriko taarevoroo'naang.
Napo' teing ookara ninka baito komperiai kapatau kompaamana' tumpari' nta'po'ning sirivaa'uko taamparavaing teie orarai, Sietani'ke, bai'uko.
Kapoo' nko-nko nkoveriaing tampa' diikaang domang-eta nkoverimatoai Ovoring-koo mintoompevurimaung-pina' noru'eri, naning-koo deea', Ovoring-eta barenku nkaveriaina' noru'eri tee diikaang moo';
Tarerariaing nii'nung naning maniku' ninka bakiaa' nkovu'neenga nii'noo' Kumponing noru'uaruu'neenga Iiso-pina', tee-pina' bakaang barenku meekung miru'nii' baavevuu'nuung-pina' duu-koo daang-koo.
Aung aa' bokiaama maku'au'nung, aa'paama, “A, tee deea'. Nii' Barabas piamorimang.” Barabasi tee bakiaa' bauko nantoong tavurima.

too'de-nupoong, tutung tampara noru' uraantavaavaing, kirokainuka-pina' noru'arimaing, bii'ka tampa' dee'anta-koo nari' piavoroma Kumponing tampa' dee'anta-koo piavoroaing, tang dootuu'arimaing nka Kumponing daang-antavaakoo';
Tee'koo Kumponinge kansi'keta deto a'dei' ookara-koo dau i'ampura teka tee miring pankaing deto basi ookara-koo mirinanka-koo avuu'.

Niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' iri' ninka pou'na'koong minkunaa naurampiru'nung kumponaang-koo bi'arava', nantoonge aavamaari minkuaapeu'ning-koo, teka nii'ke tee niikaange dutai ooampiru'nung minkuampimaung tee' meenasi ninka daurarong˜ otomanoo'keta neramparu'na'.

Ookara karavoto bakaning-koo tee' nari' daarivukoo'. A'noo' tee nii'ning kapoo' teing-koo karavotonanka-koo ivekeng otong noru'koo, ee'noko teinge noru'dopanukai teing mare'aama bii'ka orari-antavarimaung tee' napo' nii'ning Daari Meekung-kooning kara mare'aamana' nari'.

Ee'noko tenang kara-okovuresi-nkarai Banabasi naankai Paula' oovureta tenaankai beekaning mononopa'nanka kurumparetu'ning dere'uretu' orokoarema. Ee'noko teing nantoong karinga-aape kua'paretu' bokurema aa'purema,
Noru'eriai tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' pou' sira'antavuma Kumponing tee masika'pari otomaung bakaang maraka-anta-koo Ju'nupoong paku-koo teing tutuna'nupoong tero nauvuru'na'.
Naning dootuu'nung tamparama bakaang karang makosina' minkuvuaung tee, bakaang domang tosi-antavarapeu' ee'noko bakaang dootuu' daange.

Noru'eriaing kapoo' ninge naurampiring, aa'dampiring, ‘Naning botovotonaa' bakaang pankaing-koo dau basi deea'.’ Teinge ning too'demau'nung deemparako napo' dii' tee' too'dentaariainge. Ee'noko teinge nkaang kara taaravau'nung dei diikaang kara taaravaapeu'.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke teing Ju'nupoong masika'antavau'ning aa'puru', “Dii' nkaang kara nari' pinka'erimatoaing deeko' dii' nkaning barevare-nupoong masikeng otoriaing.
“Enang tee peera pankaing tavo'kuu' Iisipi'nameng-koo ee'noko Keenani-nameng-koo, ee'noko aa'na' tora'pau'. Ee'noko niumaraange taamang besi'aama ooaava'.
Ning tee bakei dotumaramang ninge ooaramira nii'ning teing-koo daurukaa'koo tampa' siompaako tee kara masikung, tee' ee'na' nari' Niumai botomuru'na'.
Tee naning bakanamuiaang tarevuriaung ee'noko baru'noo' bakanava pava, tee ee'nara penkemparing bakaang masika'anta-koo, oraka' nkoaring Kumponing noru'aavaing-eta boong basinoo'ka.
Tee'koo Kumponing-koo due'mariaing Jiisuu'nung erenge duu'muriko onou tuumpimaria' unaamori, ee'noko niikaang mono teie ntong kiiroraa'ke duu'murio', domang-eta aa'na' masika'antavampiri tee.
Teka tamung teinge ee' nari' taaramau': “Tee aung tee nii' tamuriko'nung enang tee minkunaa masika'antavampimaung daankivumang aa'nung tero turang-koo paaravuko'.”
Tee'koo ninge taamanirii'naang botorampimang dii' puring-antaruriaina'. Taaraveriai, dii'koo bore'keta dapo-koo navi' paa'aravaroo'naang.”
Ninge noru'ansi o'nong pankaroong banainge manki' kompeu'na' mintoontarama iirau'darava' pore' kompema nkaang miring-koo, ee'noko tee' nkorarama tee konteroaung.

Aa'noko teing donkaang pankareu' kapoo'koo baru' kei'oroi kanu'ariauka', teka to'biivui noru' ninka matauariri otoroai, tuumpiaariarupeu'na' biikaang masika'anta-koo, piaa-koo ee'noko kato purimpari oto'koo.

Urikamu' nantoong noru' otoroaruko'nang Kumponinge tamung oovuriko', teka enang tee Kumponinge ookara nantoong ookutunairu-kooning baka narung Kumponing masikung-anko bere'arii'naang botoaring tompimpuri'neeng-koo dama'ke.
Tenang tee Jiisuu' bauko-namainta ee'noko Maaria Kolopas ba'aang, ee'noko Meeri' Ma'dala-nani, teing ee'ning Jiisuu' bakaang aa'barata'koo due' donkonai otoroko'.
Ee'noko mononopa' tee-koo kurumpari otoko'nung ereng-koo du'munii', ee'noko bakaang miring “Tee Kumponing Bakaang Kara Okonara.”
Tanatarariai dii' purintaririning, naierima teing dii'koo aruaru'oroi otoroining orari-antaverereri'neeng.

Ee'noko boo'keta domang-antavuu'noo'koo tee' ee'na' napo' dera' aapearavauka'na'koo ee' daariari otong, ‘Teing biraankenanka meekeng Deevita' maraka-antavantu'ning masika' dii' arompiaing.’ (Aisaia' 55:3)
Te'mung ee'na'mung dii'ke noru'meriaing ning Mma'koo o'nong ee'noko dii' ning-koo otoring tee' ning dii'koo o'nomana'.
Nii'ke teing bakaning botonanka siompampima nii' teing ee' noru'ampimatoaing: Nii'ke doma tee Kumponing noru'ampiri otong.
Tee'koo naurampiring dii' diikaning oreng aarumo ninka dooriaing. Ee', masika', dii'ke ning ee'nara naning tammaramaung masika'antameriarura deeko' dii' oreng aarumo ninka dooriaing.”

Ee'noko teni ee'nanie manikumai ereng naivura kanu'ario' ooantu' teing-koong mmau'koong Kumponing bakaning meekupoong dupisi'uru'ning-koong, teing ee'ning Jiisuu'koo miring sira'paamaing. Ee'noko tenang ninge ooamira teni, ning bakei aa'na' ta'ninantu'.
Ee'noko dii'ke noru'eri otong dama'ke nkoaru'na' tee biraanke barenku okovenung-pina' nka-koo piavoko Kumponinge tompimpuu'. Taung paari-anta-koona' otoaruu' bane ta'due duu'paru' aa'na' besi'uma.
Ee'noko tee karika' iaampeema nii'ninge aa'paako', “Tee naning tampara.” Ee'noko nii'ninge aa'paako', “A, teie nantoong tosivurima orari-antavurimaung.”
Ovoringe teing aa'na' pakuvuriko'. Ee'noko karingai nantoonge masika'antavaarima Ovoring-aape bere'ariko'.

Teeo, Kumponinge tee makosinuka tammurira aroo'muri botomuru' tee doorenang tampara bereng-antavampii'naang. Tee'koo nii'ke enang sira'pampimang Kumponinge niikaang noru' paaramurimaung dotu-anta-koo, nii'nung naning dotu-anta-koo deea'.
Teka tampara tampampiaing Kumponing-koo boo'koong iri' opura domang amuru'nung-koo niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge.
Teni naaro masikani tampampimai teni baka otomai, sipuinani bakaang noru' Kumponing-koo narung-koo ee'noko baitoari otomai kunsiarama muunga ee'noko doonga.
Dii'ke mme' kapoo'koo nia'eria' nkaang miring-koo. Nia'erira komperiaing dii' dotue maanto'duriaina'.”

Da' tero naning-koo botovotonaa' deentari otoko Kumponinge bokuruu'nung deeko' tee' otoi simpiri'anta-koong taung besi'eauka'. Teka doona simpiri'anta-koong oro'parako deeko' makosi simpiri'daravaing.
Teing aing ee'ning tankatankaang nkoaamaing, kansi' bakaang onou-koo otoromaing, Tanuaang Meekung otoroaing.

Ning bakei ta'ninansi o'nong dii' da'deng bere'daririo' Kumponing-eta, tampa' bokururu'nung-eta dii' bauta'durii'naang Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke. Tee siperima ta'nina' nii'namurii' kara siong-koo tutumperu' “tampara doorenang” tamperima.
Ookara nantoong ninka mooa-koo oto'koo paarararimaatoai ee'noko meeka'dariri oto'koo. Naning meeka'paravaunge tee Ovoring oovuarupeu'.

Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke aa'muru', “Napo' sionung dua'eriaing bakaasi-koo tampanaang-aapei nii'ning barankiriaina'.” Ee'noko tee'puio' nii'ke sionung napo' dua'ampiru' ntong-koo, ee'noko dua'ampira mmau' kapa'nara' dau'pampira intampampiaruu'.
Dopa' toto' kapoo' deea', ee'noko toto'paravaung tee', kapoo' deea', teka Kumponing bakaang boto siong tee masikung.

Naning bakaang avuavu' nantoong daa'anta-koong deeko' domang dontong-antavui tee' nkovuaing. Ee'noko bakaang kapoo'nanka tankee'koong deeko' avusiro'ari tankaampuaing makosi. Ee'noko baa naning nantoong-koo pankaing, teie mataa'iari tarevurimatoaing teing. Naning napo' piaa ninka nantoong unaa-antavurimaung deeko', doturotuari tee' nari' nkovurimatoainge.
Ee'noko teie aa'puru' teing, “Dii'ke ee Tanuaang Meekung nkaveru'nung tenang dii'ke masika'antaverira tee?” Ee'noko teinge aa'pau', “A, nii'ke bakei taaravampia' tee Tanuaang Meekung otoing deeko'.”
Naning tee kupi'oko taara-koo aung kara nii'ke minkuampiring ane' karavotonane'koo noru'erira tonta'dariaing tee-ankoita, ee'noko maia'oaing tee.

Tee kapoo' ninge naurampimatomaung dii' mmaikori' tee aung: Tee nii'koo tamung bio' ereng tovang navaro tee okovuauka'nung tee barenku Kumponing bakaang muu'koo tunumpo'. Napo' teing kapoo'nanka paa'ariaining okovuriarupeu' tee kapoo' paa'aravauka' nung.

Iri' o'dariauka' taamang dera'omaung besi'koo. Teka kavi'eritaa' besi'eriai temurii' taamang domaang oparavauka'nung. Temurii' dera'oarupeu'. Tee taamang ninge, teie Naning-naumpo' Paning-etainge arompiaing, Mma'ke Kumponinge tee' nkoama'naang botomuu'nung-koo.”
Ee'noko nii'nang bane nia'eriko Kumponinge aruriaung tamung karakaraa'koo oto'derurii'naang piarorimaung-koo, Kumponing dotu-antana' noru'eriaruma.
Ookara batei-koo tampara tamperimaatoai tee-koo Kumponing tee Niuma, niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo.
Eebaraami' tee'ke, Daari Meekunge aa'pumana'koo: “Kumponing bakaang maraka-anta masika'antavuio' ee'noko Kumponinge bakaang masika'anta oovura naning koonto'nung tampuu'.” (Pupu' 15:6)

Tee temono osi pankaing tee duaa' ee'noko kaara aa'naanka teke oto'koo arakavarema makoturea', ai' te' te' Kumponing bakaang meenasi narunge arakavumanoo', ee'noko tee Kampia tee teke temono-koong daamu.

Teka dii' tee mono bakanameng-koo otoria', teka Tanuaang Meekung bakanameng-kooning, tee ee'nara Tanuaang Meekung Kumponing bakaang dii'koo otoing deeko'. Baa naning Tanuaang Meekung Karistoo'nung oto'evuaung tee, tee bakaang naning deea'.

Nii'noo'koo tee teing Isireeli-nupoong kente'uru'ning napo' bere'arira Karistoo' masika'antavaako deeko' Kumponinge tee napo' be'nu'uripeu' te' napo' kente'ariru'noo'. Kumponing tee purinto' oto'evung teing napo' be'nu'anta-koo te' unapo'.
Biikaang karang-koo naninge tosi minkuaako taaravuarupeu', napo' kiiroraa'nukai.

“Teka tee aung ning enang da'koo sira'maraa'naang: Ning tee Kumponing-koo dootuu'maramaung niikakatauro biikaang-koo tevung nerakavung daang-koonavung tampaamanavung siompansi, masika'antavansi teing ookutuning kapoo' Moosesi-nung botoi minkuvui otomaing ee'noko Kumponing-etaning nakaro-nupoonge tero daariau'ning,

Ee', komaaru maku'eri bakeveriaing tampamang, teka Kumponing bakaang piaa tee komaaru maku'paa' deemparako piaareeri otorimaatoai. Baa tee naning tee-koo miirinung piaavumaung Kumponing-nung boto tampa' siompumaung.
Ee'noko nantoonanka uipaarii'ke iirakutai taivuriko Kumponing bakaang miring barakosi'aako' tee teing ee'ning arikananka okora', napo' bere'arira Kumponing pankaing-anta-koo piavoroaruu'.

Ee'noko bakaang parang bakei pankaing deto isikung, karanaang kivora-ita kenaanka otoing. Ee'noko teke napo' karanaananka-koo koosinung kivora-ita kenaanka otorokoo', napo' mirinanka daariari otorong karanaananka-koo, teing Isireeli-nupoong kivora-ita kenaanka muu' kante.

Teka Karistoo'ke moo'muru' nii' tee boto-koong barakosi'keta bakaang monoi barakosi' kune'ura nii' pari'antamurima, tee' Daari Meekunge minkuvumana' aa'puma, “Ookara barakosi'po'nupoong koi'koo bi'aariaining.” (Boto 21:23)
Dii'ke ning noru'meri o'nong nkaang urikung otooto' Ju'nung aarumo-koo kuunge o'noko'na';
Teketa teie tee pakia pankaing moo'uu', tee boru' uripo'keta otomaung, tee ee'nara tee ma'naang, nii'noo' Sietani'.
Teka teke osi pankamono-koo tee naning miring Saimoni' aa'na' biivimparama otoko'nung ma'nari biikaang iri'ke ta'nimpaarii' nkovuma.
Ning tee Karistoo' bakei aa'na' noru'koo piamoi o'nong ee'noko tee bakaang iri' tee domang-antavuu'nung; napo' tee baike teie kompuu'nung tee' nari' kompampainge;

Ee'noko napo' tee naning dootuu'koo uranta deeng-anta-koo ta'nina' meeka'antaveauka' tanka' pante'ema. Tutung tasi'peaing arekee' oro' aung naning, orara deeko' da'koo pare'ara'neeng. Daka tanatararavai domang kiiroraa'dari otoaina'.
Napo' maniku' pankareu' tee' nari' Kumponing bakaning-pina' neriariri otoromaatoai, ukuusiaria' ee'noko nainai purinto'koo bi'aria'.

Tee tee-pina': Tee naning teni baurang nampeesiaravaing-koo pakuvumaung tee, kapoo' tampara teie nkovumaung; teka napo' tee naning teni tanatavumaung nampeesiaravaruko teie, tee kapoo' baru' tampara masikung nkovumaunge.
Tee kara tamung taaraverima tosirariauka', teka taaraverima nkoverimatoai.
Teketa tee dama'ke Jiisuu' Kaaleli'namenge nanuko'nung. Judia'namenge nanu'koo piavoaruu' Ju'koong ovontunge te' otoroko'ninge tavaava'naang piavoroko.

Kumponinge nii' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung si'muru', ee'noko Kumponinge Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang noru' okovenung deeng-antavuu'. Teie ee'narai nii' koonto'nuka deeng-antamuru' Kumponing-koo ee'noko Kumponing bakaning taa'ni'antanisinuka deemurira Kumponinge moo'muru'.
Ee'noko ntong diisi-koo koo'urai'nange nii' niikaang kau' duu' tutumuru'. Ee'noko napo' teie tauroi tokoaru'nunge piu'muru'.

Dii' e'mung otorina' nari' Kumponing iri'moi siompama aa'noko' avung-koo Jiisuu' sionavung-koo ning o'noinavung-koo otoroko'ning manki'antavarama nii'ning dupisi'antavarantu'. Nantoong aa'ning donkaang ee'noko maniku' dai'arama kiimata-koo siparanko'.
Teketa tee, ookara teing nantoong paroro-koo poru'ning pokapoka'ariru' Jiisuu'nung minkunaa tata'eema.

Aa'dampimang: Kumponing bakanavitu tampa' tanataverererimaatoai teing dii'ke tanata-koo si'duru'ning, tamung konteroritaa' deea', teka pia-ita nkoveriai Kumponinge piavomana'. Moo' narung noru'eri tanataverereriauka', teka aroo'keta tanataverereriai.
Ai' orara aarumoi tuu'neke'pina' tupu'murimaung boo'koong iri' ninka, ee'noko ee'nung iri' tee ee'nara boto nii' boo'koo tammurimaung.

Ooveriko, teing dii'koo mintoomparimaing mintoong daaka'deraariko tosiererima moo' pinka'evurererikoo', ee'noko tee ee'nara mooni' baku'erimaung Ovoring Iirakuta-koo punkang-koo biromparamang, teing kavu'nupoong biikaang birovirong ninka.
Tee'koo dii'ke taapo' tonta'eriaing teing aing aa'ning: too'deng, tositosi, kara narunge navu, mamairo ee'noko amutemurii' miring orari-anta.
Teni ba'aang tee ba'ung-koo bi'ari otong tenang tee domampari otoko, teka tee ba'ung boo'pari dei teni tee makosi napo' nampeesi-koo piavoaing ninka Kumponing-koo kuunge.
Tenaanka taung masikavung bekoi'uretu'naanka aa'purema, “Kumponinge ookara nantoong boo'keta daa'uru' tero.” Tee' minkuvurema nii'ning biikaang masika'anta orari-antavuretu'.
Nii' Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung o'noritaa' dopa' toto' ee'noko toto' deeaung kapoo' deea', teka teie baitoi deeko' piaa ninka nkoaramaung.
Ee'noko tee' mantompuio' Kumponinge makosi tampuu' tee domaang oparavaung oko-anta deemparaa'naang teing-koo nantoong tee aroo'aavaining-koo.
Enang tee ee'pina' mooni' oosieriaing teing Kumponing bakaning meekupoong paku-koo: Dootuu'nupoong Kalesia-nameensi'ka osi kante-koo nauarantu'na' nkoveriaing, ee'pina':
Dii' bii'ankaaru' dii'unkaampi-koo aroo'dariri otorimaatoai Ovoring bakaang kara aroo'erimana',
Jiisuu'ke napo' aa'puru', “Ning tee araka ookara kansi'koo. Naning tee ning siomuaing mutaananoo'ke nanuauka'nung, domaang isikung kompuinge ookara otooto' siraka'antavuio'.”
Teka ee mmaikori', dii'ke norunoru'eriaing tee kapoo'nanka niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaninge kara okovuri nkanukai dama'ke nkoaravaing sira'pau'na'.
Kapoo'koo apuka'paravaunge. Naninge bakaang birenge pakuvuarupeu', ai' teie ee'narai baka ookara nantoong domang ee'noko domaang avurimaunge ee'noko ookara kapoo'nanka.

Nantoonge kapoo' sira'paako masika'antavampimaung, teka Kumponing bakaang kara sira' tee deto basina' masika'anta-koo makosi, ee'noko aung kapoo' ninge naurampimatomaung Kumponinge ee'narai sira'puu'nung Jiisuu' Bauring tampuma.
Teka Jiisuu' Karistoo'pina' nari' otoriai. Orara aarumo nko-koo piaroria' mono bakaang pia siomperi.
Napo' tee' nari' Kumponinge botovuru'na' masika'antavai Jerikoo'nung parang ˜ke'munta-taa doonge koroaio' pesi'aru'.
Ee'noko Kumponinge Paula'koo amutemurii' kapoo' ta'ninta'ning oro'antavuu'.
Jiisuu'ke aa'puru', “Masika' naurampimang, nantoong teing oreng aarumo nkoaamaing botovotonaa'nupoong ee'ning, orara aarumoi dai'uri botovurimaing.
Ee mmaikori', tee' nari' Kumponinge piaamuru'nung deemparako nii' tee'ke naruna' naruna' piaameeriainge.
Dake tee ning tasi'antameing tevung domang-anta bakanavung. Noru'ansi o'nong da' ninka nari' o'noresi doturotue maanto'antameaina'.’ (Kena 16:8-11)
Moainoo'ke basi mataa'irari deeruevuriai tee Kumponing bakaang dariraari, daankierima ee'noko kara nau-antaverima.
Ookamenta-ita tee aa'na' iinkunumaarimaung, teka naka'mariaung. Bane papaaramariko, nka oraru'kampiaung.
Teka nii'ninge akapeu'aarima aa'paariko', “Aing uaini purinto'naru'ke maanto'antavaririning.”
Tee ku'nung tee kapang jasipa' narung-koo nkonii', ee'noko tee osi temono kooro narung-koo nkonii', kalaasi-pina' kiiroraa'koong-koo.

Teketa dootuu'nava-ita ˜kenaanka-taa koosinunanka siariko ooarantu' tee'ning arikananka napo' kompai. Mononopa' aa'na' kiiroraa', pipiraarie nopa'nii'nuka ee'noko murukeue kapeto tokonii' kooro-koo nkonii'ke keemounii'nuka.
Nantoong oraka' nkoraariaining biraankei maku'evurereriai, barakosi'ereria'.
Bakaang kau' baraasi˜ nta'ke ivai'nii'pina' oro', ee'noko bakaang aurong ntonanka uutuaramana' taara.
Ninge da' nau-antavarantu', ee'noko tee' nari' nkoamaa'noaing piaa pankaing oto'evurii'naang piaa ning-koo oto'derumana', ee'noko ning teing-koo o'noo'naang.”
Teie bauring orokovuaruu'nunge nii'koo baike kune'uu'naang, ookara kapoo' ee orokovupeu' bauring ninka nari' avu'koo? Makotua'.
Aa'daaru', “Dama'ke asi'namu' poroaing teing Kumponing daang-antavai benkempaavaining Kumponing-koo kupi'oroitaa' biikaang noru' karakaraa'koong pia narung siompai.”

Dii'ke tee irua' koi'koong keenavaang-koong nkaverima daangantariauka' teing kente'nii'nanka-ankoi. Daangantarima deeko' noru'eriaing keenavaang-koonge kaakenge dii' pinka'duri otong. Dii'ke kaakeng pinka'eria'.
Tenang ning mora tee diikaang baito booni'anta-koo piamoa' diikaang baito-koo tampa' donkoniri otoriko, teka ninge doturotu-aape-nameng-koo deeko' pakurampii'naang.
Nii'na'mung tee, naning Lasarusi tampaako'nung, Beetani-navuntu'koo otoko'nung siipavou'. Te' ee'noo' Beetani Maaria-namainta otoreko'noo' Maata'.
Tee'koo tee naning aung kara masikung dimpa'uaing deeko', naning dimpa'ua', Kumponing ee'nara dimpa'uing, tee Tanuaang Meekung arurimaung.

Tee ee'pina' tasi'periaing tee tanuaang kara okora' Kumponing bakaang deeko': ookara tanuaananka Kumponing-etaining teing tana'eriko aroo'aara sira'pariri aa'paavaining, “Ee', tee Jiisuu', tee Kumponinge teroita Pako'pari'nii' nantoong domampurira tarevuriainoo' koo masika' pou'nung koonto' naning-naumpui.”

Teka bane temurii'koong kiimata sira'pari otoko, teing aing nantoong tamung noone narung nau-antaraarima tee' nari' bii'ka biikaang mono orari-antavarimaung teing Sodom-nupoong nkoariko'na'. Teinge dimpa'aamaung tee Ovoring, ee'noko poore'aarikoo' teing koosinunanka˜ Kumponinge nerampurima nkovuru'ning.
Ee'noko oraka' nko-eta bere'arara tampa'nko nkovuaing, ee'noko teie tee mooa besi'uma siompui otoaing.

Teka dii' teing enang be'nu'antarariri otoriaing diikaang masika'anta ninka, tampa' e'maniri pinka'dariri. Teieta nempampimaung-koong noorupi-eta diiri'dariauka' tenang tee doorenang tampara taaraveru'nang nkaveru'nung-eta. Ai' tee tee doorenang tampara ookara-koo nantoong Kumponinge paninga boonamenge nkovuru'ning-koo daankiampimaung. Ning Paula' teie tee doorenang nkavui nanu' deemaru'nung.
Tee' minkuvuio' tee kapananka ukuau' tee too'paava'naang, teka Jiisuu' baku'arara tenkenuu' dootuu'nava pankava-ita.
Nerakanaung kuruntariai Kumponinge nkonii'naung, tee-pina' oro'naung, koonto'nuka, meeka'dariri otoriaina' masikung siomperi.

Enang tee noru'eriaing dii'ke Kumponing bakaning meekupoonge, kapoo' arikananka dii' paararurima tavo'kuko tee dii' purintariri mii'kiri otoriaing, Kumponing bakaang boto siomperi ee'noko Jiisuu' masika'antaveri.”
Teka teie Kumponinge boo'keta daa'uu'.
Ning tampara tarenara. Tampara tarenara bakaning-koo sipisipi'koo boo'parapeu'nung makosi.
Dii'ke taarameru' dee'ma tee kapoo' makensi'nung daarirerompiring-koonaare ning-koo sira'pura Kumponinge makosi-antamuu'na' bakaang piaa dii' nau-anta-koo.
Naning tee nantoong-koo pokapoka' nkovuaing deeko' tautaueai ee'noko kemu'kai nkovuko deeko' napo' tautaueai;
Aung aa' tee napo' Ju'koong ovontung pokapoka'ariru' teing kara taaravaara.
Ee'noko naning tee bakaang kara masika'antavumaung tee ee'narai sira'pui aa'pumaung, “Kumponing bakaang kara bakei kara masikung.”

Tee'koo dii' mmaikori' masikupoong, te'mung nemperimaing deentariko ee' naurampimang, purintariri otoriaing ku'mi'dopanuka, nii'noo' tuumpi otoriaing, Kumponinge tee ninka mooa-koo oto'nuka meu'duriaina'.
Nii'maikorori' ee, asi'nanaare anaare: Dii'ke kunsi-koo pakumereriai Ovoring bakaang kara iri'narung beremparara kuung deempuriaina' tee'pina' dii'koo meu'ke nkoaru'na'.
Aming-koo, nna' ee' masika' noru'ampiri o'noring, teie narunge Ovoring Jiisuu' boo'paru'noo'keta domampuu'nunge domamuriaing tee ninka, ee'noko dii' ninka nari' tavo'antamuriaing Kumponing-anko.
Napo' dii'koo nii'nung siipavomaung deeko' dootuu'koo urantanuka-koo botoaravaing, ee'noko teinge tee kunsiaavaing duunie sisi'aama Ovoring bakaang miring-koo.
“Tenang tee mare' karenaumo kivora deemparara ba'marang beero'koo piavoko', Isireeli baurukaa' tampaariko'ning.
Aung naning tee Ju'nupoonge moo'aara teinge tavaava'naang nkoaako ninge nkaning ninka piatooronuka ninka merira tenkeng-antavampira domampampirieeng, ee' noru'ampira aung tee naning Rooma'nung.

Tee'koo ookara nantoong temono osi pankamono-kooning purumpurunaving karakararearima naampa ninka ookara naro'doma-aape kua'pariru' Kaiasi naanka Aristakas barantaakiaaresi tenaanka Masedonia'nameensi'koonaanka Paula' ninka nari' nanaako'naanka.
Tee Jiisuu' naning meekung ee'noko koonto' tee tompimperira naning tavu'nko piaroru' Pailati'ke sing-antarerurii'naang.
Ee'noko noru' tankatankaang nii'koo meu'ke otoa' aa'noko nii' ee'noko teing, teka nii'pina' kiiroraa'uru'nung biikaang domang masika'antavaako.
Naning tee tutung baakeenearavaing baka mme' naivua' bakanavio' berete'koo ee'noko teru' tereng-eta.

Tee'koo mmaikori' ninge piaavarampimaing, ima'dariri otoriai diiri'daria'. Ookara batei-koo aa'na' kontariaing Ovoring bakaang mintoong-koo ee' noru'eri: Ovoring-koo mintoomarikotaa' tee niikaang moo' paa'aravauka'nung; boo'ke daka'puauka'nunge.
Tee tee enang nia'dampimang ning paarameri siomerii'naang.

Aa'noio' Kumponing bakaang matau-koo makosiaavaruu' teing kansi'nupoong Kumponing noru'koo bii'ka biikaang noru'ke. Tee'koo Kumponing dotuaru' teie minkunaa daang-koong tampaamaunge nii'ke daankiampimaunge domaang moo'uriaing teing nantoong masika'antavaavaining.

Dii' maniku' tee'ke, dii'unkaampi-koo boong otorimaatoainge ee'noko teing-koo nii'ning Kumponing bakaang kara siompaavaing deeko' teie tampara aarumoi dii' bii'ankaampi diikaange Kumponing-aape barampereriaing, karai deea'.

Ee'noko nii' teing enang Karistoo' bakaning kara okomuri nkanuka Kumponing nii'koo kuunge karoko nantoong bokuarampimaing, ee'noko nii'ke ookara Karistoo'koo aa'na' kevi'arampiri bokuarampimaang aa'pampima: Aarumo orara siperira Kumponing ninka navurariai.
Teka Kumponinge deto daa'antavuu'nung unaa-antavuma boo'ke sisikeera ninka tanke'pui oto'keta, ai' teie pinka'koo koonto' makosi deea' bakei.
Ee'noko Jiisuu' bakaang miring pankaing akapeu'aakoo', tee miring dii' biraankerariru'nung.

Tuumpiaa-peu'na' otoa', nani ba'ung-pina' otomaung, naikuma deeko' naikuma basiaramanoo'ka bakearamaung, onou siraka'pari otomaung, ovontung-pina' ka'duuro', naning navunavuro', siraka'pui nau-anta-nko, purinto'naru'ke kanu'aravaung, da'deng iira deeaung teka banainge oto', ee'noko tata'arava' oko'oko deeaung.

Nantoong teing ninge ntong avorompaining napo' nukaa'oroauka'nung. Teru' avorompainaru' teing-koo kuunge puunta-po'naru' deemparavaing ntong domaang-po'nung doong kante tavo'aramatoaina' teing-koo, domaang oparavauka'nung oto'evuriaina'.”
Teka tee naning bakaang kara pinka'umaung, teie tee tee-koo tee Kumponing bakaang piaa dupearamaung. Ee'noko tee'koo nii' Kumponing-koo o'norining noru'marimaung.
Ee'noko teketa ooansio' ma'nari beenaumo oreng dokoroko'pina' oro'nuka bakoariru' aing aa'ning beenaumo biikaang karang-eta: tee pakia, tee biiko, ee'noko tee nakaronung daang minku.

Daari Meekung-koo narung boto pankaing otong aa'pumaung, “Dake tee naning da'koo due'nung daka piaararamana' nari' tee' piaaveaing.” (Boontu 19:18) Tee tenaare makosina' dupe-antaverira deeko' tampa'.
Ai' nii' nii'ka minkumarima daankimaria', teka Jiisuu' Karistoo' Ovoring deempari otoing sira'pampimaung, ee'noko nii' teing dii' diikaning botovotonaa'nuka Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo.
Purintariri otorimaatoai tee' tosiraarima aavaraari'neenga. “Oreng ninka navurarima diikaang aarumo orari-antaraaripeu'.”
Teie Kumponinge niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' boo'keta daa'uu' sipisipi'nanka tarenara pankaing deemparaa'naang bakaang erenge kara naroong-anta o'paa' pinka'ura moo'muru'nung-koo;

Otori tee' teie doorenang tamparai Karistoo' bakaange tampui otoina' nari' otorimaatoai, bane ninge moma beero'dampiko ee'noko beero'dampia' dii'keta taapo'ke o'noko deeko', ai' ninge dii' teing narung onou-koo purintariri otoriko taara-koo piamoi o'nong, ee'noko narung noru' ninka pakureeri iveka'doriai tee doorenang tampara masika'antaveri.
Ee'noko asi'noo'ke teie bakaang purinto'ke deto daa'muriaing nii' niikaang mononanka tee' ee'na' Ovoring daa'antavuu'na' nari'.
Tee'koo enang ninge noru'antaramaang maia' sipei dakaang nko-nko aa'na' nkoveaing tee avuavu' Kumponinge aruu'nung kompei, ee'narai aruu'nung te'mung ninge tanka' pante'dantu'na'mung.

Ai' teie Kumponinge teing temu' boorou'ning tee' nari' tampara doorenang taara-antavuru' teing teing biikaang tanuaang domampariri otoroo'naang Kumponing domampari otomana' nari'. Ookara nantoong ninka nari' biikaang mono boo'koo barakosi'nii'nuka deempariko teie tee daankinang taara-antavuru'nung.
Da' tee moo'duu' moo'ke. Nantoong biikaang dai'nisi deentari otoauka'.
Ee'noko ukuusirariauka' Kumponinge pakururiaung-pina' tantarima. Teing-koo nii'ning tee' nkoariko'ning Orari-antai boo'antavuru'.

Ai' nii'ke tee Kumponing bakaang kara mooni' nka-koo daankiampiaung nii'ning nkoarimana', teka nii' nantoong aroo'po'nupoong masikeng, Kumponinge botomurio' Kumponing-koo dutakanoo'ke Karistoo'koo kuunge karompimaung.
Nii' ee'ning masika'anta-koo purimariri o'norininge tee teing aruaru'nanka pakuarampiaing, niikaang pia siompampia'.
Ee'noko ning tee'ke Ovoring-koo aroo'mari aa'pamaang, “Ning da'deng simpiri'antamaako dii'anko dama'ke moo'naang.”
Teketa napo' tee tankinuko koosinung karenaumo ooarantu' aung-koo kansi'koo karenaumo kunku'doi'koo donkonai otoroko doving avo'ai aing aa'ning uupuvuriaroo'naang: kansi', pirung, ee'noko koi'nanka.

Tee tee dii'ke teing-pina' nari' mutaanang-nupoong piavoromana' aing aa'ning nkoveriauka' temu' nkoveriko'na': maimaia'na' oto', mono bakaang pia siong, purinto' naru'ke kanu'anta, taamang tovang nainai nai-koo deikoo', ee'noko daang-koong dootuu', tee maarekusi'. Batei temurii' nko-koo tero tankinuing botu te'.
Ee'noko nii'ninge tenaanka tavaaree'naang nkoaareko deeko' tenaanka-koo karang-eta nta' bakoarara taivuriaing teing. Tee' ee'na' nari' booroaing teing tenaanka oraka' nko-koo piavoroaining.

Ee'noko Paula'ke aa'puu', “Ee mmarang, ninge noru'ampa' tee Kumponing bakaang piristi' pankaing deeko'. Masika' Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvui otong, ‘Dii'ke oraka' minkueriauka' tee nantoong diikaning tare-nupoong-koong narung.’ ” (Toro 22:28)

Teing nantoong ee' oro'nuka teing tee-koo osi pankamono-koo dama'du otoroaining, aa'ning: mosi'pina' nkoarimaing, dopa nkonuka, auning nkonuka, nantoong dupisi'nuka, kumponing daang-koong-koo dootuu'nuka, ee'noko ookara daang minku baukonuka karai ee'noko nko-nkoi.

Teka da'koo kapoo' ninge nii'ning oki'ning aarumo oreng otoko ooamaang, aa'noko dii'koo nii'ninge tee Beelamu bakaang nau-anta kompai otorong, teie ee'narai Baalaka' Isireeli-nupoong dua'antana' nau-antavuu'nung. Aa'noko tee taamang kumponing daang-koong-koo darinii' naiaava'naang aavavuru', ee'noko napo' kaukauro-koong aarumo nkoaava'naang siong-antavuru'.

Mmaikori' ee, nii'ke tee nau'ka tampara tampampimaung Kumponing dii'koo. Tee' nari' makosina' nko-koo, ai' diikaang masika'anta tampa' dupui otomaung-koo, ee'noko tee diikaang piaa dii'ka bereng-antaverimaung-koo.
Dii'ke noru'eri otong tenang dii' mutaanang-koo otoriko'nang Kumponing tositosinanka siompereri poorarima noru' masikung nkaveriaruko'.
Dii'ke bii'unkaampie dii'ankaampi piaaverereri otomatoai tee' nari' Karistoo'ke dootuu'nupoong piaavuri bakaang mono avaru'na'.
Orara orarai maku'eriauka'. Tampa' nari' nkoverimatoai ookara.
Boonkorariri otorimaatoai dii'ka-koo tee-koo Kumponing-koo tanka' purinto'koo kuung otori, tee batei makotuko tee deto si'duriaing dii'.

Teka tee bane tee' nkorurira teie koonto' si'duria' taa'ni'antavari, ai' teie tee tampa' nkorurimaung apo' dovang arurima paning-eta, bateinananka ookara kapoo'nanka tampa' sinampumaing arurikoo' diikaang domang unaa-antarurima taamang tovange ee'noko doturotu.”

Maniku', bii'ankaampi deeko' ai' pakupaku nkonuka deeko', napo' tee'ke, biikaang nko-nko masika'antavai otoroaing, miring orari-antananka deea', naiaama deekoro-antavariaing, kake'ii-nupoong ookara kapoo'koo.
Ninge tee teni batei avonsing bere'araa'naang, teka teni piavoaruing bere'koo, teieta bakaang aarumo kaukauro nko-ita.

Tenang Eeroti' teke Sisaria'ke otoko Taia'nupoong ee'noko Saidoni'nupoong naro' naro'arira nii'ning nantoong Eeroti' pinau-antavaava'naang botoaaru', ai' teie Eeroti'ke tee teing aing kemonora osi pankeng aa'na' munte'uri otoko'nung. Ee'noko teing mooa-antanuka porora tutung narung tee Eeroti' bakanava tanatavuko'nung miring Blastus tampa' karavaama mooa-koo eentavariru', ai' teing teing biikaang taamang tee daurarong bakanoo'keta nkavaako'ning.
Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “A, ning ma'naang o'noaung. Ninge Mma' daangampamaung ee'noko dii'ke ning daang-antamerimaung.
Ee'noko napo' doving pankaing duparu', boo'a pankaing ninka.
Ninge tee ee' noru'amaang: Tee kapoo'nanka baikenanka enanung batei-koo kompampimaatomaung tee kapoo' deea' tee-koo biraanke dama'ke nkavampiaing-koo.
Ee aing nkaning toire', Kumponinge tee diikaang oraka' nkonanka tonta'deruring-koo Karistoo' bakaang miring-koo; tee'koo ninge tee aung kara dii'anko daariamang.

Teie ee'narai domamuru' ee'noko bokumuru' meeka'mariri oto'koo, kapoo' tampara nkoampiru'nung-koo deea', teka tamung biraankemurii'naang baka marovuu'nung-koo. Tero aung kansi' mme' nkoaravaruko-ita Kumponinge biraankemurii'naang bamuru' tee-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo.

Teketa piristi'nuka-koo ovontunge ee'noko biikaang piatooronukai Jiisuu' ooaarai'nange bokiaama aa'pau', “Aa'barata'koo taakaveaing! Aa'barata'koo taakaveaing!” Pailati'ke aa'puru', “Dii'ke dii'ka nkaverira aa'barata'koo taakaveriaing. Ninge kapoo' ooampa' tuumpi-koo makosi.”
Tee domang-anta tee, teinge nakaro-nupoonge˜ urikupoonge Kumponinge avusiro'ari biraankemuriaina' naumaariko'ninge tampa' tasi'koo eentavarima besi'aako'.

Bakei, mmau' nantoong tosi nkonuka aunge kansi'ke avitoitoi nanaamaung, teing tana'eriko penkemparima aa'paamaing, “A, tee Jiisuu' Karistoo' naning-naumpui poaruu'nung.” Teing teing ee'ning tosi nkonuka ee'noko Karistoo'koo too'de-nupoonge teing.

Nii'ke tee aung naning taarapiika ooampimaung, turang-anta-nko ooampimaung ookara Ju'nupoong-koo ookutunairu-koo otoroining-koo, ee'noko napo' narunge biumaree' tevitu-koo nerakavitu tee Nasareti'nung siompaamanavitu-koo.

Ee', masika' tee minkunaa Kumponinge dooremuru'nung bakanamuiaang o'noriaina' naumurima, pankaing doorenang masikung, naninge daang-antavuarupeu'. Okora'noo' tee Karistoo', Ee'nara nii'koong naning deempari mono ninka tavo'arama sira'paru'; Nantoonge tuumpiaako Tanuaang Meekunge tee naning koonto' masikee-antavuko'; Koosinunankai ooaako'; Bakaninge daankiaako' ookara nantoong-koo; Nantoonge kansi'koo otoroi masika'antavaako'nunge; Ee'noko Kumponinge meenasi-koo deto nkavuu'.

Ee'noko apo' kamaarie moomparama kapang kaa'omana' kaa'ora paning-eta nantoong-koo dau kapang-pina' tumputumpurunang dua'ariru', nare'na'koo manki'noo' naninge kakau nkavupeu'noo' basi. Ee'noko teinge Kumponing bakaang miring barakosi'aako' apo'ke kapang-pina' nare'na' nare'na' aa'na' baikevuriko, tee tee arikananka-koo dau basi arikunge.
Teka tee kapoo' masikung nempampiri o'norimaung tee paning ee'noko kansi' nerakeng tavo'kureaing maraka-antamuru'na', te' aarumo koonto' narung otoainoo'.
Ee'noko paning tamung tani'pina' kai'aru', ee'noko ookara iu'nanka napo' mui'nanka diiri'ariru' otomanairu-eta.
Tee tee teie Jiisuu' Karistoo'ke Kumponing piavou'na' nkovuu'nung-koo meeka'mariri o'noring bakaang nko-nko nko-koo, namu'ke ookara batei-koo bakevui baka bakaang mono boontunamparu'nung-koo.
Kumponing tampara tampampimaung doong kante dii'koo ookara-koo ee'noko tantarampimaunge dii' niikaang kunsi-koo ookara-koo.

Teketa napo' kevoro'ka-navoro' oosi-koo urumpuma navoro' bakoaru', tevoro'koo daue naning ba'nanui otoko. Bainatu isikung kong-antavau' ee'noko taura' nantoong kansi'nupoong-eta mooa pari'uriko turampeema dupisi'eeaing-koong avau'.

Teing ookara botovotonaa'nuka dai'nisinankai biikaning teing okovoroi otomaing tampa' nari' noru'aariai. Tee' naueriaing nii'ninge Kumponing oraka' minkuaa'neeng bakaang kara nau-antavarampimaung ninka.
Tosireeria' otoai, ai' dii'ke tee, tee urikung onou tero tonta'eru'nung teing ninka bakaning aarumonanka ninka.

Teka aung kapoo' ninge da'koo ooamaang, dake teni manikuma Jesabel baka nakaronani˜ tamparamai taura'peio' nau-antavarama nkaning botovotonaa'nuka ako'ke be'antavurimaung. Ee'noko aa'ning-koo barevurikoo': kaukauro nko ee'noko kumponing daang-koong-koo darimpaamaung taamang nai-koo.

Teroita daariari otomaung Kumponinge koonto'nuka tampuriaina' teing avitevitu Ju'deeaing baitoariko. Daari Meekunge naumurimaung Kumponinge Eebaraami'koo tee tampara doorenang daankivuu'na' aa'puu'noo'ka: “Ookarai avitevitue da'koo biraanke nkavaavaing.” (Pupu' 12:3)

Ee'noko dii' ampa'doru'ning tee' Kumponinge puring-antaruri tautaururu'na' baurukaa' tanturi, Daari Meekunge aa'pumanoo'ka, “Ee nnuring, Ovoringe koong-antaruma kake'ii-antaruko tee tamunsi'nung-pina' noru'ema domang manki'doauka'.

Teing urantananka biikaning kara siomperimatoai ee'noko teing-koo boong otorimaatoai, ai' dii' diikaang domang tee teinge tanatavai otong dama'ke Ovoringe simpe'uriko maku'aavaina' noru'ai. Teing taura'perereriko teinge dotuariri nkoaavaing, orarunsiaria'. Teing orarunsi-antavereriaing deeko' pakupaku-koo nkakiriauka'nung.
Ee'noko tenang ˜kenaanka-taa muu' tavurima opurira Keenani-nameensi'koo teie teing barevuri oko-antavuru' tee temeensi' tankaampurira.

Nii'nung naninge nii'namuau kara nauvuriaing deeko', ee'noko naroomparavaung tee ninka kara masikung niikaang Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'ketaing deeko' ee'noko naroomparavaung Kumponing siona' aarumo-koong nau-anta ninka deeko' tee baka daangange poo-antavaramaung, kapoo' noru'uaung, tamung tata' tutung-koo oraka' piavomaung ee'noko minkuminku tamung karananka-koo;
Nii'nung naning oovunamurii' naunau ninka dii'anko poko deeko' diikanoo' pava-koo bokueriauka', ee'noko onkeonke'eriauka'.
Nii' teing Karistoo' ninka nari' arikung deepo' kune'ampimaing deemariri tee napo' tee' nari' Karistoo' ninka aa'na' domang kuaa'antai maanto'murima nii'ning-koo pare'ampikoo'.

Piaaru'nuka teing, ai' teing teing Keini' bakanavung siompaamaing baara'ma'nung dupisi'ura barakosi' nkavuu'nung. Napo' Beelamu mooni' nka-koo daanameng-koo baka avario' dupisi'au'na' avarikoo'. Ee'noko Koora bakaning-pina' nari' Kumponing-koo bei'bei'arikoo', ee'noko nari' orari-anta kune'aakoo' tee' urikamu' Koora dovang doonko tumpariru'na' kansi' kamaankuio'.

Teka teinge ainge nau-antanukai aming kapoo' noru'aavaung tamung kato poore'aakoo'. Ee'noko teing kau' karenaumonanka matauropananka-pina' onouaamana' onouaakoo'. Ee'noko kapoo' mono-aapenung onoue narunge noru'aamaing tamung kato nkoaama orariarikoo'.

Napo' Nooa' tee'ke, Kumponing-koo mee'du'piari teie kara masika'antavura aaka'nareng ta'nampuu' tee baurukaa' ninka domamparii'naang, Kumponinge siingoravuio' kapoo'koo mme' oro'paravaung-koo. Nooa'ke tee' nkoarama ookara nantoong kansi'koo-nupoong kiimata-koo-nupoong sira'puru'. Ee'noko Kumponinge tee naning koonto' tampuu', barenku-pina' miru'ui masika'antavuko oovura.
Teva meekava tee' neriau'noo'keta teing piristi'nanka tee aivitunavaro-koo doong kante tumpariko' biikaang nko-nko dootuu'koong nkoaava'naang.
“Dii' bakei nantoong kontenuka, mutaananuka noru'koo ee'noko tasi'koo. Doong kante dii'ke Tanuaang Meekung bei'bei'erimaung diikakatauro nkoariko'na' nari' nkorarima.
