Naninge tampa' kompuaing deeko' ee' noru'uaing: Boto tee Kumponinge koonto'nanka-koo miru'ua', teka aing aa'ning-koo miru'uu': teing kara toto'paamaing kupi'oroma, Kumponing sipai orara aarumo nkonuka, dootuu' sipai Kumponing dotu-anta-koo makosi deeaing, biumaraang, biukorovoori ee'noko nantoong dupisi'aarimaing, nantoong maniku' ninka bakiaa'eemaing ee'noko nii'ning ninka nantoong ninka, nantoong tamung bakiaa'aarima baaveaarimaing, tosi baukonuka, ee'noko maraka toto'nuka;
Nkaang karavoto daariantu'nung dii'anko aa'pama, “Navurariauka' kaukauroarima otoromaing ninka.”
Aung aa' tee teketa ning-koo kapoo' nkoaru': Tee tee ning ponto'maravaruko Kumponinge tero miru'muu' bakaang kara-okomui-nka deemaraa'naang;
Nkaang nko-nko tampa' noru'ampaunge, tee kapoo' tampara nko-koo piamomaung tee nkoampaung, teka tee kapoo' orara tampamaung nkoankoo'.

Teka deto du'duriaing Karistoo' noru'koo, tee niikaang Ovoring Domang-anta, ee'noko bakaang piaa nka-koo. Tee ee'nara meenasi ookara okovui otoaing enang-eta deto bera te'mung doong oparavauka'na'mung. Ee', tee' nari'.

Nii' teing Karistoo' Ju'deeaing-koo daankiampiko kanu'nanka-pina' noru'maarimaing; dii' teing nantoong tamung norukasi'nuka tantarimaing Karistoo'koo. Napo' nii' aruaru'nuka; dii' purinto'nuka. Dii' deto noru'daarimaing; nii' doonko o'norimaing.
Tanka'ni'periai tee diikaang masika'anta-koo e'maniri, ee' noru'erima Karistoo'koo nii'maikorori' tee' nari' sisikeera kune'aama Sietani' bakaang avoro'anta dimpa'aakoo'.

Napo' dii' botovotonaa'nuka diikaning kansi'kooning ovontung taaraverererimaatoai ookara kapoo'nanka-koo, tenang dutai ooraario' naro' deea' tampa' ooraariaina' noru'eri, teka aroo'dariri mintoontarimaatoai Ovoring-koo mintoona' nari', naning-koo deea'.

“Teing kaintananka oovemaatomaing teing kivora dauraronanka, teka mme' dauraronanka deemparia' batei makotuaruko, teka narung doong-koo oki'ning batei naing-koo, dauraronanka deempariaing tee ninka biiko ninka nari' otoroi.
Enang nii'ke nkavampiring tee Tanuaang, tee kansi'nung deea', teka tee Tanuaang Meekung Kumponing-etaing tee nii'ke noru'ampii'naang teing avuavu' biraankemurima Kumponinge amuru'ning.
Enang ooveriko dii' kavo mmau'po'nupoong, enang bairarima birontariaing arikananka kune'eriaining-koo.

Aroreauka' teing-koo kapoo' arikananka dake kune'eaining-koo. Ee aung, Sietani'ke tee paara-anta-koo dii'koo nii'ning kiimatanava-koo sipurii'naang, kivora doong-koo arikung-koo otorii'naang, teka tee aroo'dariri motekaro'nuka otoriaing bane boo' dovang-koo, ee'noko maku'koo ninge tee dii' piiko-nupoong avuavu' tampara arompima tee baakopo domampari oto'koong kuruntampiaing.
Nka da' tee Kumponing bakaang naning avo'daravaing tevete-ita; koong-antararavaing koonto'aape, Kumponing-nung masikung aarumo-aape, masika'anta-aape, piaa-aape, e'maniang-aape, dooroonto'aape.
Ee'noko dii' teing nantoong koonto'nuka tuutunampererima dupisi'erererimaing bii'ka avo'avo'daariaruko;

Te' napo' tee daurarong ba'nanui otoko'noo' kenaanka kivora-ita karenaumo ovontumpariri ba'nava'nani'nankai koroai otoroko'. Teing-koo ba'nava'nani'nanka-koo kenai'ka-ita karenaumo nii'ning ovontung ba'naniai otoroko', mononopa' kakaara kurunii'nuka ee'noko bore'koo kooro-koong baakopo kurunii'nuka.

Tee-koo baka deto basi-antavaramaung-koo tamung kavonanka barampuma ka'numparava' otoi temono maukoverima tora'antaveriaing bakaang taarapiika-koo makosina'. Baka ee' noru'arakoo' biivimparama, aa'pukoo', ‘Ning bakei ovorinaang, naaro deea', orarunsimarava' o'noainani.’

Napo' tee' nari' dii' bii'unkaampi teing ninka dii'ankaampi ninka mataurariri otorimaatoai makosina' deto deeng-antavereri teing baru' iri'oroaing deempariko, ai' teing teinge dii' ninka nari' tee barenku okovuriaining biraankerurira domang-antaruriaing-koo. Tee' nkorariaing diikaang kunsi avo'aravaroo'naang.
Ninge taura'pampa' nani manikumai donkaang nau-antavurii'naang nii'na' donkaang-koo deto basi oto'koo. Teni dooroompari otoaing.
Kumponinge ee'narai tee' bokururu' Bauring Jiisuu' Karistoo' niikaang Ovoring ninka domang nari' oto'koo. Kumponing tee bakei makosi masikung nii' tee-koo baitomariri oto'koo.

Dii' mmaikori' unaarori oto'koo bokururu'ning, teka unaarori oto'koo otori diikaang mono bakaang pia narung siong-koo taura'dariauka', teka piaareerima pakureeriai dii' nii'ning-koo botovotonaa'nuka noru'dariri.
Dii' teing Karistoo' bakaang boto-koo kuunge unaarori otorimaing, tee'koo tampa' karerima unaa-antareerimatoaing, ai' dii' teing teie botoi Karistoo' bakaange simpe'ruriaining.
Teing nko-nkonanka tee amutemurii' otorong, teka narung masikung Ovoring Jiisuu' Karistoo'.

Teinge nkavau' tee Kumponing bakaang maramaraka, biikaang muu' oko'bosi-nupoong biurukaa' deemparira. Ee'noko tee Domang-anta, Karistoo' tee biikanamuiaang-koonge, ee'nara Kumponing, ookara-koo dau basi deempari daangang-po'nung o'paa'na'. Ee', masikung.

Ee', kapoo'ke manki'antamuriko tee makosi, dii' Koorin-nupoong domang unaarori domantariaina' tee'. Ee'noko tenang nii'ke domang kuaa'morimanang dii' napo' domang kuaa'dorikoo', ee'noko puring nkaverikoo' ookara batei-koo teing manki'nanka puru'koong nii'ke nari' mantompampimaing.
Enang tee Kumponing narunge ookeng dii' ee'noko nii' ima'antamurimaung Karistoo'koo.
Ee'noko aurong napo' karou' kemu'kana' aa'puma, “Aming kapoo' Kumponinge kiiroraa'antavuing dake kapoo' ku'mi'po'nung tampema poore'eauka'.”
“Tenang teinge dauraronankai ookara kansi'koo-nupoonge teni ninka nari' aunimpeema kavo tankampeemainge ooaara tee ii teni taivuko teing teing orarunsiarima birompariaing teni-koo.
Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Baa tee naning ning piaamumaung nkaang boto siompuaing. Ee'noko Mma'ke piaavuainge. Mma' ee'noko ning mereaing tee-anko; tee ninka o'noriaing.

Tee'koo ee'na'koo piaa masikung nii'ke oo-koo makosi, nii'ke Kumponing piaavampiru'nung-koo deea', teka teie nii' tutung piaamurira Bauring botovuu'nung-koo tee iira Kumponing-etaing niikaning oraka' nkonanka-koo o'antamemurii'naang.

Teka baata teing araka-koo otoromaing tee Jiisuu' araka-koo otoina' nari' teing teing oovuning ninka miirumpei otoromaung, ee'noko teie erenge Kumponing Bauring Jiisuu' Karistoo'koonge tee tonta'urima biikaning oraka' nkonanka-ita kiiroraa'antavuripeu'.
Tee tee enang Kumponinge tampa' nkoruio' da' tee enang bautara-ita bakeraring ee'noko tee da' bauring deentaring, ee'noko bauring deeko' tee da' barenku okoruinung.
Teka Bauring-koo napo' ee' daariari otong, “Dakanoo' ovorintari ba'nani'doma tee tee' nari' otomatoainoo' da' Kumponing, ee'noko dake tee dakanamuu' koonto'na' taa'ni'antarari tanataveri otoainge.

Ju'koong ovontunge napo' Jiisuu' maku'aama aa'pau', “Nii'ke da' kapang na'nang-koo piamoria' dakaang nko-nko tampara-koo, nka dake Kumponing akapeu'emaung-koo, da' tamunsi'nung naning daka Kumponing tantaramaung-koo.”

Ee'noko tee ii teing kiimatanuka taivuriaing-koong tee deto tee' nari' kutekuteivui tuuvui otomatoaing uaa otoa', doong kante, muung ee'noko doong, tee' nari'. Teing ee'ning tee-koo biiko-koo ee'noko tee bakaang baka-oo-koo dootuu'arimaing ee'noko napo' baata teing bakaang miring-koo moo'do'anta nkavau'ning.
Tee'koo Kumponinge piaamurira tee araka oko-antamuri bereng-anta-koo botomurio' tee nii' iri' o'maria' sira'pampimaung.
Tee'koo tasi'pampiri naruna' naruna' aa'pampimaung, “Ovoring tee nkaang pakupaku, ning amorompauka', bane baie arekee' nkomuko.” (Kena 118:6,7)

Teie naninge naro'keta naivumaunge tee kerempumaung orara tampuauka'nung. Ee'noko teie kerempumaunge tee naro'keta naivumaung orara tampuauka'. Aming-koo, nna' ookaanka Kumponinge onkeonke'uresi otoreng bakanaanka botovotonaa'ka deemparesi otoree'naang.
Enang tee, Kumponinge domang kuaa'antamuri mii'kampiri o'norii'naang pakumurimaunge navu-antaruriaing Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang aarumo siomperi otoriko.

Tee tee teing-pina' nii'ning piristi' pankeng-pina' deea' kanto'puriaruma a'munte'munge boontunang nkoaako'ning-pina' tutuna' bii'ka biikaang oraka' nkonanka-koo ee'noko dama'ke ookara nantoong biikaning-koo. Teie Jiisuu'ke tee tee-koo orara aarumo otoaruko boontunang naro'ka bakevui nkovuu' tenang baka avari boontunamparu'nang.
Teka naning narung kapoo'nanka aung kansi'koong oto'evui deeko', ee'noko ba'maiko' ata'kuko teie tamung dutai oovumatopeu', arekee' Kumponing bakaang piaa tee-koo kuung otoing tamparapeu'? Makotua'.
Aa'pamaang, aa'na' purimariri o'noring, teka aa'na' deepo' aung mono sipampira Ovoring-anko o'norii'naang piamori otong.

Ee mmaikori', dii' teing tavora-nupoong ee'noko damisimainku-pina' anke kansi'koo otoriko ninge eturampiri aa'dampimang: Donta'dariri otoriai mono-aapening piananka-ita teing dii' domang turanturi otorimaing-eta.

Nantoong ookara makosina' deto basi-antavererimaatoai. Teing Karistoo'koo dii'marang piaaverererimaatoai. Kumponing-koo aa'na' amaiaa'dori otoriai, ee'noko kansi'koong daurarong deto basi-antaverimatoai.
Ee' noru'ui, ‘Ainge mmarange tasi'pai otong Kumponinge nkaang birenge moo'uriaina'.’ Teka teinge tasi'paava'.

Tee' ee': Tarerariri otorimaatoai teing-koo nantoong-koo Ju' biikana' dootuu' koong taa'ni'anta kong-koo eturaarimaing-koo, ai' teing nkaunanka makosinanka, kapoo' oreng nkoaama mono-nameng-koong taa'ni'antai daang meeka'parimaing dopa' napu' dovang nkoarima.

Tee' oro'nuka teing bii'ka Kumponing noru'ai otoining sirakura' tampaarimaing, teka teinge oraka' nkoaama penkempaakoo' tee. Bakei Kumponing-koo maremaare nkonuka, meumeevanuka, ee'noko kapoo' tampara nko-koo makosinuka deea'.
Ooansi sira'pampeu' teing biikaang aarumo avarimana' Kumponing-koo, nka tee avariaina' makosinoo' siraka'paria'.
Teie nii' dunsirunsi˜antamurimaung teing-koo niikaning arikananka-koo nii'ke napo' teing arikung-po'nupoong dunsirunsi-antavarampii'naang tee' nari' nii' Kumponinge dunsirunsi-antamurimana'.

Paarararavai daka matauari oto'koo Kumponinge makosi-antaruaina', naning matau-pina', dakaang nko-nko-koo maia'koo makosi deeaung-pina'. Tee' kompeaing tee minkunaa Kumponing-etaing kara masikung makosina' miru' koonto' sira'pei.

Tee ee'nara naning taarapiika deto basi tamparavaing ookara ovontung-koo nantoonge boontuaarimaing-koo. Ovontung turampuriainge bera dootuu'nava pankava Kumponing-nava koinurai'nange ba'namparara ee' minkuvuaing: “Ning tee Kumponing.”
Dii'ke biumaraange diurukaa' iirang-antana' nkovereria' otoai, teka tampa' tanataverereriai Karistoo' bakana' kake'ii-antavereri, bakaang kara bare-antavererima.
Nka tee, bane aing ookara kapoo' kune'ampiainge nii'ke tee bakei aa'na' puru'ampiaing Karistoo' ninka nii' piaamuru'nung ninka.

Ee'noko tenang nii' ookara kansi'koo doonko dua'marira ninge aurong taaravantu' Iiburuna' karoma aa'muko, ‘Soolo, Soolo, dake aming-koo ning manki'antamemaang? Nkaang kara dimpa'ema daka baikeraramaung irinto' deemparako.’

“Ninge tee dakaang nko-nkonanka, arikananka ee'noko ata'oi'dari otomana' noru'ansi o'nong, teka da' tee tanuaang-aape maneenara. Napo' teinge Ju'nupoong tamparimainge oraka' minkuraamana' noru'ansi o'nong, teka teinoo' Ju'nupoong masikeng deea'. Teing teing Sietani' bakanavitu-kooning.

Piaa tee baka daangang deea', nantoong baa'pina' noru' deea', makotua'na'nko deea', baka nii'ning puru'na' besi' deea', iirankesi' deea', orananka-koong deeru tarevua' otoo'naang, mero' noru'uaung, dotuaravaung orara-koo, teka doturotuarakoo' kara masikung siompaamaing ninka.

Tee'koo teing aing aa'ning enang siperiai: aarumo ku'mi' ee'noko domang orarai maanto'ui oto'; ee'noko tee kara Kumponing bakaang dii'koo keempuko baroromperira aroo'eriai, tee tenaarei dii' domang-anta-koo makosinaare.
Ninge keempantu', napo' Apolosie duu'puu', masika', nka tee Kumponinge baka du'antavuu'nung tee sinang.

Teketa kenaanka-nung koosinunge napo' siompui pou' aa'puma, “Dua'aring, dua'aring Babiloni'namono, osi pankamono, nantoong ookara kansi'koo-nupoong teru' oraru' uaininaru' nai-antavuru'namono. Tee uaini tee bakaang orara aarumo kaukauro nko-koong.”
Ee'noko dii' ninge mmaikori', kapoo' ninge botorampiring nkoveriaing deeko'.
Dii' ee'ning toirekaa' oki'nareka' teieta kumponinanka daang-koong-eta tonta'dariri otoriai. Ee', ee'na'.

Teing-koo nii'nariong tee pavanankai tamung koinaamaung maniku' aruaru'nanka biikaang kara-koo bi'antavaarii'naang, maniku' orara aarumo ninka manki'oromaing, noru' avitoitoi eearimaing kapoo'nanka amutemurii' karaa'aama.
Otoa', masikung narung minkuampima piaameeritaa' ootukumariri panka'mariaing Karistoo'naummariri, tee-koo kuung o'nori, niikaang bore' deemparako.
Tanuaang Meekunge tee dii' narung deeng-antarurining, teka aa'na' paarararimaatoai narung deentariri oto'koo mooareeri otorima.
Ee'noko teie aa'puu', “Da' baa Ovoring?” Ee'noko aa'puu', “Ning ee'nara Jiisuu' dake manki'antamemaung. Nkaang kara dimpa'ema daka baikeraramaung irinto' deemparako.”

Teka diikaang domange Karistoo' pankaing-antaveri otorimaatoai diikaang Ovoring deeng-antaveri. Ookara batei-koo maamurariri otorimaatoai nantoong nia'daariaining nauereriaina' okora'noo' dii'ke tee Ovoring bokururiaing nemperi otorimaung-koo, teka dooroontariri doonko noru'dariri tee' nauereriai.
Ee'noko Ovoringe aa'puu' tee, ‘Tee boonamante˜ basi'daravai kau'keta. Te' kansi' da' donkonii otoinoo' meepo'.

Tee tampara doorenang dii'ke tutuntoma-ita taaraveru'nung tee Jiisuu' tee teroita Kumponinge Pako'pari'nii'koong tee tampa' pinka'eriaing ee'noko tee'koo dii' teing Bauring-koo ee'noko Bauma tekang-koo otori otoriaing.
Masika' naurampimang, naning tee nkaang kara siompumaung booauka'nung.”
Teketa pankaing ba'nava'nani' kakaara ooantu', ee'noko teke tee-koo tee naning ba'nanui otoko'. Kansi' ee'noko paning tonta'aretu' teieta taapo', napo' oo-koo makotua'.

Napo' dii'ke aa'peri otomaung, “Taamang tee pakosii'koo makosi ee'noko pakosii' tee taamang-koo makosi.” Teka ampa'doriauka' asi'noo'ka Kumponinge tee ookaanka tamunsi'naanka deeng-antavureaing. Nka niikaang mono arekee'? Kaukauro-koo makosi deea'. Niikaang mono tee Ovoring-koo makosi ee'noko Ovoring tee'ke, niikaang mono-koo makosi.
Dii' tee' nari' noru'dariainge: Oraka' nko-koo dooru'ning ee'noko napo' domantaririning Kumponing-koo Jiisuu' Karistoo' ninka.

Teka tampara masikung tee-koo Kumponing, ai' teie tee Karistoo'koo kuunge aroo'antamurira siong-antamurimaung ookara batei-koo ookara kapoo' puru'uu'na' sirakura' oro'antavuma. Ee'noko nii'koo kuunge tee Karistoo' noru'koong noru' avitoitoi bereng-antavukoo' nuuraa' tampa' ka'mi'pina'.
Aung tee doorenang nii'ke taaravampiru'nung teieta Bauring-eta dii' naurarampimaung: Kumponing tee araka ee'noko tee tee-koo oki'noo' mutaanang otoa' bakei.
Ookara nantoong Mma'ke amuko ning-anko poromaing. Ninge bata'aramparupeu' ning-anko poroko.
Dii' Karistoo'koo namaia' deentariri tee' nari' piaareeri otorimaatoai.
Tee'koo ookara batei-koo nantoong tee-koo kuunge Kumponing-koo poroaining Jiisuu'ke tee teing domang-anta-koo makosi, ai' teie tee' nari' domampari otoi eentavarama pakuvurimaung.

Teinge kara maku'aama bokiaama aa'pau', “Taveaing! Taveaing! Taakaveaing aa'barata'koo!” Pailati'ke ee' nia'uru', “Dii' ee piarorimang tee ee'nara diikaang daurarong taakavama'naang aa'barata'koo?” Piristi'koong ovontunankai maku'aama aa'pau', “Nii' daurarong oto'memuria', dauraronuka biikaang pankaing, Siisa' narung oto'memuring.”
Tee tee ee'nara tee' nari' enanavarang-koo teing ee'ning taakeng otorong Kumponinge bakaning miru'uru'ning bakaang piaa-koo okora'ario'.
Teni teni dauraronanka ninka kansi'koo-nupoong ninka aunimpeema otomai ee'noko ookara nantoong kansi'nupoong kanu'antavurikoo' tee bakaang uaini auning-koong aarumo nai-antavurima.”
Piaareerimaatoai navurariritaa' namaia'pina'. Otori deto noru'deeri otorimaatoai.
Teing nantoong Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang Meekunge siong-antavurimaing teing Kumponing baurukaa'.

Ee'noko teketa napo' nii'nung taa'ni'anta oro'paru' teke paning-koo, narung kapoo' pakia-pina'oro' aa'na' pankaing urumpumaung, bore' ˜kenaanka-taa ee'noko kaintang kivora otoing, ee'noko napo' baakopo ˜kenaanka-taa kurunii' bore'koo.
Ee'noko nii' Kumponinge baurukaa' deemariko barenku oko-antamuriai Jiisuu' Karistoo' ninka, a'noo' tee nari' baike kompampira tee ninka deeko' bakaang biraanke nari' kompampia'naang.
Teing dootuu'koo urantanuka dootuu' tampa' tareaarimaing nantoonge napo' moo'ke deto moo'aariaing makosi, baru'noo' teing pore'oromaing daankiaarima ee'noko nau-antavaarikoo'.

Nka tee ookarai nantoonge aung amurii' noru' noru'aava'. Nii'ning tee nantoong dii'koo-nupoong aruaru'nanka teroita, temeng-koo datavoroi otoromaung, taamang daring mme' masika'antavai otong. Ee'noko teinge temurii' naiaama pankaruntoonge tee noru'aripeu' oraka' nkoarimaung.
Teie ning-koong kaumpe' ookara tooto'umaung teing sinang bi'uriaing. Sinang bi'umaing kaumpe'nanka nerivumaung nii'ning napo' mmau' sinang bi'uu'naang.
Apoapoo'erereriauka' teing tanataverererimaing teka tampa' ooraari siontaariaina' nkorariai.
Enang tee dii' nii'maikorori' teing Karistoo' bakaning boorou'ning-koo tampa' naurarampii'naang piamorimang dii' orarun-sirariauka'na', tee' nii'ning nkoarimana' Karistoo'koo nemparia' otoromaing.

Napo' teing Isireeli-nupoonge naro'ke Kumponinge barampurio' masika'antavai tee pirung miring Urung pako'au' kansi'pina' koverenoo'ke kato, teka teing Iisipi'kooning kare-nupoong bata'aarima tee' nari' pako'koo paaravaama teke ke'nuru'ariru'.
Ee'noko tenang ee'nang Moosesi tee tooto' kirokai ponto'aru'. Ee'noko beekuri kaara-koo baumaraange pava-koo kuunga tareau'.

Teing teing ee'ning piristi' pankenanka kansi'kooning deempariritaa' makenge mantompai koong-antavaaripeu' noru'kaavaing ee'noko teing akovung sionuka, ai' teing teing nari' teing-pina' aruaru'ke kuung deempuri otong.
Muung tee enang oparama nanuko tane'ke due'uing. Enang kiru'marira dua'ampiaing teing nko-nkonanka muung bakaning ee'noko nepu'mariaing aarumo tamparai araka-koonunge.
Dii' oko-nupoonge tee tampa' tarevereriainge teing diikaning tee' nari', mau'mau'ereria' ee' noru'erima: “Nii' ookara taremurimaung otong teke paning-koo nari' noru'muri, duukung sipuaunge.”
Doturoturarimatoai teing ninka doturotuarimatoaining ninka nari'. Biromparimatoaining ninka nari' birontarimatoai.
Tee dakaang domang ivekung bere'daravaunge mmau' deeng-antavemaung tee iirananka Kumponing-etananka, ee'noko tee oro'paravaing asirana'mung bakaang kiimata koonto'nanka sira'puaina'mung.

Teka teing Ju'nupoong turampaareko'ninge Antioko'keta ee'noko Aikoniami'keta porora nantoong noru' bere'antavaario' teinge Paula' kapange too'pau' ee'noko osi-koo dama'du barampaara dua'au' boo'paru'nung-pina' noru'aama.
Teketa Jiisuu'ke tee' minkuvurai'nange domang oraka' dee'ou', ee'noko sira'pui naumurima aa'muru', “Ninge masika' naurampimang dii', narunge dii'koonge tooka kompui ning kare-nupoong-koo simuaing.”

Teka Daari Meekunge tasi'antamuru' nii' ookara orara aarumo-koo kuunge dai'mariri paapaa'marimaing, boto sionavung-eta bere'marira Karistoo'koo baitomariaina' Kumponing ninka naroomarii'naang. Tee' nkomariko deeko' Kumponinge dupe-antavuaing tee bakaang maraka-anta koonto'nuka tampuriaing-koong teing masika'antavaamaing.

Ee'noko tenang tenaankai nakaronaanka bakevureko tee beekaang kara sira', tee biiko teieta dinkung tumangropa-ita bakoaravainge tee tavu' tutumpuaing tenaanka-koo, ee'noko tavurema puru'ureta bakei dupisi'uree'naang tenaanka.

Ai' nii' Karistoo'koo, Tee Pako'pari'nii'koo, nari' tampa' noru'mariri o'noriaining deeko' bera botu basinoo'ke, nii' teing tee ninka nari' biraankemariri manta'nuka o'noriaing. Teka enang batei aung nii' pinka'mariri o'noriainang. Ampa'moriauka'nung Kumponinge tautaumurima ee' daarivuu'na',
Teka Karistoo' dii'koo otoko deeko' tee, bane mono boo'paravaing orara aarumo-koo, teka tee diikaang tanuaang domamparavaing Kumponinge koonto'nuka tanturu'nung-koo.

Baa arera Kumponing-etaing nakaro-nupoong-koo diikakatauroi oraka' nkoaavaruu'nung? Aa'noma teing tee Naning Koonto' poainoo' uro'ke sira'paako'ning tavaariko', tee ee'nara dii'ke kare-nupoong-anko sierira nari' dupisi'eru';
Ninge enang tautaurampimang tero tautaurampiru'na': Teing tee' oro'nanka aarumo nkoaamaing Kumponing bakaang muu' aarenaavauka'nung barenku oko-koo.
Tee'koo ninge araka-antarampirio' masika'antameriaing mme' taaramerima, dii' sirapo'nupoong deentariaina'.” Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke tee' minkuvura baka nanuu' baku'aritaa'.
Tee tee Jiisuu' mataa'iari otoko' tee-koo tee botovuu'nung-koo tee' ee'na' nari' Moosesi mataa'iari otoko' Kumponing bakanarempo' ookutunarempo' tanatavurima.

Ee', tee Tanuaang Meekung nii'koo dau mmau'antavui piampuu'nung tee-koo niikaang domang-anta Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuunge nii' Kumponing ninka naroong-antamurii'naang teie piaamurira, ee'noko barenku domaang oparavauka'nung-koong nempampimaung okomurii'naang.
Narung pakupaku nkovuko'nung tee Josepa', nii'na' “Banabasi” kara okovuri nkanukai tampau'na' (miru'noo': domang kuaa'anta bauko) Liivai' bakanarempo'koong, Saiparasi-namui'nung.
Tee tee enang kakarua'moriauka'nung tampa' nko-koo dama'ke makosinaveraa'koo tampa' kavampiaina' kontemoriauka'nung deeko'.

Nka tee ninge daa'ampauka'nung, ai' ninge tee Moosesi-nung boto siompamaa' noko teie teka totora'muu' nkaang sionsiong-koo ning boo'koo tuumpimura. Tee' ooansirai'nange bere'maru' Karistoo'koo bi'antamari tee ninka aa'barata'koo tero moontu'nung-pina' o'noi Kumponing-ankoi domamaraa'naang.

Teketa teie koosinunge purinto'ke ning Jooni narung donsi'pina' oro' paaranang-nko amuu', ee'noko amuma aa'muu', “Deto donkonira Kumponing bakanava pankava dootuu'nava oovei otoinava paaranampeai ee'noko boonturoma nari'. Ee'noko napo' teing teke dootuu'arimaing deerueriai.

Teing aing teing nantoong maniku' ninka bakiaa'koo domang orariaria' otoromaing. Otooto'koo ootukunung-koo tampa' tanatavariritaa' kiiroraa'ariri otoromaing. Tee Kampia tee teinge siompai nanaamaung are' tokoo tee bemanoo'. Ainoo' teing tutuna'ning ookara nantoong-koo Kumponinge moo'uru'ning-koo. Teing aa'na' meekupoong Kumponing-koo, ee'noko tee Kampia-koo.

Tee ntaa'nanka tee oo-koo oosi-pina' oro'nanka tavutavu'koo maamuariri otoroining-pina', ee'noko biikaang bore'koo kapoo' baakopo kooro-koong-pina' oro' otong. Ee'noko oinoo' naning-koong-pina' oro'nanka.

Masika' dii' Moosesi bakaang botoi dai'daria' otong, teka ninge aa'dampimang dii'ke kapoo' orara nkoveriauka' dakaraka'peri aa'perima, “Karistoo'ke Moosesi bakaang boto-ita unaa-antamuio' ning taura'mari o'nong.” A, tee' deea'. Karistoo'ke unaa-antamuru'nung nii'ke kapoo' tampeng naing nkoampii'naang. Kumponing bakaning botovotonaa'nuka makosina' otorimaatoaing.
Tee'koo bakei pore'morimaung, iri' o'marikoo', niikaang noru' Kumponing domantoo'koo sipampiri otomaung-koo, ee'nara ookara-koo Domang-anta masika'antavaamaing-koo.

Enang kara naroong-anta masikung-koo o'nori kiimata aa'na' pankaing tee-koo dau basinoo' kong-koo makosi teie naninge tee Kumponing Bauring mme'upeu'nunge, aa'nunge Jiisuu' bakaang ereng daang-antavukoo', bane teie erenge tee kara naroong-anta pinka'ui tee naning meeka'antavuu'; ee'noko Tanuaang Meekung daviraa'ukoo' teie piaae biraanke-antavumaung tee.
Ee'noko Jiisuu'ke napo' aa'muru', “Mooa-po'nupoong otoriaing. Mma'ke ning botomuu'na' ninge dii' botorampimang.”
Aing teing minkuminkuru ee'noko naro'keta tuumpi nkonuka, biikaang noru' karakaraa'koong pia narung sionuka, ampirinumpariri kareaamaing, ee'noko auraiarima bauta' tamung eentanuka.

Teketa aing aa'ning dauraronanka ookara kansi'koo-nupoong, nantoong pankenanka, tavu'koo urantanuka, nantoong kavo-po'nupoong, ee'noko iri'po'nupoong, ee'noko napo' nii'ning nantoong, botovotonaa'nuka ee'noko osikaiaang, iu'nanka-koo meu'nairu-aape koo'arima kuvinanka-koo kuung ee'noko boia'nanka-koo boong baku'arima aa'paako',

Teka baata teing nantoong aing ee' oro'nuka: kokoroma'nuka, masika'antaropanuka, maremaare aarumo nkonuka, dupisi' nkonuka, kaukauro nkonuka, dopa nkonuka, kumponing daang-koong dootuu'nuka, ee'noko teing ookara daang minkunuka, biikanoo' osi te' tee-koo dinkung-koo nta' karauviaana piikoninkaing-po'nung-koo te' te' ee'noo' kemu'kana' boo'pari oto'doma.”

Aia' deto nentarava' donkonira ntong-koo minkie meeka'antararavai, ee'noko dakaang oraka' nkonanka kuiaravai bakaang miring tampeko.’ Ee'noko tee'puio' tee' meeka'antamarara Jerusalema'aape toromaru'.”
Ee'noko biikaang dapo manikuma-koong-pina' isikananka, napo' si'da'noo' laioni-koong-pina' kepe'nii'nuka.

Ovoring bakaning botovotonaa'nuka turang nkonuka deeauka'. Teing nau'ka navunavuro'nuka otoroaing ootukunung-koo, tampa' siraka'antanuka, iira noru'aavaing, napo' biikaning kare-nupoong koong-antavaarimaatoai domang boimporoi.

Ai' ning tee bane isipo' o'nong nkaang mono, teka tee nkaang domange punkaantampiri otong. Ee'noko bakei aa'na' dotumaramaung diikaang otooto' tampa' otori mintoontarimaung-koo, Karistoo'koo e'maniri baitorariritaa'.

Ai' teie Ovoringe teing koonto'nuka tampa' oovuri tarevurimaung ee'noko bakaang punkaa' tee daate'ari otomaung teing biikaang kunsi tampa' taara-koo. Teka Ovoring bakaang oing tee teing-eta kapoo' orara nkoaamaing-eta munte'uri ako' toroari otong.” (Kena 34:12-16)

Nii'maikorori' ee, Ovoringe piaaruri otorining, teka nii'ke tampa' tampampiaing Kumponing-koo dii' ee'ning-koo. Ai' dii' teing Kumponinge tanturu'ning tutuna'noo'keta domantarii'naang Tanuaang Meekunge meeka'antarurio' ee'noko dii'ke kara masikung masika' antaverima.

Baa tee naning kapoo' orara nkovumaatomaung tee tee' nari' kato nkovuko batei makotuaing, napo' naning noru' ku'mi' tee' nari' kato noru' ku'mi'oi otoainge. Napo' baa tee kapoo' koonto'na' nkovumaa-tomaunge tee' koonto'na' nari' kato nkovuko batei makotuaing, ee'noko meeka'pari otoing naning tee' nari' kato meeka'pari otoainge.”

Ee'noko Piitai aa'puru' teing, “Bere'darira ee'noko ntong-koo minkirarira meeka'antarariai dii' ookara tee-koo Jiisuu' tee tero domamuri taremuriainoo'koo Pako'pari'nii' bakaang miring-koo Kumponinge oraka' nkonanka tonta'deruriaina' ee'noko dii'ke tee avuavu' tee Tanuaang Meekung nkaveriaing.
Taura'periauka' orara orarai maku'koo, teka paku baukonuka deentariri otoriaing dii' dii'ka ee'noko ookara-koo.
Napo' donkaang tee' nari', maniku' ninka nampeesi sipai bii'ka donkaang naing bakiaa'eeko' maimaia'na'. Tee'nko aarumo orara-koo tee kiimata makosina' tora'paamaung bii'ka-koo.
Ee'noko napo' dii' teinge ni'ninka nari' doturariaining.
Ee'noko enang tee Kumponing-koo bere'dariaing dii' teing diikaang oraka' nkonanka piu'deruriaina' ee'noko napo' unaa-anta Ovoring-eta komperiai batei makotuko.
Teing karanaananka temono-kooning teing tee' nari' otomatoaining ookara doong-koo daate'ariri. Bakei da'paria' otoroaininge, ai' te' te' muung otoauka'noo'ke.
Naning tee nkaang mono maa'muaing, nkaang ereng naimuaing domaang oparavauka'nung oto'evuaing, ee'noko boo'keta daa'antavampaing doong asi'noo'na'mung.
Jiisuu'ke maku'uma aa'puu', “Da' makosi deea' kapoo' nko-koo ning-koo Kumponinge tutung makosi-antaruaruko deeko'. Tee'koo tee naning ning da'anko tavo'muinung kapoo' bakei aa'na' orara nkovuing.”
Tee'koo tee masika'anta nko-nko oto'evuaung tee boo'.

Botoi tee nii' domang-anta-koo makotua' mono aruaru'oma boto toto'pumaung-koo. Teka Kumponinge deeko' nii'nung taung nkomemuru' nii' moo'murii'naang. Tee Bauring narung masikung botovuu' tee-pina' niikaang mono-pina' oro'pario', nka tee nii'pina' orara aarumo-po'nung deea'. Porai'nang tee orara aarumo-koong iri' pesi'uu' bakaang mono booma nii'koo parekavarama.

Teka bane kapoo' tampara nkoverima baike kune'eriaing deeko' dii' teing Kumponinge tee-koo biraankeruriaining. Tee' Daari Meekunge aa'pumana', “Nantoonge mau'daariko arorerima domang manki'doriauka'.” (Aisaia' 8:12)
Dii'ke biumaraange diurukaa' iirang-antaverereria' otoai konte-antavereri'neenga.

Ee'noko aurong tee bakei aa'na' purinto'ke bokuma aa'puu', “Dua'aring, dua'aring, temono Babiloni'namono, osi pankamono. Enang tee ma'nari biikaang osi deemparing. Ookara tanuaang orananka ee'noko bareng orananka oto'doma deemparing.

Tee tosi-nko baie? Tee ee'nara naning aa'pumaung, “Jiisuu' tee Kumponinge Tero Pako'pari'nii' deea' nii' domamurira taremurianoo'koo.” Tee tee ee'nara naning Karistoo'koo karenung. Teie tee tekang ookakang Bauma ee'noko Bauring daang-antavuremaung.

Tee tee enang naning tee berete' naivuaing tuaamparama tereng-eta Ovoring bakanareng-eta makotua'na' nkovuma tee tee tuumpivuaing mono-koo ee'noko ereng-koo Ovoring bakaang-koo oraka'nko nkovuing-koo.
Da' tee naning masika'anta-koo daunaa'anta oto'derung arekee', nau-antarama'naang piaromaang tee temurii' masika'anta manta'paravaung tamung sinangropa?

Ee'noko Judasi noru'uitaa' te' pou' tavutavu'navitu ninka ee'noko Ju' biikaang piatooronuka˜ ninka, piristi'koong ovontunge ee'noko Boto Keperuu'navitue botoaaru'ning ninka. Teing kaava-po'nupoong, kosiana, daamu dovang ninka porou', puu.
Ovoringe tee dii' si'duriauka'nung, puring-antaruriaing ee'noko ueeng-antaruriaing tee orara-koo.
Bera tenang baku'koo makotuaruio' taapo' sipau', ee'noko Peero' baurange nkavura bauring deempura tarevuko panka'paru'.
Teketa teie koosinunge tee tapeng nkavura nta'ke maanto'antavuu' boonturoma-ita nkavuu'nunge, ee'noko terempo' kansi'aape bai'uu', teketa aa'nou' pipirakai kurung-kurung ninininimpuma u'mi' nkoaru'.

Ai' temono temono ookara kansi' kante-koo-nupoong kara masikung oovunaare ninka pituvui uaini pitunii'pina' nai-antavuru'namono maroita iri' nka-koo. Tee aarumo auning-koong-pina'. Ee'noko ookara dauraronankai kansi'koo-nupoonge tee' nari' auning-koong aarumo nkoaako'nung temono ninka nari', ee'noko nantoong kansi'nupoong bavevaave nkoaako'nung deepo' kavonankai maanto'antavarikoo' temono bakaang aarumo karakaraa'koong-koo.”
Okora'noo' tee'koo Ju'nupoonge komaara pava dootuu'nava pankava-koo dupisi'maava'naang nkomau'.
Tee'koo kara masikung-eta akovetei bere'arii'naang ee'noko pooarii'naang kumponaananka-koo bi'ariri.

Ee'noko dii'koo narionge masika'antameria'.” Jiisuu'ke tee' minkuvuu' tee tutuntoma-ita noru'uru'nung-koo, aa'ning: teing masika'antavaavauka'ning ee'noko tee naning tooka kompui sivuainung tavaava'naang.
Jiisuu'ke maku'muma aa'muu', “Ninge navio' duuni-koo iimpamira tee avompainung, tee ee'nara tee naning.” Enang tee' minkuvura navio' nkavura iimpura Judasi avuu', Saimoni' Kerio'nung bauring.
Timoti ee, tareveai tee kapoo' Kumponinge masika'antarui aruu'nung tare-koo. Donta'dari otoai naampa Kumponing-nung deeaung-eta, avutevu'ui minku-eta, daang noru' pankaing tampaamaung-eta.

Teka Ju'nupoong-koo pankeng mamairoarira nii'ning taarapiikanuka nkavaarira, karika' tapo'aarira tee osi pankaing naampai maanto'antavau', ee'noko Jeesoni bakanava pava putu'au' teinge Paula' naanka nantoong-anko sing-antavaree'naang piavoroma.

Dii'koo narunge ba'maiko' tee oraka'nko koonto' boo'koo makosinamurii' deeaung nkovuko oovura deeko' teie tee kunsi-koo pakuvuaing, ee'noko Kumponinge tee domampuai. Aung tee teing nantoong oraka'nko, koonto' boo'koo makosinamurii' deeaung-nko nkoaavaining-koo nkoaravaing. Namurii' oraka'nko koonto' boo'koo makosi masika' otomang, ee'noko ninge aa'pampa' temurii'koo kunsirariai.
Masika' naurampimang, baa tee ninge botoampainung onkeonke'uaing tee ning napo' onkeonke'muaing. Ee'noko naning tee ning onkeonke'muaing tee ning botomuu'nung onkeonke'uainge.”
Tee'koo nii'ke tampa' tampampimaatoaing tee paninung muu' nkavampiru'nung-koo dankang-koo makosi deeaung;

Tenang tee Ju'koo nii'ning nankai'nupoong avitoitoi osinankai nanaako' ma'nari orananka bata'koo, ee'noko nii'ning teing-koo Jiisuu'nung miring-koo nantoong-eta ma'nari bata'koo piavoroko' aa'paava'naang, “Nii'ke Jiisuu'nung miring-koo, tee ee'nara Paula'ke daankivumaung, aa'dampimang: Da' ma'naang tenkeniai.”
ee'noko Paula'ke Sailas bokuvura tenkenuretu' teinge baito-nupoonge Ovoring-koo sipaaresio' teie pakuvuree'naang.
Tarerariri otoriai tee kapoo' pore'dorimaung nkaveriaru'neenga, aa'na' teka ootukuario' tee moo' nkaveriai.

Napo' tee tenaanka iri'po'naanka aa'ning nko-koong: paning avo'koong apo'uaroo'naang tenang tee doorenang Ovoring bakaang sira'purema nanureko, ntonanka ereng deeng-anta-koong, ee'noko ookara kansi'nupoong-koo amutemurii' doovaang tavo'anta-koong bee'ka piavoreaina'.
Da' dakaang deea' aung ee' oro' kapoo' nko-koo, ai' da' dakaang domang tee koomparava' Kumponing-ankoi.
Ookara kapoo' nantoong oto'memumaing dakaning, ee'noko da' oto'derumaing ning nkaninge. Nantoonge teing ooaara daangamaavaing.
Ookara dama'du-aape bere'ariring, oroo'ke nari' beroing. Narung naninge tampa' nkovua'. Narung duukung otoa' bakei. (Kena 14:1-3; 53:1-3; Norukasi' 7:20)
Deikoo'na' ee'noko baka daangana' nkorariauka', teka dii'ka boonko noru'dariri deto pankaing-antareerimatoai.
Ee'noko teenanka daamu ba'nananka-koo meeroo'ke narung naning-naumpo' teke otoko, mononopa' isikung kau'koo basi kurumpari, ee'noko tokonii'koo kooronanka na'nanii' murukeue kapeto keemoomparitaa'.

Teketa deto tee napo' barakosi' otoauka'nunge, tee Kumponing ee'noko tee Kampia beekanoo' ba'nava'nani'doma te' teke temono-koo otoi otoaing ee'noko Kumponing bakaninge botovotonaa'nukai tee teka dootuu'aaremaatoaing.
Ookara kapoo'nanka aung kansi'koonanka o'doma due'umaang. Tee'koo mataurariri tarerariri otoriaing tampa' kunsirariaina'.
Ee'noko teketa beekaang nko-nko opureta Antioko'namono-aape aarerie toroaretu', te' ee'noo' tutung Karistoo' bakanavitue Kumponing-koo sipaaretu'noo' pakuvuree'naang tee nko-nko nkovureko.

Da' nemaka nampee-siraravaing deeko' oraka' nkorarava'. Ee'noko nerai'na' tee', nampee-siaravaing deeko' oraka' nkoarava'. Teka teing nampeesiariaininge tee arikung kune'aavaing kansi'koo, ee'noko ninge tee' oro' kune'eri'neeng-koo tee' minkuamaang.

Aming-koo, nna' nii' tee nantoong tumuusinanka ninka tameeria', teka aa'ning ninka: ma'nari-koo ovontung avatevaatang-koo neriariri otoroi Sietani'koo kuunge, paning-nairu-kooning-koo oravitu bakei maare ninka tameering, mutaanang-aapei ootukunung kansi' booni'antanuka enanaroong-koo.
Dii'koo naning narung matau-koo apuka'parara tee Kumponing nia'uaing, tee ookara nantoong-koo avusiro', domang manki'oa', ee'noko teie avuaing tee.
Tanuaang Meekung siri'eriauka'.

Teva ee'nava kaandesi-koo kaniau'nava kevarora-po'nava. Aivitunavaro-koo aing aa'ning otoroko': araka-pante', ee'noko batanang, ee'noko berete' tee batanang-koo dau otoko. Tevaro ee'navaro Meekavaro tampaako'navaro.

Ninge koonto' nauramaang da', ning-koo tee kooro nta'ke simpe'ura kiiroraa'antavuu'nung moo'siiaing, tanuaang kavo-po'nung deentaraa'naang. Napo' mononopa' kakaara ning-koo moo'eai simpenoi' ooraamaung nopa'daravaina'. Ee'noko napo' marasini moo'eainge ning-koo, duta-koo si'darara tampa' oomeaina'.
Aung tee ninge dii'koo daariamang tee Kumponing Bauring bakaang miring masika'antaverimaung-koo dii'ke noru'erii'naang dii' teing tee domaang oparavaung oto'deruring.
Naning baka bakaang noru'keta karomaung baka daangang piavoma, ee'noko naning tee botovuu'nung bakaang miring pankaing deemparaa'naang piavomaung tee, tee naning koonto', daang minkuvuaung.

Nka bane tampeng meenasi nii'koo kuung otoko, nii' teing utau aaveta'nanka kansi'koo nkonii'pina' oro'nuka. Kumponinge tee' miru'muru'nung iri' dau basie puring-antamuriko nantoonge tee bakaang iri' tasi'paava'naang, niikaang deea'.

Mmaikori' ee, mero' nkoveriauka'. Tamung doonko otoriai. Kumponing-nung iira otong, maku'uaing. Tee' Daari Meekunge ee' minkuvuu'na', “Mero' tee nkaang. Ninge ninka mero'ampaing. Kumponinge tee'puu'.” (Boto 32:35)

Jiisuu'ke maku'urima aa'puru', “Ning ninka daangamari dei, nkaang daangang tamunsi'nung. Tee daangamumaung Mma'ke ee'narai, nkaang meenasi naururima. Tee ee'nara dii'ke diikaang Kumponing tamperimaung.
Taamang narung noru'eri Kumponing bakaang nko-nko orari-antaveriauka'. Ookara tee bakei kiiroraa'nanka masikung, teka masika'parapeu' oraka' nii'ning dua'anta-koo tamung naro'keta naiampiko.
Tenaankai Jiisuu'nung mono nkavuretai'nange boo'nuka nopa'na' nopa'uretu' baaronge tee ninka tampa' nuuraa' ninka, tee' ee'na' nkoaariko'na' Ju'nupoonge dako'aarii'naang mono.

Aa'noko teing kiimatanava-koo otoroko'ning piaaverereriko', ee'noko doturariri tamung oovereriko' karika'ke diikaning kavonanka bakiaa'deraariko. Aming-koo, nna' ee' tasi'peri tee': Nii' kapoo' deto basi tampara oto'memuring paa'koo makosi deeaung.
“Aung ee'nara Deevita' baurukaa'keta Kumponinge po'antavuu' Isireeli-nupoong-koo tee Domang-anta, Jiisuu', maraka-antavuu'na'.

Tee' nari' Daari Meekunge minkuvuu'na' naurampimang, aa'puu'na', “Kumponinge tero maamu-antavuu' teing-koo domange dai'aamaing-koo kapoo' tampara naninge teroita dutai oovua', ee'noko punkange taaravua', ee'noko bakaang onou-koo tumparava'.” (Aisaia' 64:4)
Jiisuu' boo'keta daa'uu'nung bakaang Tanuaang dii'koo otoing deeko' teie ee'narai Jiisuu' Karistoo' boo'keta daa'uu'nunge diikaang mono boo'koong domampuaing ee'nara bakaang Tanuaang dii'koo otoinge.
Tee'koo Kumponing bakaang Tanuaang niikaang tanuaang ninka narung deemarima nii' sira'marimaung nii' teing Kumponing baurukaa'.
Nii'namurii' onoue tosiruriauka', ai' Kumponing tee daang-pina' oro'anta deea'. Tee-koo kapoo'koo naninge keempuaing-koo tee tee-koo ee'nung-koo sinang kavuaing.

Ooveriaing Kumponing tee bakei aa'na' piaa-po'nung ee'noko napo' aa'na' kiimata-po'nunge. Kiimata teing-koo nantoong dua'arimaing-koo ee'noko piaa dii'koo bakaang piaa masika'antaveri otorining-koo otong. Nka masika'antaveriaruko deeko' tee dii' napu'duripeu'.

Tee'koo, ee mmaikori', teinge tee' oraka' nkoraariko mii'kiri otoriai poaina'mung nemperi. Ooverimang tee naning mintoong bauko sinang petaa'oainoo' nempui ka'duuari otomaung tee taamang tampara kansi'keta nkavuaina'mung noru'ui. Tutuntoma-ita bera o'domai basi tampa' tarevumaung.
Kumponinge piaavuriaing Onesiporas bakanava-kooning, teie amutemu'pie boira-antamuko' ning.
Ee'noko enang tee dii' nkaning toire' tee ninka nari' otoriaing, tenang tee oro'paravainang dotumariaina' ee'noko maia'ke daka'muriauka' tee poko.
Teka enang aa'dampimang, Tanuaang Meekunge naururiaina' siomperiai ee'noko mono bakaang pia siomperiauka'.

Aung kara masikung, masika'anta-koo makosi, aa'noko, “Jiisuu' Karistoo' kansi'koo pou' nantoong orarananka domampurii'naang.” Ninge masikee-antavampeu', ai' ning tee baru' aa'na' orara teing-koo nantoong-koo boonga.
Asirang-koo ee' naurampii'naang: Purintariri otoriaing Ovoring-koo bakaang iri' iirakuta ninka.
Tee'koo nauramaang, da' purintari donkonii otomaung-pina' noru'dari deeko' bakei tampa' masika' tanatararavaing dua'dara'neeng-koo.
Ai' tee tee namu'ke boontunamparara tee ookutunung batei-koo tampa' makosi-antavuru' teing nantoong meeka'pariri otoroaining.
Ee'noko Ju'koong ovontunge napo' kapang ukuau' tee too'paava'naang.
Teka ninge dii' pia-antarampimang tee Karistoo' noru'erii'naang tee tee Bore' ookara donkaang kante-koo, ee'noko donkaani tee manikuma-koo bore', ee'noko Kumponing Karistoo'koo bore'.
Teing-koo nii'ninge aing aa'ning tora'paako': akapeu', mura', dai'dovampaarima kiimatavaariko'.

Tee niikaang nooruupi dama' domang-antamuriaing-koong tee tankanung-pina' ivepo' masipo' i'ma'ari otomaung, diiri'koo makotua', ai' narunge tee koonto' paning-koo kuunavaro-koo meepo' masipo' tumparara tee maraka-anta teka pinka'uu'nung;
Temurii' mintoong mutaanang-koong kapoo' basiaravaing-koo kanto'daria' otoaing, teka sira'periai temurii' aarumo orara.

Ee mmaikori', dii'ka oraka' minkureeria' otoai. Baa tee naning ba'maiko' oraka' minkuvuma simpe'umaunge tee boto oraka' minkuvuma simpe'umaung. Teka dake tee boto simpe'eaing deeko' da' boto siong deea', da' makotua'na' boto simpe' deeng-antararamang.

Teing kivora-ita kenaanka karanaang-koong da'nava kivora-ita keura duku'koo nkonii', navaro-koong da'nava nau pankau ookutunung duku'nu-koo nkonii'ke. Ee'noko tee taung temono-koong tee koonto' kooro narung-koong, kalaasi narung-pina' oro'.

Teka tee Karistoo' tee Kumponing bakanamuiaang-koo mataa'iaru' Kumponing bauring deempari okovui, ee'noko nii' ee'ning teing bakanamuiaang-kooning deemariri o'noring nemariri pinka'mariri o'noriaing deeko', dotumariri amaiaa'moria' o'noriaing toroarara domamuriainoo'koo.
Piaa tee koonto' domang-eta piaareeriaing. Piaroriauka' orara-koo. Kapoo' tampara-koo kato pinka'dariai.

Teketa tee-koo batei-koo pankaing u'mi' nkoarara osi pankamono-koo narung kivora-koo pavananka pesi'arako ooantu', ee'noko nantoong ˜kenaanka-taa kokorei' tavurira dupisi'uru', ee'noko sipariru'ninge avoreaara Kumponing paning-koong daangampau'.

Teka tenang maraka-anta Kumponinge Eebaraami' avuu'nang Kumponinge naning otoaruko kara-pare' Eebaraami' koonto' nauvuu'. Tee'koo napo' tee maraka-anta deu basi Moosesi-nung boto-koo, ai' boto tee tamung nantoong-koo otong.
Pailati'ke aa'puu', “Dake ning karamea' o'nong ee? Noru'ea' ee ninge makosi da' sirapo' si'koo ee'noko aa'barata'koo taaka-koo?”

Tee kara Daari Meekung-koo deeruvuko'naare anaare: “Kumponing bakaang bautara dupisi'aava'naang nkoaako karang kamaankuauka'nung tee' nari' sipisipi'nu amakoarapeu'na' nantoonge tavu'doma barampai beroko.
“Teketa teing daurarong-koo eentavariko Kumponinge Soolo daurarong deeng-antaevuru' karenaumo kivora mare'koo, tee Kiisi bauring, Bensimani bakanamuiaang-koong.
Ai' teke Kiriti'ke dootuu'koo kuunge nantoong karinga taarapiikanuka otorong, daang minkunuka ee'noko tosi baukonukai, baru'noo' teing Ju'nupoong dopa' toto'navitu tee' oro'nuka.
Tenaa'koo kuunge amutemurii' kau' karenaumonanka, boru'nanka ee'noko barennanka auvi'au-kooning otoroko.
Tee ee'nara meenasi ameu'nung avorontu'nung narung deemparii'naang, da' ee'noko ning narung deemaresi o'noremana'.
Enang dake tee tee kara nau-antavaramana' paaravei nari' nau-antaveriai, ee'noko Jiisuu' Karistoo'koo kuung otomatoai ee'nara masika'antavema ee'noko nantoong piaaverima.
Teke ˜nareng-taa utau kapang-kooning ntong-po'ning te' otoko' taramu-pina' basi pankaing-pina', Ju'nupoonge temurii'keta ntong nke'aama amutemurii' kapoo' duu'paako'ning biikaang toomo siompai.
Kanu'keta tanterariai oraka'nko siperi. Nii'ninge dii'kooninge Kumponing noru'aava'. Tee'panko maia'dorii'naang.
Boonko noru'dariaing, banainge otori da'deng iiraroria'. Piaa oro'antaveri otorimaatoai tokoona' noru'deeria'.

Nii'ning tampa' taararaariaining namu'ke mosianung-koong nta'keta batusi'erererima domang-antavereriai. Ee'noko napo' nii'ning Ovoring-anko bokuereriai tampa' nkoverererima, teka biikaang aarumo mono bakaang pia siona'koo maarerori pinka'dariaing, baaro'duriko teing pina' nari' dua'dari'neenga.
Ee'noko nii'ke noru'ampiri otong teing ookara kapoo'nanka tavo'arimaing nii' tampa' nko-koong nii' Kumponing piaavampimaing ee'noko baremuri bokumuru'ning.

Dii' teing kara meumperimaing deentariko ookarai tampa' noru'daari otong ee'noko ning napo' tee'koo dotumaramaunge. Nka ninge dii' tampa' mataurariri oto'koo pia-antarampimang tampa' nari' nko-koo. Oraka' nko-koo amako-pina' otoriai.

Tevaro-koo batanang kooroi nkonii' ii tampa' nuuraa' paro'antaroma otoko' ee'noko tee bokita meekung kara naroong-anta-koong otoko' kooroi daka'nii' ookamenta-ita. Ee'noko tee bokita meekung-koo kuung aing aa'ning otoroko: utau kooro-koo ta'nanii', kuunge tee taamang maana' paning-etaing otoing; ee'noko napo' teruung Eeroni bakanaruung donsi'naruung puaravura sinampuu'naruung, ee'noko teing bentaning kapang-kooning kara naroong-anta daarinii' nari' otoko.
Enang ee nii' daangamaripeu'? Makotua'. Aming-koo makotua'? Tee aa' tamung masika'antavampiko koonto'nuka tammuru', tampara nko-nko-koo deea'.

Ai' da' masika'antavea' ee, Pilipi', ning Mma'koo o'nomaung ee'noko Mma' ning-koo otomaunge? Ee'noko teing kara naurampimatoining ning-eta poa'. Mma'keta ee'nara-ita pomaung. Mma'ke ning-koo otomaunge bakaang nko-nko nkovumaung.
Nantoong karingai nari' pakueema tuumpiaareko tuutunang˜ taaranukai piatooronuka botoaario' mononopa' dere'aama kiru'aaretu' tenaanka-ita, teketa bana'ke mura'aaretu'.
Nerakung boto arompimaang: Piaareeriaing dii'ka. Tee' ninge dii' piaarampimana' dii'ka piaareeriaing.

Enang tee nii'ke noru'ampiri o'noring tee niikaang mono anke kansi'koo o'noring bare-pina' pesi'arako nii' teing tee pava Kumponing-etaing oto'memuring teing paning-koo otoi oto' aa'ning naninge birenge kanivua'.
Jiisuu'ke aa'na' karoma aa'puru', “Baa tee ning masika'antamumaunge ning narung masika'antamuaung, teie tee ning botomuu'nung nari' masika'antavumaunge.
Teka Ananaiasie maku'uma aa'puu', “Ovoring, ning tee nantoonge mmau'ke naumaako taaravamaung tee. Nantoong dakaning aa'na' oraka' nkovurimaung Jerusalema'ka.

A'noo' ee' oro'nanka otoroaing: nantoong bii'ka piaavarimaing, mooni' piaavaamaing, bii'ka daangamparimaing, daang pankaing-pina' noru'nanka, kara oreng minkunuka, taarapii-kananka biumaraang-koo, kapoo'koo tampara minkuaavaing, meeka'pariaing,
Enang aa' tee nii' bakaang erenge naroong-antamurining deemariko enang makosi moo'muriaing koonto' kiimata-ita.
Nkaang otooto' Karistoo' ninka nari' o'noresi ninge tasi'pansing kapoo' baka tanuaang ku'mi'anta otoa'. Teka naninge masika'antavui ku'mi'anta tampuko dei, ku'mi'anta deemparapeu' tee-koo.

Dake aing nko-nkona' nau-antananka naueriaing-koo nii'maikorori' da' tee tampara pakupakunung Jiisuu' Karistoo' bakaang deentaravaing maanto'antararara teinge karakarananka masikeng siompampimainge ee'noko tampara minkunaa tee ee'nara dake siompemaung.
